62a4(rgyud): pa brkus/ phyir ba bdag sum pa dang gdong dmar rnams li yul du 'ong bar 'gyur ro// bud med de'i bu gang gis bye dang / rkyal ba dang / shing gzhong dang / zong khyer ba de ni li yul rgyal por 'gyur/
62a5(rgyud): ro mi gang gi rkyal pa la sogs pa rdzas phrogs pa ni de'i tshe gdong dmar gyi rgyal por 'gyur ro// ba de dag ni de'i tshe dmag mir 'gyur ro// mi de'i mar gyur pa'i bud med de ni de'i tshe li yul gyi rgyal po'i ma
62a6(rgyud): 'gyur ro// ma byin par len pa byed byed pa'i mi de'i mas ni phye dablang te/ sangs rgyas kyi nyan thos kyi dge slong grong khyer mdzes zhes bya ba la bsod snyoms su phul te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba des na yang mir
62a7(rgyud): skye ba thob par 'gyur ro// mi de ni mi la phye byin pa dang / mas kyang dge slong grong khyer mdzes la phul ba de'i bsod nams bsags pas ma 'ongs pa'i dus na li yul du dpa' sbed ces bya bar 'gyur ro// /
62b1(rgyud): rlungs na rnam par rgyal ba'i go cha zhes bya bar yang gyur nas/ rgyal sring thob par gyur te sar rdor gsul 'gyed par 'gyur ro// bye sbyin par byed pa de ni chu des na mir skye thob par 'gyur te/ mi nges
62b2(rgyud): lam gyi 'gram na 'bras rngos so// der mi gang dag gis 'bras chan chung zan par byas pa de ni de'i tshe dge slong du gyur te/ des na de dog gis dge 'dun gyi nor yul gyi klung du 'jal bar 'gyur ro//
62b3(rgyud): der bya sna tshogs kyis 'bras zos pa gang yin pa de dag ni de'i tshe li'i rgyal po'i bran du 'gyur ro// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'di ltar li yul du mi rgod mang
62b4(rgyud): po 'byung bar 'gyur te de dag gis ni gang gi tshe gzhon nu dge byed skyes pa de la phan 'dogs par 'gyur ro// gang gi tshe sdig byed skyes pa na de la gnod pa byed par 'gyur te/ de'i tshe mi rgod lnga brgya po de dag
62b5(rgyud): rgyal po yab kyi thad du gtong bar 'gyur ro// mi rgod de dag kyang li yul der skye ba len par 'gyur te/ dge 'dun gyi nor dang mchod rten gyi nor chud gzon par byed do// mi rgod de dag kyang sngon ma
62b6(rgyud): byin par len pa byed pa'i phyir/ yan lag bcad nas bsad pa des na de dag gis kyang li'i rgyal po rnam par rgyal po'i grags pa gsod par 'gyur ro// ma 'ongs pa'i dus su mi rgod de dag 'khor ba/
62b7(rgyud): las grol bar byed pa'i dge slong zla ba dag pa zhes bya ba zhig kyang 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal sngon gyi sangs rgyas rnams kyi yab kyi bya ba byed byed pa 'di yin
63a1(rgyud): te de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal 'di ni ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i bskal pa bzang po'i
63a2(rgyud): sangs rgyas de dag gi sku gdung yang 'dzin par 'gyur ro// gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa de'i tshe'ang byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal bram ze dron
63a3(rgyud): sa go tra zhes bya ba chos dang ldan pa zhig tu 'gyur te/ gang gi tshe rgyal po rnams phan tshun du g.yul 'gyed par chas pa de'i tshe bram ze dro na sa go tras/ bum pa bzang po blangs nas sku gdung 'gyed par
63a4(rgyud): byed do// gang gi tshe li yul du byang chub sems dpa' phal po che ma byung ba dang / mchod rten phal po che dang / sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs dang / dge 'dun gyi kun dga' ra ba mdzes pa dag pa
63a5(rgyud): byung ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal grong khyer du 'byung bar 'gyur te/ rigs dang ldan pa'i bud med du 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyi spyod pa ji lta bu zhe na/
63a6(rgyud): thams cad du 'dod dgur sgyur ba'i gzugs can yin te/ byang chub sems dpa' rang bzhin ji lta ba bzhin du'ang sdang / rgyal po ji lta ba bzhin du'ang snang rgyal mo ji lta ba dang / dge sbyong dang bram
63a7(rgyud): ze'i gzugs ji lta bu dang / 'dod pa'i khams su gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi bar du thams cad du 'jug par 'gyur te/ rol me mkhan rol mo'i gnas la mkhas pa gzugs rnam pa sna tshogs
63b1(rgyud): thams cang nor pa bzhin do// rtags pa'i sems dang ldan pa'i sems can gyi thad du'ang shin tu lhag par spor to// ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dang la bung nged kyi gdugs su sngon cen/
63b2(rgyud): gang gi phyir bud med lhag par 'dod pa'i 'dod chags la chags pa'i sems dang ldan pa ni shin tu glen zhing shin tu ser sna che bas na/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' 'jab dpal lhag par bud med/
63b3(rgyud): du ston to// bud med byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod pa dag kyang yod pas na/ de'i phyir yang byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal de lta bur byed do// bud med du skyes nas snying rje chen por thob par 'gyur
63b4(rgyud): ba'i dus kyang yod do// bud med rnams 'dzem par 'gyur ba dang / 'khor ba'i sbyor rtogs par 'gyur ba dang / skyes pa gzhan spong bar 'gyur ba dag kyang yod do// gang gi tshe ba dag sum pa der
63b5(rgyud): 'ongs te/ mchod rten chen po rnams dang / dri gtsang khang mang po dang / dge 'dun gyi kun dga' ra ba bzang po rnams sreg par 'gyur ba lha mo dri ma med pa'i 'od kyis rtogs pa de'i tshe/ byang chub
63b6(rgyud): sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis/ lha mo de la 'di skad ces smras te/ sring mo sdug pa gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das rin chen gyi mo grong khyer du gshegs pa de na/ nga khyod kyi dge
63b7(rgyud): ba'i bshes gnyen du gyur te/ dera'o bu cag gnyis kyis byang chub kyi phyir dang / sems can 'jigs shing skrag pa ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad bdag gis yongs su bskyang bar bya'o//
64a1(rgyud): zhes smon lam btab pa'i dus de dran par gyis shig/ sring mo sdug pa ji ltar dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya bar gyur pa de'i tshe/ rdo rje sde dang gnyis kyis bcom ldan 'das
64a2(rgyud): kyi bka' mnos pa dran par gyis shig/ gzungs sngags de dag dang / sangs rgyas kyi mtshan de dag dang / 'od zer gang dag khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe 'dir
64a3(rgyud): mthong ba de dag ngas rgyas par bshad kyis/ khyod kyis zung la dris te de'i ming po'i thad du khyer cig/ mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su sangs rgyas de dag gis 'od zer btang ba'ang / li yul
64a4(rgyud): 'di bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i phyag mtshan yin la/ bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag sems can rnams la phan pa'i phyir/ der skye ba len par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// chos kyi
64a5(rgyud): rgyal po'i mchod rten de dag la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das phal po che de dag gi sku gdung mang po'i gnas pa de dag lha mo de'i lag tu 'ong bar 'gyur te/ mchod pa'i phyir sems can de dag la 'gyed par/
64a6(rgyud): byed do// yul dar lha mo de snying rje skye bar 'gyur te/ ci nas mchod pa'i gnas su 'gyur bar byed do// de nas grong khyer gyi nang du khang pa shin tu mdzes par byas ste/ grong khyer de na mi ji/
64a7(rgyud): snyid gnas pa de dag dar ci nas bsod nams byed par 'gyur zhing 'dzin pa dang / mchod pa dang / brtse bar byed par 'gyur ba dang / ci nas spyod pa de la 'jug par 'gyur bar bya'o//
64b1(rgyud): ci'i phyir sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis li yul gyi phyir chos yang dag par 'gro ba mdzad ce na/ li yul bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i phyag mtshan yin pa dang / bskal pa bzang
64b2(rgyud): po'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyi phyag mtshan yin pa dang / ri glang mgo dang / go ma sa la gan d+ha'i mchod rten du bskal pa bzang po'i sangs rgyas thams cad
64b3(rgyud): 'du bar 'gyur ba dang / li yul byang chub sems dpa'i gnas su 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
64b4(rgyud): dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa/ gang gi tshe gdong dmar dang rgya 'thab pa'i dus la bab pa de'i tshe nu bo khyod kyis bya ba'i dus la bab bo// rab nges kyang sems can la phan pa'i phyir shes bzhin du
64b5(rgyud): skye ba len par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis 'dir 'od zer btang nas/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la skyes bkur ste/ skyes de dag kyang byang chub sems
64b6(rgyud): dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis 'dir khyer te 'ongs nas/ sems can 'jigs shing skrag pa rnams kyis don gyi phyir snying rjes sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang byul to// gzungs
64b7(rgyud): sngags de dag dang 'od zer de dag kyang li yul gyi don du sangs rgyas kyis bzhes nas de dag gi grogs su gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' dag kyang ci nas li yul de 'jig par mi 'gyur
65a1(rgyud): bar bya ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi nang sna tshogs nas shrI 'phros nas da rta pa len par 'gyur ro// glang gi tsha'i yul du gnod pa byung na de'i cha sangs rgyas dathAH
65a2(rgyud): mtshan dang / gzungs sngags de dag dang / 'od zer gyi ming de dag bris te grong khyer gyi sgo rnams su gzhag la/ dmag gi nang du'ang bris te rgyal mam mi gdags so// yang na ming
65a3(rgyud): dag 'dzin du gzhug cing bklag pa dang bcang bar bya'o// pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang / mu ge rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / dge ba'i phyogs 'phel bar bya ba dang / sdig pa 'byung bar bya ba
65a4(rgyud): dang nganang las thar par bya ba rnams la'ang phan par byed pa yin no// glang sa sdig pa lnga ba yod na/ des n+yag nyi shu rtsa gcig gi bar du phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas rnams la rim gro byas te
65a5(rgyud): sku gdung dang ldan pa'i mchod rten nas/ sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs kyi sman sngar dus gsum du bzlas brjod byas na/ dge ba'i phyogs las gang 'dod pa myur du thob par 'gyur to// 'od zer de/
65a6(rgyud): dag kyang de'i steng du gnas par 'gyur ro// pha rol gyi dmag tshogs 'ong ba la'ang bzlas brjod bya'o// yang na nyin gcig bzhin du lan bdun bdun bklag par bya'o// gang sdug bsngal bar
65a7(rgyud): gyur pa 'am/ nad pa 'am/ yang na ji lta bur 'dod kyang rung ste bzlas brjod bya'o// yang na bklag par bya'o// ci sI mi klog na'ang skud pa la mdud pa bdun bor te/ lan bdun bdun bzlas
65b1(rgyud): brjod byas nas btags na sdug bsngal las thar bar 'gyur ro// grong khyer gang gi sgo la btags na grong khyer der dgra 'ong mi nus par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces
65b2(rgyud): bka' stsal to// gang gi tshe gdong dmar dang rgya 'thab pa'i dus la bab pa de'i tshe/ gzhon nu rdo rje sde bcom ldan 'das kyis las su bskos pa de rnam par rgyal ba'i go cha zhes bya bar gyur pa na/
65b3(rgyud): 'phrin yig 'di gser gyi rigs kyi yul du khyer la/ 'phrin yig 'di gser gyi rigs kyi rgyal po rgyal po la bstan par bya ste/ mi mang po'i mig sngar ni bstan par mi bya'o// yul de'i glad
65b4(rgyud): kyang khyer la kha cig ni der bskur bar bya'o// kha cig ni skar rdor gzhag par bya'o// gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad du sngon byung ba ni 'di lta bu'o// ma 'ongs pa'i dus na
65b5(rgyud): ni 'di ltar 'gyur ro zhes bka' stsal pa de'i tshe/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// zla ba'i tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang
65b6(rgyud): dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mi g.yo ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam pa thams cad med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dga' ba'i dbang bskur ba zhes bya ba'i ting
65b7(rgyud): nge 'dzin dang / thams cad kyi rgyan ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dpa' bzhi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'od chen po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dpa' bar 'gro ba zhes bya/
66a1(rgyud): ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ting nge 'dzin bcu po 'di dag la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das snyoms par zhugs nas smin mtshams kyi gseb nas snang ba chen po zhes bya
66a2(rgyud): ba'i 'od zer byung ngo // 'od zer de las kyang 'od zer bcu byung nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du song ngo // song nas kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med par 'bros so// sangs rgyas
66a3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing ji snyed yod pa'i zhing de dag thams cad du ji ltar li yul du gzhon nu rdo rje'i sde dang lha mo dri ma med pa'i 'od kyi phyir sngar bshad pa bzhin
66a4(rgyud): tshig tu brjod pa de dag byung ngo // de nas de'i tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag dang / bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas dgongs pa mthun par rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba'i
66a5(rgyud): gzungs sngags 'di gsungs so// tad+ya thA/ bo d+hi bo d+hi/ sarba a laM kA ra/ ba ra ga ta/ d+harma tsakra/ ba ra ga te/ ma ra s+yA nu ba ra ga ta/ a bi shra ya ba ra ga ta/ a b+hid+ya/
66a6(rgyud): pra t+ya ya sa skA ra pa t+ya ya/ na ma rU pa pra t+yA ya/ b+hA ba pra t+ya ya ni rung d+ha pra t+ya ye/ ta thA ga ta/ ma ra Na ha ha/ bud+d+ha sa t+ye na/ de baM sa twe na/ nA ga sa t+ye na/ rak+Sha sa t+ye nA
66a7(rgyud): a suM ras t+ye na/ sarba pA rata sa t+ye na rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba'i gzungs sngags 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gsungs te/ gang gi tshe lha mo dri ma med pa'i 'od
66b1(rgyud): kyis thos pa de'i mod la rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi gzungs sngags rtogs par 'gyur ro// gang gi tshe li yul gyi don gyi phyir sangs rgyas rnams kyis chos 'di gsungs pa de'i tshe//
66b2(rgyud): lha mo dri ma med pa'i 'od kyis thal mo sbyar te 'di skad ces gsol to// bdag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis mkhyen pa lags te bdag sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su
66b3(rgyud): dag pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi 'od zer gyis so sor brgyan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das pad+ma'i 'dab ma dri ma med pa'i rgyu skar gyi rgyal po mngon par
66b4(rgyud): shes pa'i me tog kun tu rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas/ mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir ma'i don bgyi ba dang / dam pa'i chos pad+ma dkar po don du gnyer ba dang / de bzhin
66b5(rgyud): gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'i drung du smon lam gdab pa'i slad du mchis te/ dge bsnyen ma hu sha zhes bya bar gyur nas/ bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul dang mjal ba slan chad lung bstan pa thob ste/ de'i tshe
66b6(rgyud): der smon lam btab pas gang du khyod sangs rgyas su 'gyur ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams der bdag byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod par gyur cig ces bgyis nas 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par snang
66b7(rgyud): mdzad kyis so sor brgyan pa zhes bgyi ba de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma'i 'dab ma dri ma med pa'i rgyu skar gyi rgyal po mngon par shes pa'i me tog kun tu rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi
67a1(rgyud): zhing de nas/ mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i drung du mchis nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mi mjed kyi 'dzi/
67a2(rgyud): rten gyi khams kyi mi rnams ni chags shing zhan la/ zhe sdang nga rgyal gyis khengs pa dang 'gying ba ste/ de dag gi don du byang chub sems dpa' rnams phan tshun las chen po nyams su len par
67a3(rgyud): byed de/ de dag gi sdig pa rnams tshe rabs kun tu sel bar byed do zhes gsungs so// de'i tshe bdag gis smon lam btab pa/ ji lta bu'i tshul dang thabs kyis der gzhan dag mchi ba de bzhin
67a4(rgyud): du bdag kyang mchi bar gyur cig ces bgyis nas/ de'i tshe tshe rabs snga ma la bdag gi mar gyur pa de'i don bgyi ba dang / ci nas ngan song gsum du mi mchi bar bgyi ba'i slad du skye ba blangs
67a5(rgyud): so sngon gyi mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su dge bsnyen ma hu sha zhes bgyi bar gyur pa dang / gzhon nu nor bzang gis rnam par thar pa bdag la dris pa/ slan chad bdag gis mi'i
67a6(rgyud): nang du mi'i skye ba blangs te/ bdag gis sems can dag dang 'dod chags spyad nas mi gzhan gyis bdag la khri mo dang glen mar mthong ngo // sems can rnams yongs su grol ba'i slad du
67a7(rgyud): bud med kyi nang du mi bzad pa'i skye ba mang po dag blangs te/ rgyal mo dang / rgyal po'i bu mo dang / bud med pal dang / smad 'tshong ma dang / sdug 'phongs pa dang / bud med dbul ro/
67b1(rgyud): ngag tu gyur te/ bud med du skyes pa rnams kyi don bgyid pa dang / zung ser rnams yongs su grol bar bgyid ngo do// rang gi las kyi dbang gis de ltar 'dod pa'i 'dod chags spyad kyang
67b2(rgyud): sems can de dag mgu bar ma nus te/ tshe rabs du mar mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir sems don gyi srad du sdug bsngal mang po nyams su myed ste/ bud med du skye bas shin tu skyo bar/
67b3(rgyud): 'gyur na/ 'on kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis sug las chen por bka' stsal te/ tshe rabs grangs ma mchis par bdag gis sdug bsngal bzod par bgyi 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das
67b4(rgyud): shAkya thub pa mnyes par bgyi ba dang / sangs rgyas nyid sgrub pa'i slad du bdag gis smon lam chen po btab pa/ sems can thams cad la phan pa'i slad du tshe rabs gzhan dag tu bdag
67b5(rgyud): la sdug bsngal 'byung bar 'gyur ba thams cad bdag gis bzod par bgyi'o// yul de srungs shig ces bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la bka' stsal pa/ gang lags pa de nangad dung ming yang
67b6(rgyud): ma mchis/ yul yang ma byung mod kyi/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dang / 'khor der 'dus pa lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang
67b7(rgyud): dri za dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / srin po dang / mi dang / ri ma yin pa thams cad las dam pa blang bar bgyi'o// ji srid du bdag tshe rabs de dag tu skye ba na/ bdag la
68a1(rgyud): 'dod chags dang zhe sdang gi gzhir mthong na'ang bdag la sdig par ma gyur cig/ ci rigs par skye ba'i dus 'tshal bar gyur la/ 'di lta bu yongs su 'dzin par gyur cig/
68a2(rgyud): gang gi tshe li yul thog mar byung ba'i dus la bab pa na/ de'i tshe yul bgyid pa'i slad du der bdag theg mur rgyal por gyur cig/ li yul du nas rgyal po de dag gi ming chags shing rgyal rabs thog mar/
68a3(rgyud): byung ba na/ tshe rabs bdud du rgyal po byed par gyur cig/ grong khyer dngar ldan zhes bgyi ba'ang bgyi'o// bal po se'u tshal du ni sangs rgyas kyi mchod rten chen po bgyi'o// yul rta mjug tu ni
68a4(rgyud): chos dang ldan pa'i rgyal po'i mchod rten bgyi'o// 'gum ti rar ni dge 'dun gyi kun dga' ra ba chen po bgyi'o// mu rba ba nar yang dge 'dun gyi kun dga' ra ba chen po bgyi'o// pa ya di kar ni dri
68a5(rgyud): gtsang khang chen po dang mchod rten chen po bgyi ste/ ji srid du bdag rgyal srid la gnas pa de srid du las chen po dag bgyi'o// gang gi tshe rgyal po las shi 'phos par 'gyur ba na'ang / byang chub
68a6(rgyud): sems dpa' byams pa gang na bzhugs pa'i lha'i nang du skye bar 'gyur te/ bdag de nas mchis pa'i tshe ting nge 'dzin rnams dran par gyur cig/ de nas slar yang li yul 'dir skye ba len cing //
68a7(rgyud): ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa bzhin du bud med kyi gzugs su gyur te/ skar rdo'i rgyal po'i bu mo rab nges zhes bya bar gyur nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis/
68b1(rgyud): gzungs sngags ji snyed gsungs pa dang / bdag gis rtogs pa gang lags pa'i gzungs sngags de dag thams cad de'i tshe bdag gis dran par gyur cig/ mdo sde 'di'ang shin tu dran par
68b2(rgyud): gyur te/ ci nas thams cad rgyas par gyur cig/ gang gi tshe dmag sde gnyis 'thab par 'gyur ba dang / li yul gyi dor gyi phyir las su bya ba yod par gyur pa dang / gang gi tshe gzhon du rdo rje
68b3(rgyud): sde skar rdo'i rgyal po rnam par rgyal ba'i go cha zhes bya bar gyur nas/ li yul gyi phyir glung 'jal ba'i dus la bab pa de'i tshe/ bdag rab nges zhes bya bar gyur pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de
68b4(rgyud): ngag thams cad dang / 'khor de'i nang du ji snyed 'dus par gyur pa'i lha de dag thams cad grogs su gyur te/ mdo 'di dang gzungs sngags rnams bshad pa'i gzungs sngags de dag thams cad dang /
68b5(rgyud): ting nge 'dzin thams cad bdag gis tshe rabs thams cad du dran par gyur cig byas so// gang gi tshe lha mo dri ma med pa'i 'od kyis tshig de dag ces smras pa de'i tshe des ting nge 'dzin rnams thob ste/
68b6(rgyud): ci nas mdo 'di las sus kyang gnod pa byed mi rus par 'gyur ba'i ting nge 'dzin theg pa chen po'i mdo dam pa'i chos pad+ma dkar po'i glong 'khyil pa zhes bya ba thob ste/ de'i tshe sangs rgyas thams
68b7(rgyud): cad kyis legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// gang gi tshe khyod las rtsom pa de'i tshe 'od zer de dag steng du gnas par gyur te/ de'i tshe gang gis mdo 'di dran par gyur
69a1(rgyud): zhing shin tu nyams su len par 'gyur ba'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas yid la byed pa zhes bya ba rtogs par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis rdo rje/
69a2(rgyud): dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba'i gzungs sngags gsungs pa de'i rang bzhin gang gis gzungs sngags rtogs par 'gyur ba dang / ting nge 'dzin skyong ba dang / sngon sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la
69a3(rgyud): chos thos pa de dag thams cad kyang dran par byed do// lha mo dri ma med pa'i 'od des kyang byang chub sems dpa' dag gis ting nge 'dzin dang gzungs sngags ji ltar rtogs pa de de bzhin du rtogs par
69a4(rgyud): byed do// rnam par rgyal ba'i go chas kyang rgyal srid thob par 'gyur te/ gzhan gyis bar chad byed mi nus so// de dag gi las ni lan bdun bzlas brjod byas la/ rta gnas kyi rigs sngags
69a5(rgyud): gang gis sdig pa rnams 'byung bar 'gyur bar yang brjod par bya ste/ nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum brjod da/ lo bdun gyis rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi gzungs sngags rtogs par 'gyur
69a6(rgyud): ro/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi gzungs sngags 'di bshad pa de'i tshe/ bcom ldan 'das kyis steng du lha rnams kyis lha'i me tog gi char phab ste/ lha'i rol
69a7(rgyud): mo'i snga bsgrags nas 'di skad ces smras so// bdag gis kyang sngon sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams las thos pa'i gzungs sngags rnams stsal bar bgyi'o// na ma sarba a t+yu dag
69b1(rgyud): badz+ra maN+Da lo ta ma s+ya/ ta thA ga ta s+ya/ kang+ku b+hi/ satwa s+ya/ bo d+hi satwa s+ya/ tad+ya thA/ bud+d+ha sa t+ye na/ da sa pi ri/ de na ha ya ri/ ku tsi ru pra ti/ pa da ri ba b+hI ba tu/ tsi tu/
69b2(rgyud): ma tug la ra ya ka dam ba tu/ sa pa dza ma sa re ta swA hA/ gzungs sngags 'di ni lha rnams chad pas gcod pa'i gzungs sngags zhes bya ste/ lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bu la/ rtswa dUr ba/
69b3(rgyud): brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg byas na gang ci byed kyang rung ste/ lha rnams kyis gzhig par mi nus so// dkyil 'khor zlum por byas te/ lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas la mdud pa
69b4(rgyud): brgya rtsa brgyad bor nas gang du brjod pa der 'byung pos gnod par byed mi nus so// byad snyems byed par yang mi nus so// de nas de'i tshe 'khor de dag thams cad kyis gzungs sngags/
69b5(rgyud): 'di bshad do// tad+ya thA/ sarba de bA nAd/ sarba parba na ni rdzi ta brdzi te/ skan da na tsa pa na/ na ta ma na pa nA ga sar/ dad tsa tsa pa ba/ tsad mi ma/ b+has+thi mi daN+Da ka ra Na ha ra/ su bar/
69b6(rgyud): de ba mar swAhA/ sa ba pa/ paR+Sha ka ra Na sAhA/ 'khor thams cad kyis bshad pa'i gzungs sngags 'di lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas te/ mdud pa brgya rtsa brgyad byas nas srung par
69b7(rgyud): bsregs na khyimi der byang sems kyis mi tshugs la/ 'byung ba'i nang rnams kyang med par 'gyur ro// tad+ya thA/ ra ti thA ka ra/ de ba ba ra pu dzaM dzi ra~M phu ku dza~M tibu swA hAgazungs sngags
70a1(rgyud): bya'adi lkog ma na ba la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas nas/ gsagangang du nga du lo ga mag par bya'o/ ma/ su ngas pi gas par mangs u/ gzung su dus 'anang drung ba dpa 'a na dud dras rjod byas nas srungs/
70a2(rgyud): lamadung bdun bdun por te sa so// de nas de'i tshe 'khor de dag zas cad kyis pus mo'i lgangs la btsug de 'di skad ces gsol ro// gang gi che gzhon nu rdo rje sde yulagar rngo nas li yul du mchi de'i tshe/ gzus sngagragang gis shul du ba 'do'i las byed par 'gyur ba'i gzungs
70a3(rgyud): sngags bdag cag gis stsal bar 'tshal lo// tad+ya thA/ bu bu de de bi bi sa sa/ ban+d+ha pa ba ti/ ba pa ra ti ka ra swA hA/ tad+ya thA sha ra ka ra bA dzad tsha ba ra/ shad tra tra ka na dzi/
70a4(rgyud): swAhA gzungs sngags 'di 'gron du 'gro ba rnams kyis lan bdun bzlas brjod byas te/ khrus byas la lags par blugs nas lan bdun bzlas brjod byas te phyogs bzhir 'thor ram/
70a5(rgyud): bdag nyid kyis 'thungs na/ de la dgras gnod pa byed par mi nus te/ dpa' bo'i las kyang byed par 'gyur ro// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyis 'di skad ces bka'/
70a6(rgyud): stsal te/ de bzhin du rnams thos kyi bu dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / kun tu rgyal dang / 'phrog ma bu dang bcas pa rnams kyis kyang 'di skad ces smras so// bdag cag gis kyang
70a7(rgyud): gzhon nu rdo rje sde de la ci nas dgra rnams gnod pa byed mi nus par gzungs sngags 'di dag sbyin no// na mo badz+ra d+h+wa dza s+ya/ ta thA ga ta s+ya/ tad+ya thA/ badz+ra bi bi bi bi ma ma sa ka/ su ma
70b1(rgyud): adad+ha re/ ad \u0f7fre/ a dz+wa le ga pA d+ha ni sarba/ na mo mahe ga ra s+ya/ na mo bai shA ma Na s+ya/ nam sany+tsa la s+ya/ na mo ha ri ti ye bas pu d+ha/ pa ri ba ra ya/ tad+ya thA ka sa sa sa sa/
70b2(rgyud): hA ha hA hA/ pri ya pri ya pri ya pri ya/ pu tra pu tra pu tre/ ba ra dat+ta ka ra/ tsi mU le bid te shan kar swAH/ dbang phyug chen po dang / rnam thos kyi bu dang / kun tu rgyal ba dang / 'phrog
70b3(rgyud): mi bri dang bcas pa rnams kyis gzugs sngags 'di bshad nas 'di skad ces gsol to// ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag sug las chen por bskos pa'i gzungs sngags gzhan/
70b4(rgyud): gyis mi tshugs pa de dag kyang bdag cag gis bshad par 'tshal lo// lha mo dri ma med pa'i 'od de dang / gzhon nu rdo rje sde skar rdo'i rgyal po rnam par rgyal ba'i go char 'gyur ba gang lags pa des/
70b5(rgyud): chad pas gcad par bgyi ba de'ang bdag cag gis bshad par bgyi'o// gang gi tshe dgra 'am/ su'ang rung ba dag sdig pa'i las rtsom pa na/ gzungs sngags bshad pa 'di gnyis lan
70b6(rgyud): bdun bzlas brjod byas te/ skud pa sngon po la mdud pa bdun bor nas bsregs te/ sra rtsi pog gi bdug pas bsregs la/ mi de'i ming nas brjod na gnod pa byed mi nus so// bdag cag
70b7(rgyud): gi sa yi dam dang por bcas pa bzhin du ste/ gzhon nu rdo rje sde dang / lha mo dri ma med pa'i 'od kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par ma bgyis na/ dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas
71a1(rgyud): / bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi sku bslus par gyur cig ces byas so// de nas 'khor der ji snyed 'dus pa'i lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang /
71a2(rgyud): nam mkha' lding dang / dri za dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang 'di skad ces gsol to// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis
71a3(rgyud): ji ltar dam bcas pa bzhin du/ bdag cag thams cad kyis kyang dam bcas te de ltar ma bgyis na/ bdag cag gis dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi sku bslus par gyur
71a4(rgyud): cig bdag cag thams cad kyis rnam par rgyal ba'i go cha ci nas kyang / li yul gyi rgyal por 'gyur ba thams cad sems mthun pas lhan cig tu dbang bskur bar bgyi'o// gang gi tshe gdod
71a5(rgyud): dmar dang rgya 'thab par 'gyur ba de'i tshe/ ci nas li yul 'jig par mi 'gyur ba dang / gang gi tshe yul gzhan nas li yul du rab tu byung ba rnams 'ongs pa na/ der ci nas rim gro byed par mi
71a6(rgyud): 'gyur ba dang / yul gzhan nas der sems can thos pa de dag der gnas 'thob par 'gyur zhing / gdong dmar gyis bsregs pa gang yin pa'i mchod rten chen po de dag dang / dge 'dun gyi
71a7(rgyud): kun dga' rab de dag 'chos pa'i grogs byed par 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir li yul gyi glung 'jal ba dang / rgya dang phan tshun du bag ma gtong ba dang len par byed do// de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldaran
71b1(rgyud): 'das kyis de'i tshe lha po dri ba med pa'i 'od dang / gzhon nu rdo rje sde gnyis la li yul gtad nas/ de'i tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ gzhor nu rdo rje sde la 'di skad ces bka'
71b2(rgyud): stsal to// khyod la yul gyi rgyal po byed pa dang / lha mo dri ma med pa'i 'od kyis grogs byed par 'gyur gyis/ mdo 'di las ji skad bshad pa bzhin du khyod kyis thams cad kyis shig
71b3(rgyud): gang gi tshe khyod gser gyi rigs kyi yul du phyir log pa de'i tshe/ rgya'i dmag li yul du 'ongs so zhes de skad du thos pa dang the tshom ma byed par li yul du song la der pho nya ba btang na/ der 'ong
71b4(rgyud): bar mi 'gyur te/ li yul dang gu zar gyi yul du 'gro bar 'gyur ro// de la spring yig ni nga dang gnyen du byis la/ yul nga la byin cig ces spring shig/ de nas de'i tshe khyod ni li yul gyi
71b5(rgyud): rgyal por 'gyur ro// dbang po'i go cha ri skar rdo'i rgyal po byed par 'gyur te/ de'ang khyod ci nas li yul gyi rgyal por 'gyur ba'i grogs byed par 'gyur ro// skar rdo'i yul du gnod pa
71b6(rgyud): 'byung ba de'i tshe/ khyod kyis ci nas kyang gnod pa byed du ma zhugs cig/ dbang po'i go cha dang yang thog mar 'dum par gyis shig/ las 'di dag byed pa'i grogs su 'gyur ro// skar rdog/
71b7(rgyud): ji snyed yod pa thams cad kyang grogs byed par 'gyur ro// a ku na zhes bya ba dpa' bo zhig yod de/ de sdod ye shes grags pa zhes bya bar gyur pa na/ des dar ba tir zhes bya ba'i
72a1(rgyud): gtsug lag khang byas so// de nas khyod kyis a kun tshol cig dang / yul gzung ba'i phyir grogs byed par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de dang khyod sngon slo/
72a2(rgyud): lam lhan cig tu btab pa'i phyir te/ a ku nu zhes bya ba'i mi de ni sngon rgyal por gyur te/ mi rgod rnams kyis chung ma brkus te phyir ma rnyed pa yin no// khyod ni rgyal po de'i blon po chen po yin te/
72a3(rgyud): dge byed kyi bar gyur pa yin no// de nas de'i tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ gzhon nu rdo rje sde la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// gzhor du rdo rje sde khyod ni li yul 'khor du rnam par rgyal
72a4(rgyud): ba'i go cha zhes bya ba'i rgyal por gyur te/ lo sum cu'i bar du rgyal srid 'dzin par 'gyur la/ dge bsnyen du gyur nas li yul gyi phyir lus yongs su gtong zhing 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ro//
72a5(rgyud): de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis/ lha mo dri ma med pa'i 'od la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// khyod li yul du rab nges zhes bya bar gyur pa'i tshe mdo 'di zung zhig/ 'di la 'jug par gyis
72a6(rgyud): shig rgyas par gyis shig/ skar rdo'i yul du'ang ming po la srul cig dang / khyod kyi steng du 'od zer rnams gnas par 'gyur ro// gang gi tshe khyod kyis gzungs sngags rnams rtogs par
72a7(rgyud): gyur pa de'i tshe khyod la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyid gsungs par 'gyur zhing / lha rnams kyang ci nas khyod kyi las byed nus par 'gyur ba de lta bu rgyas par smra bar 'gyur ro// de nas de'i
72b1(rgyud): tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// du sdug ji ltar bcom ldan 'das rin cher snying po grong khyer du gshegs/
72b2(rgyud): pa'i tshe 'o bu cag gnyis sangs rgyas nyid du lung bstan pa thob nas/ der de skad du phyogs bcu na sems can 'jigs shing skrag pa ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad bdag gis skyabs byed par gyur cig/
72b3(rgyud): de skad ces smon lam btab pa'i dus de drad par gyis la/ da nga'i li yul 'di dang / lha po dri ma med pa'i 'od dang / gzhor nu rdo rje sde gtad pa 'di khyod kyis long zhig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/
72b4(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po dang / 'jam dpal dang / nam mkha'i snying po dang / mthu cher thob dang / sman gyi rgyal po dang / rab sbyin dbang po dang / sa'i snying po dang / byams pa dang /
72b5(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sngon 'di'i bu nu bo dang / grogs su gyur pa dang / rtag tu 'grogs 'grogs pa ni 'di dag yin te/ sna tshogs
72b6(rgyud): kyi lha dang / dbang phyug gi lha dang / ldor shing gi dbang phyug rgyal po dang / snying rje'i dbang phyug dang / gzugs kyi dbang phyug dang / spong ba'i dbang phyug dang / 'od kyi dbang phyug dang / dri'i dbang
72b7(rgyud): phrug dang / tshogs kyi dbang phyug dang / 'jig rten gyi dbang phyug dang / 'od gsal dang / rigs kyi dbang phyug rnams so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la
73a1(rgyud): sasogs pa byung du ba sems dpa'adredag thams cad la thos te 'di sa ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu ngas pyod kyis nga'i theg pa ched pa'i mdo' di dang / gzhon nurdzo/
73a2(rgyud): rje rje dang / wa po ma med pa'i 'od yongs su zung zhing / deras gsang ba nga'i bdag po lagan rdo rjel bos te 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// khyod dag tu nga'i phyi bzhin du 'brang ba yin gyis
73a3(rgyud): mdo 'di dang / gdon du rdo rje sde dang / lha mo dri ma med pa'i 'od khyod gtad do// gnod sbyin dbang po rnam thos kyi bu dang / gnod sbyin kun tu rgyal dang / khwa'i bu blo gros brtan pa dang / klu'i rgyal
73a4(rgyud): po ma dros pa dang / 'phrog ma bu dang bcas pa dang / lha'i pho brang sum du rtsa gnyis kyi lha'i rgyal po rnams dang / 'khor der 'dus pa thams cad dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od zer gtong
73a5(rgyud): ba de dag dang / phyogs bcu nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad la mdo 'di dang / li yul dang / gzhon nu rdo rje sde dang / lha mo dri ma med pa'i 'od gtad de/ yongs su
73a6(rgyud): gtad pa'i dam pas yongs su gtad do// de nas yang de dag thams cad la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// ngas ji skad bshad pa dang / khyed kyis ji ltar dam bcas pa bzhin du grogs bgyis
73a7(rgyud): la ngas dgongs pa kun thams cad nas thams cad du mthar phyin par bgyis la/ ci nas log par mi 'gyur ba de ltar gyis shig/ ngas bskal pa mang por 'khor ba na dka' ba'i las shin tu mang po/
73b1(rgyud): don dang ldan pa dag byas pa lta bu ni/ byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dag gis kyang ma byas so// nga'i li yul 'khor der sems can sa yos su smin par ma byas pa de gang yin pa de dag phyis li yul 'khor du/
73b2(rgyud): gnas par gyur te/ nga'i chos kyi yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bos te 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// ljod
73b3(rgyud): thams cad la mdo 'di dang / li yul dang / gzhon nu rdo rje sde dang / lha mo dri ma med pa'i 'od gtad ngo // gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas thams cad dang / byang chub sem/
73b4(rgyud): dpa' thams cad dang / lha thams cad dang / 'khor thams cad la mdo 'di dang / li yul dang / gzhon nu rdo rje sde dang / lha mo dri ma med pa'i 'od gtad pa de'i tshe/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
73b5(rgyud): 'das shAkya thub pa'i steng du lnga'i me tog gi char bab bo// lha rnams kyis lnga'i rol mo'i sgra sgrags so// lha'i rgyan gyi char yang bab bo// de bzhin du 'khor de dag thams cad kyis kyang bcom
73b6(rgyud): ldan 'das la ji ltar 'os pa'i mchod pas bcom ldan 'das la mchod par byas so// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis kyang mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir 'od zer shin tu mang po
73b7(rgyud): btang ngo // mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na gnas pa'i sems can rnams kyis kyang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa mthong ngo // de na
74a1(rgyud): gnas pa rnams kyis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa 'khor dang bcas pa dang mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams mthong ste/ 'khor thams cad dang / lha dang /
74a2(rgyud): mi rnams gcig gis gcig mthong bar 'gyur to// de nas de'i tshe dge slong kun dga' bo stan las langs te thal mo sbyar nas/ bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das ma 'ongs pa'i dus na
74a3(rgyud): su la la mdo 'di klog pa dang / sems pa dang / nyan pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / 'dri ba dang / 'drir 'jug pa de'i bsod nams kyi phung po ji tsam du 'phel bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan
74a4(rgyud): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgyad khri bzhi stong gi nang na skye bo ji snyed gnas pa rnams la sbyin pa byin pa bas ri/ su mdo 'di 'chang ba 'am/ kha ton du byed pa 'am/ klog pa de'i
74a5(rgyud): bsod nams kyi phung po ches mang bar 'gyur ro// mdor na ji ltar 'bras bu sum pa rtogs pa de'i bsod nams kyi phung po ji snyed 'phel bar 'gyur ro zhes nga smra'o// de nas lha dang / klu dang
74a6(rgyud): gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha'i lding dang / dri za dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / srin po dang / 'khor de dag thams cad kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bdag
74a7(rgyud): cag 'khor 'dir 'dus pa ji snyed mchis pa rnams gang mdo 'di brjod pa der ma mchis sam/ gnor nu rdo rje sde dang / lha mo dri ma med pa'i 'od la gzungs sngags ma su la tam/ dam bcas pa 'di
74b1(rgyud): bskyed par gyur na/ bdag cag gis dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sku bslus par gyur cig/ mtsham sa ma mchis pa'i las bgyis pa'i sdig pa ji tsam
74b2(rgyud): mchis pa bdag cag gis bgyis par gyur cig/ de nas 'od zer de dag las rig sung na sad ces 'byung ste/ gang na mdo 'di brjod pa der bdag cag 'ong ngo zhes snga grags par gyur to// de nas kun
74b3(rgyud): dga' bo dang 'khor de dag thams cad kyis zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/ ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/ bka' stsal pa/ mdo sde 'di'i ming ni chos kyi spyi bo zhes kyang bya/
74b4(rgyud): sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi snying po zhes kyang bya/ dri ma med pa'i 'od kyis zhus pa zhes kyang bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// ngas chos gang bshad
74b5(rgyud): pa de dag thams cad mdo 'di nyid kyi nang du 'dus so// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo dang / 'khor de dag thams
74b6(rgyud): cad dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// theg pa chen po'i mdo dri ma med pa'i 'od kyis zhus pa
74b7(rgyud): zhes bya ba rdzogs so// / lha mo dri ma med pa'i 'od kyis zhus pa'i mdo 'di shin tu dag par yod pas yid ches kyi gnas so// gzhan 'khrugs chad yongs pa mang bar snang ste/
75a1(rgyud): glegs pam mang du bltas so// @rgya gar skad du/ Abyas ba lo ki te shwa rA ha la gri bad+hAr Ni/ bod spyad du
75a2(rgyud): 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ha ya grI ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// na mo rat+na tra lA ya/ na me Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwar
75a3(rgyud): yaHbo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwa ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ sarba satwe b+h+yaHsa nA ga ti na/ na maHsar+b+ba satwe b+h+yaHsa na a ba ha ri Ni/ na maHsar+b+ba satwa b+ha ya~Mt+tA ra NA ya/ ni maHsar+b+ba b+ha ba prA sham
75a4(rgyud): na ka rA ya/ na maHsar+b+ba satwa bo d+hi tsi ki ta sa na ka rA ya/ na maHsar+b+ba ban+d+ha na/ ts+tshed na ka rA ya/ na maHsar+b+be duHkha pra mo k+Sha Na ka rA ya/ na maHsar+b+ba an+ta ka rA bi d+ha ma na ka rA ya/ na maHsar+b+ba bid+yA
75a5(rgyud): rA dza ba sha drAp+ta ya/ ma hA yo gA/ yo gI shwa rA ya/ ta s+ya na maHkr-i tA i da na Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa ra mu kho gIr+t+r-i r-i Shi bidi da dI de ba nA ga/ yak+Sha rak+Sha sa/ shakra brah+ma/ lo ka pA la/ biSh+Nu ma hau
75a6(rgyud): shwa ra nA ra yaN/ san+ta ku be ra/ a su rin+d+rA/ mA tri ga Na/ na maHkri tin/ badz+ra khu ra sa hi yaM/ ha ya grI ba brah+ma/ pa ra ma hri da ya/ mA brta yai Sh+ya mi/ a ba pra ma yAHsA d+ha ka na/ a ba h+yan/
75a7(rgyud): sar+b+ba b+hU tA naM/ sar+b+ba big+h+nAM bi nA ya kaM/ a mo g+haM/ sar+b+ba karma NaM/ bi shA nany+dza/ bi nA ya kaM/ tad+ya thA/ oM ta ru la ta ru la/ bi ta ru la bi ta ru la/ sar+b+ba bi Sha g+hA ta ka/ sar+b+ba b+hU ta bi dra ba ka dz+wa li ta/
75b1(rgyud): an la/ bi sU li ga/ an+ta has/ ke sa ra/ a to ba/ bra bi ta ka yaM badz+ra/ khu ra nin tIt+ta/ tsa li ta bA su d+hA tA la/ badz+rod shA si ta/ ha si ta mA ru tok+Sha ti/ pra sha ma na ka ra ba ra puH
75b2(rgyud): big+h+nAn+ta/ saM bAk+Sha Na ka ra/ swa bid d+ho pa de sha ka ra/ pa ra ma shAn+ti ka ra/ bud+d+ha bud+d+ha/ bo d+ha ya mi te/ b+ha ga bAnA ha ya grI ba/ sar+b+ba bi d+yA hr-i da ya/ mu brta yi Sh+yA mi/ khA ra khA da/ ma hA ro dra/ man+t+rin/
75b3(rgyud): rak+Sha rek+Sha/ a ma swa hi tAn/ man tran/ sid+d+ha sid+d+ha/ sar+b+ba karme Sha me/ said+d+he/ de hi de hi/ A bi sha A bi sha/ prA bi sha pra bi sha/ sarba gra he ShA/ a pra ti ha ta/ d+hu na d+hu na/ bi d+hu na bi d+hu
75b4(rgyud): nam thi ma tha/ pra ma tha pre mtha/ sar+b+ba ba ro pa gram/ kri t+ya ka 'a dze/ dur laM gi ta/ mu sha la/ bi shwe ka ra/ bi sha daMSh+Ta bi sha tsUN+Da yo a bi tsa ri pa sha ka ra Na/ sid+d+ha any+dzan/ tsak+Shur mo
75b5(rgyud): han/ tsit+tA bAka she pa na ka ra/ ni t+ya/ a ba ra prek+ShaN/ tra sa ya tra sa ya/ ma hA bo d+hi satwA/ r-id d+ha d+hiSh+Tha ne na/ sar+b+ba b+ha yi b+h+yaHsatwa~M nAM rak+Sha rak+Sha/ ma ma dud+ha/ d+harma saM g+ha/ a nu dz+nyAH
75b6(rgyud): me karba/ shI g+h+raM ku ru ku ru dzaT/ ha ya b+hI ba phaT/ badz+ra khu rA ye phaT/ badz+ra daMSh+To ti ka Ta Sh+NI ra bA ya phaT/ pa ra man+ta/ sha ma ka ru ya phaT/ ba ra duSh+Ta bin+dan/ baM b+hak+Sha Na ka rA ya phaT/ sar+b+ba pra
75b7(rgyud): ho ta sA da na ka rA ya phaT/ sar+b+ba b+h+ra he Shu e pra ti ha tA ya phaT/ paT la mu khA ya phaT/ ye ge tsita/ ma ma a hi te shi na/ ka ye kra min+ti/ man+ta lar+tha/ ya man+ti/ dza ba yan+ti/ dzu hran+ti/ kA Sho
76a1(rgyud): kurban+ti/ sarba nA b+ha mu khe na ba kr-i tA ya phaT/ na maHsar+b+ba duSh+Ta gra hota sA ra nA ya/ ha ya grI bA ya/ sid d+hA nA man+t+ra ba daHswAhA/ oM a mri tor d+hA bA ya hUM phaT phaT swAhA/
76a2(rgyud): oM na mo ha yA ya swA hA/ oM na mo bi shwa mA dzA le swAH/ na maHsar+b+ba satwa naM/ sid d+hAn+t+ra/ man+t+ra pa dA ya swAhA/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ha ya gri ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//
76a3(rgyud): rgya gar skad du/ ar+ya bi dzi ya ba ti nA ma pra t+yaM gau rA/ bod skad du/ phyir bzlog pa 'phags pa rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya'o// sangs rgyas
76a4(rgyud): dang byang chub sems dpa' 'gro ba thams cad srung ba la mngon par brtson pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// sgrub pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// rigs sngags 'chang thams cad la
76a5(rgyud): phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo// chos la phyag 'tshal lo// dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying po chen po dang
76a6(rgyud): ldan pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo// de rnams la phyag 'tshal nas phyir bzlog pa rnam par rgyal ba cad zhes bya ba gshed byed dang byang sel ba/ ro langs
76a7(rgyud): dang bkra mi shis pa rab tu zhi bar byed pa/ rgyal po'i 'jigs dang / chom rkun gyi 'jigs pa dang / me'i 'jigs pa dang / chu'i 'jigs pa dang / mkha' 'gro ma'i 'jigs pa/
76b1(rgyud): dang yi dgas dang / ga za dang / grul bum gyi 'jigs pa dang / grib gnon gyi 'jigs pa dang / brjed byed kyi 'jigs pa dang / srul po'i 'jigs pa dang / lus srul po'i
76b2(rgyud): 'jigs pa dang / lam log pa dang lam du zhugs pa'i 'jigs pa dang / nyin mo dang mtshan mo'i 'gro ba so so'i 'jigs pa rmugs par byed pa/ rengs par byed pa/ rmongs par byed pa/
76b3(rgyud): mdog bzang por byed pa/ spro ba yang dag par 'phel bar byed pa/ dgra thams cad zlog pa/ bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa/ sdig pa thams cad yang dag par
76b4(rgyud): byang bar byed pa/ kha rmugs par byed pa/ kha rengs par byed pa/ bzhin mdzes par byed pa brjod par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa 'phags
76b5(rgyud): pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo// gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag 'grub par gyur cig/ tad+ya tha/ oM d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+ha ra d+ha ra ga d+ha ra d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/

76b7(rgyud): gsol/ tad+ya thA/ sa re sa ra/ sa ra sa ra/ sa ra sa ra/ sar/ si ri si ri/ si ri si ri si ri/ si ri si ri/ si ri/ su ru su ru/ su ru su ru su ru su ru/ su ru/ ma ra mar

77a5(rgyud): par 'dong pa dang / rnam par sdang ba dang / gnod par sems pa dang / sdang bar byed pa dang / sbyin sreg byed pa dang / byed du 'jug pa dang / byas pa la rjes su yi rang ba de dag thams cad
77a6(rgyud): nyid la slar song zhig swA hA/ mi mdza' ba thams cad kyi mig bcing ngo // rna ba bcing ngo // sna bcing ngo // lce bcing ngo // lus bcing ngo // yid bcing ngo // yan lag bcing ngo //
77a7(rgyud): ting lag thams cad bcing ngo // sUT sUT/ sUT/ s+pho Ta ya/ s+pho Ta ya/ s+pho Ta ya/ gshed byed dang byad thams cad rnam par gsal du gsol/ rnam par gzhom du gsol/ rnam par
77b1(rgyud): zhig tu gsol/ sarba sha tru// tu ru tu ru/ tu ru tu ru/ tu ru tu ru/ shU ru/ swAhA/ bdag 'jigs pa dang / gnod pa thams cad dang / gshed byed dang / byad dang / ro langs dang /

77b3(rgyud): ku ru ku ru swA hA/ d+hu ru d+hu ru sA hA/ dU ru dru ru d+ha ru sAH/ mi gang dag gnod par 'dod la phan par mi 'dod cing / bdag la lta ba thams cad rmugs par bgyi'o// rengs par bgyi'o// 'khrul bar

78a1(rgyud): gnod pa dang / nad 'gro ba dang / 'khrug pa thams cad dang / gshed byed dang / byang thams cad dang / nad thams cad dang / gdon thams cad dang / sdig pa #/

78a3(rgyud): pa 'di// gang gi mgul du 'di btags pa// de ni rgyal 'gyur the tshom med// sdig pa rmi lam bkra mi shis// rgyal po me dang chom rkun dgra// de dag rnams kyis de mi tshugs// gang gi
78a4(rgyud): mgul du 'di btags pa// de ni chu yis khyer mi 'gyur// sdig pa yang dag 'byang bar 'gyur// dge ba rnams ni rtag tu 'phel// nad med pa yang 'thob par 'gyur// phyir bzlog pa
78a5(rgyud): 'phags pa rnam par rgyal ba can zhes bya ba rdzogs so// // 'phags pa par+Na sha ba ri'i mdo// dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo//
78a6(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
78a7(rgyud): dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu chen thob la phyag 'tshal lo// bA ma na tAM na ma sh+tsa mi tA na ma s+ya mi bA ma ne b+ha ga ba ti pi shA tsi/ par+t+ta sha ba ri/
78b1(rgyud): pi sha tsi pA sha pa ra shud+d+ha ri Ni/ ya ni ka ni tsing d+ha yA pa d+ya ste/ ye ke na hr-i u pa dra bAHye ke tsing u pA yA sA/ ye ke tsing a d+ha At+ti kA b+ha ya/ ye ke tsing u pa yar+m+ma u pa saHsaM bad+hU bA
78b2(rgyud): uta pa d+yat+te/ sarba di te ni/ sarba sta/ sarbe te bA/ e bod par+yan+te ra par+t+ti ta taHtad na na sa t+ya pa tsa na sa t+ya bAk+ke naH/ tad+ya thA/ oM dza dzaHdzaHdzaHe b+hi ShaHbar+t+ti ta a d+hiSh+Thi te ra man+ta paM tir
78b3(rgyud): ma ma sarba satwA nany+tsa/ rak+ShaM ku ru pa ri tra naM ku ru/ pa ri gra hUM ku ru/ pa ri pA la naM ku ru/ shAn+tiM ku ru swa s+yA ya na~M ku ru/ daN+Da pa ri hA raM ku ru/ shas+dza pa ri hA raM ku ru/ yA bad ba'i d+hu Sha NaM ku ru/
78b4(rgyud): ag+ni pa ri hA ri ku ru/ ud ka pa ri hA raM ku ru/ ka kho rda tshwa da ni ku ru/ sI mAM baM d+haM ku ru/ d+hA ra Na ban+d+ha ku ru/ tad+ya thA/ a mi te a mi te/ e mi tod b+ha be/ a mi ta saM b+ha be/ a sAs+t+wa~M/
78b5(rgyud): a sa staM ge/ mA ma ra mA ma rA/ mu sa ra mA sa ra/ sha ma pra sha ma/ u pa sa ma sarba byad+d+hi/ nu pyA sa ma sar+b+ba a ka lA mri t+yA/ nu pa sa ma sarba nak+Sha tra gra ha do// Sha nu pa sa ma/ sar+b+ba dr-iSh+NI/
78b6(rgyud): tso sa b+ha ga ba ti/ par+Na sha ba ri/ t+yu na dz+yA na/ bi t+yaM na bi t+yA na/ tu Na tu Na tu mu le swA hA/ i gau ri gan+d+ha ri tsi ri tsan+da li/ mA taM gi puk+ka si sA hA/ na maHsarba sha pa rA NAM/ b+ha ga ba ti pi shA/
78b7(rgyud): tsi par+N+Na sha ba swA hA/ oM pi shA tsi par+N+Na sha ba ri hriHdzaHhUM phaT pi shA tsi swA hA/ oM aM ku re/ mAM ku re/ ku ra ra par+N+Na sha bi ri swA hA/ gnag nad la srad bu byas te/ brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas shing mdung pa/
79a1(rgyud): brgya rtsa brgyad du mdud de/ sngags kyi snying po bris pa'i snong dang bcas pas bzlas pa tshul bzhin du byas la/ de'i rjes la nad pa 'am/ rta dang ba lang la sogs pa/
79a2(rgyud): la spos chus bkrus nas khyu mchog kyang bkrus te/ de'i mgo la bcings na zhi bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin du ma he dang ra lugs rnams la gnod pa byung ba la'ang lhas su bri bar bya'o// bum pa chu gtsang
79a3(rgyud): mas bkang ste brgya rtsa brgyad du bsngags nas bkrus na zhi bar 'gyur ro// snga dro phyugs kyi lhas su song la dri dang me tog gi gtor ma byas te/ bum pa gsar pa ma spyad pa chus bkang la brgya rtsa
79a4(rgyud): brgyad du bsngags te/ phyugs lhas kyi sgor rta babs gzugs shing / rta babs de la chu shing gi lo ma la rig pa gi'u wang gis bris te rta babs kyi khar gdags so// de nas phyugs thams
79a5(rgyud): cad zas la song ba rta babs kyi sgo de nas gzung ngo // gzhan yang bum pa bzhi chus bkang ste brgya rtsa brgyad du bsngags nas mi bzhis chus gtor na phyugs nad med par 'gyur ro// de bzhin
79a6(rgyud): du zhag bdun du byas na nad thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro// mi nad dang phyugs nad la gro ga la bris te mchod pa byas nas rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la gdags so// stag gi 'jigs pa la dril bu
79a7(rgyud): la bzlas nas dkrol bar bya'o// chu srin gyi 'jigs pa la mnga' dang pha gu la bsngags na sbrul dang / byi ba dang / sdig pa la sogs pa rnams kyang kha bcings par 'gyur ro// g.yul ngor
79b1(rgyud): thal ba la bsngags te spyi bo dang mgul du blugs na mtshon cha zlog par byed do// srud pa la lan brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas pas nad pa'i khri la bcing ngo // bum pa la brgya rtsa brgyad du bsngags
79b2(rgyud): pas khrus bya'o// lag pa'i skud pa la bzlas nas bcing ngo // de nas bde bar 'gyur ro// yul bskor te dril bu dang / rnga dang / dung la bzlas pa byas na bgegs thams cad 'byer te
79b3(rgyud): gnod pa'ang zhi bar 'gyur ro// skyes bu dpa' bo'i dpral bar rigs pa'i mdongs bzhag la mtshon cha bskur na dgra 'am g.yul zhi bar 'gyur ro// 'phags pa par+N+Na sha ba ri'i mdo rdzogs
79b4(rgyud): so// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya par+d+ha sha ba ri nA ma d+hA ra Ni/ bod skad du/ 'phags ma ri khrod lo ma gyon ma zhes bya ba'i gzungs//
79b5(rgyud): 'phags ma ri khrong lo ma gyon ma la phyag 'tshal lo// dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od
79b6(rgyud): dpag tu med pa la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa'
79b7(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po mthu chen po thob pa la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das ma mi'u thung sha za mo ri khrod lo ma gyon ma dgra sta dang zhags pa 'dzin ma khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// 'jigs pa gang
80a1(rgyud): dag byung ba ma ma / sa kyi ga ba nga/ 'a bye ga hA/ ga
80a2(rgyud): gnod pa gang dag ci rang rung ba dang / 'jug pa gang dag ci'ang rung ba dang / long dug nang pa gang dag ci 'ang drung ba dang / gang dag ci byung ba de dag thams cad ni byis pa khon la byung na
80a3(rgyud): mkhas pa la ni ma yin no// bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig dang / bden pa'i ngag gis song zhig/ rengs shig/ mkhas pas byin gyis brlabs pa'i gsang sngags kyi gni 'di dag gis

80a7(rgyud): ta saM b+ha be/ A shwa ste/ A shwa sta~M ge/ mA ma ra mA ma ra/ mA sa ra mA sa ra/ zhi bar mdzod/ nad thams cad nye ba zhis mdzad/ dus ma yin par 'chi ba thams cad nye bar ni bar mdzod/
80b1(rgyud): gza' dang rgyu skar gyi nyes pa thams cad nye bar zhi bar mdzod/ mche ba'i dug thams cad nye bar zhi bar mdzod// bcom ldan 'das ma ri khrod lo ma can/ tun tuT+Ta/ bi tun+da bin+da/ tuN tu
80b2(rgyud): tu mu lI swAhAM/ oM go ri/ gAn+d+ha ri/ tsaN+Da li/ mA taM g+hi/ puk+ka se swAhAM/ oM aM ku re/ mang ku re/ ku ra re/ bar+t+ta sha bA ri sAhA/ na maHsarba sha ba riN+Da/ ma hA sha ba rI Na/ b+ha ga ba
80b3(rgyud): ti pi shA tsi/ par+t+ta sha ba ri pi shAM tsi sAhA/ oM bi shwA tsi par+N+Na sha ba ri hriHdzaHhUM phaT bi sha tsi swA hA/ 'phag sa ma ri khrod ba lo mgyon ma'i gzungs rdzogs so//

81a6(rgyud): las srung du gsol srung du gsol// dza yaM ku ru ku ru/ pu ru phu ru swA hA/ a ma le swA hA/ a mr-i ti swAhA/ 'phags pa phyir bzlog pa stobs can zhes bya ba rdzogs so//
81a7(rgyud): rgya gar skad du/ a gra bid+ya man+ta/ bod skad du/ mchog thob pa'i rigs sngags/ bcom ldan 'das ma dung can ma la phyag 'tshal lo//
81b1(rgyud): bsnyen pa rdzogs par byed pa/ gzi brjid rgyas par byed pa/ longs spyod 'phel bar byed pa/ dbang phyug 'phel bar byed pa/ 'khor 'phel bar byed pa/ tshe 'phel bar byed pa/
81b2(rgyud): dgra zhi bar byed pa/ bgegs zhi bar byed pa'o// dkon mchog gsum la mchod pa phul la/ sems byams pa la gnas pas dus gcig la lan brgya rtsa brgyad brjod par bya'o// 'di lta
81b3(rgyud): ste na maHsarba ta thA ga ta nAM/ tad+ya thA/ oM shaM khi ni de bi/ A gats+tsha A gats+tsha/ tiSh+Tha d+ha ni/ d+ha na dza ye/ bri brI/ bi ti ka ri/ dri d+hI d+hI ti ka ri nan/ bi bi d+yA/ be sha ba sta/ A yuH
81b4(rgyud): ri na yu yu a yu palpa la nai/ ta thA ga te/ swa ra bo d+hi tsit+ta/ ma ti lam po da ra/ de hi maM ba ran shAM khi ni swAhA/ bdag gis 'di nyid kyi sprul pa'i sku 'di nyid du mthong bar gyur cig/ stong pa
81b5(rgyud): nyid la bzod pa thob par gyur cig/ stong pa nyid kyi don mthong bar 'gyur cig/ stong pa nyid kyi don byed par gyur cig/ 'di brjod pas bar du gcod pa thams cad kyang rnam par sel bar
81b6(rgyud): 'gyur ro// 'phags pa mchog thob pa zhes bya ba rdzogs so// / dpal lha mo sgra dbyangs la bstod pa/ lam gang gis na sangs rgyas 'byung
81b7(rgyud): ba dang // rgyal ba sras bcas chos kyi bla mar gyur// mkhyen pa'i rim par sa rnams bkod pa yi// shes rab dkyil 'khor mang la skyabs su mchi// phyag 'tshal dpal ldan lha mo dbyangs
82a1(rgyud): / can ma// 'jig rten khams 'dir smra la dbang brnyes shing // drang srong rig gsum rig pa'i pha rol gshegs// de ni spyod pa rgya chen rnams las byung // sems can/
82a2(rgyud): don phyir 'phrin las chen po'i khur// spro bar dka' ba kun kyang khyod kyis mdzad// sa dang pha rol phyin pa bcu spyad pas// dge ba'i tshogs brtan yid bzhin lus su bsgyur// zhal gyi dkyil
82a3(rgyud): 'khor zla ba dri med rgyas// thugs rje'i spyan gyis 'gro ba'i mig 'byed pa// dus ring 'jig rten kun la bde bar gzigs// de la dbang po tshangs sogs shin tu 'dud// byams shing bzod ldan
82a4(rgyud): snying rje bskyed pa'i ma// lha mo mchog de 'gro kur skyong bar dgyes// thor tsugs ri bo rtse 'dra spobs pa 'phags// shes rab zab cing shes pa'i rten byed kyang // rigs pa'i gnas la mnga'
82a5(rgyud): brnyas tshig gi bdag/ 'jig rten na yang lha yi lhar gyur la// sdug bsngal bsal bar rab brtson gnyen mchog pas// mu su rtog ge ba rnams kun kyang 'dud// yan lag rnam par 'byes shing
82a6(rgyud): gsung snyad pa// yon tan dri med bsod nams 'bar bar bsgyings// rig pa mchog gi dngos grub sbyin mdzad pa// blo myur tshig 'chang spobs pa'i mchog stsol cig/ sems can kun la rtag tu ngan
82a7(rgyud): sems pa// mi slu mchog khyod rnam grol sa la bzhugs// thugs dam brtan bcas bskul ba rnams la yang // dpal gyis dgongs shig don kun nye bar skongs// 'di ltar 'jig rten dag na snang ba kun//
82b1(rgyud): sku 'joms khyad par tshig gis don mtshon tre// phan tshun shes shing yang dag brda spong pa'ang // dbyangs can khyod kyi mthu sde bsam mi khyab// gzungs dang chos kyi stobs la dbang brnyes pa// dmachis/
82b2(rgyud): bden grub drang srong shes nyen can// lus sems ngag rnams byin gyis rlob pa dang // yid 'ong sgras kyang 'jig rten tshim par byed// byang chub mchog gi spyod phyir su dag mos// bdag dang gzhan don/
82b3(rgyud): phun sum tshogs gyur pa'i// lus dang ngag yid rnam dag mchog 'dod la// bcom ldan 'das mas rtag tu don mchog stsol// bdag ni dpag zhing byang chub lam brtson dang // lce yi dbang po dag
82b4(rgyud): cing tshig btsun la// rig pa'i gter ldan smra la thogs med dang // bde gshegs spobs pa nye bar bsgrub tu gsol// rig pa'i yul gyi rang bzhin rtog las dben// snyan pa'i rgyal mtshan
82b5(rgyud): dga' ba'i shugs kyis bskyod// mkha' la sna tshogs rnam par dri 'dod ltar// mtshan nyid rtogs dka' yon tan gting mtha' med// na mo b+ha ga pa te/ brah+ma Ne/ na maHswa ra swa t+yai de'i
82b6(rgyud): sid d+ha nA man+t+ra pA taM brah+ma nu man+ta sAh+ma/ dpal lha mo sgra dbyangs la bstod pa rdzogs so// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya shrI ma hA de bi byA ka ra Na/
82b7(rgyud): bod skad du/ 'phags pa lha mo chen mo dpal lung bstan pa/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/
83a1(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das bde ba can na byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug
83a2(rgyud): dang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu chen thob pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'
83a3(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po dang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa'
83a4(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jigs pa thams cad sel ba dang / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag byed kyi bkra shis/
83a5(rgyud): thams cad 'dzin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsod nams kyi mtshan thams cad 'dzin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyi zla dang / 'jig rten
83a6(rgyud): 'dzin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mu stegs kyi bkra shis thams cad 'dzin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / de dag la
83a7(rgyud): sogs pa bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang
83b1(rgyud): phyug bcom ldan 'das ga la der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ lha mo chen mo dpal yang bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du
83b2(rgyud): song ste byin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te lan sum bskor ba byas nas/ bde ba can na gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la'ang
83b3(rgyud): mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams brgya stong du mas brgyad cing / de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba dag gis yongs su bskor te/ rgya byin
83b4(rgyud): dang rdzatshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba thams cad kyis bstod cing sngags so// lha mo chen mo dpal la gzigs nas tshangs pa chen po'i gsung gis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
83b5(rgyud): chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rgyal po 'am/ blon po 'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nas/
83b6(rgyud): dge bsnyen ma 'am/ bram ze 'am/ rgyal rigs sam/ rje'u rigs sam/ dmangs rigs gang la la lha mo chen mo dpal gyi ming brgya rtsa brgyad dri ma med par grags pa zhes bya ba'i
83b7(rgyud): bstod pa 'di 'chang na/ rgyal rigs kyi rgyal po de'i yul dang / sems can de dag gi 'jigs pa dang / yams kyi nad dang / gnod pa thams cad zhi bar 'gyur zhing / chom rkun dang /
84a1(rgyud): g.yo can dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa'i 'jigs pa thams cad 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ nor dang / 'bru dang / mdzod dang / bang ba thams cad rnam par 'phel bar/
84a2(rgyud): 'gyur ro// rgyal rigs kyi rgyal po de'i khyim du'ang dpal nges par gnas par 'gyur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis tshig 'di skad ces gsol to//
84a3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das gsung 'di legs par bka' stsal pa legs so legs so// legs te/ gang dag lha mo chen mo dpal gyi ming rnams 'dzin pa dang / thos nas kyang sgrub par bgyid pa de/
84a4(rgyud): dag gi yon tan dang phan yon ni ngo dag lags so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs gis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//
84a5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das lha mo dpal gyis dge ba'i rtsa ba gang du bskyed pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha mo chen mo dpal gyis de bzhin gshegs pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed la
84a6(rgyud): dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed de/ spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che las byung ba zhes bya ba na/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i me tog yon/
84a7(rgyud): tan gyi rgya mtsho bai DUR+Ya dang / gser gyi ri bo mdog mdzes gser 'od dpal zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa mang po gzhan dag la'ang lha mo chen mo dpal gyis dge ba'i
84b1(rgyud): rtsu ba bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan 'di dag kyang lha mo chen mo dpal de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par 'phel ba dang / 'grub par byed pa dang / rtag tu rjes su 'brang ba yin te/ de dag
84b2(rgyud): ri 'dir lha mo chen mo dpal gyis yang dag par brjod pa dang / sdig pa thams cad sel ba dang / nyes sdig thams cad med par byed pa dang / lus thams cad dri ma med par byed pa dang / nor dang
84b3(rgyud): 'bru rnams 'du zhing 'phel bar byed pa dang / dbul ba gcod par byed pa dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci
84b4(rgyud): dang lto 'phye chen po thams cad 'dun par byed cing 'gugs par byed pa dang / yams kyi nang dang / gnod pa dang / 'thab pa dang / 'khrug pa dang / 'gyed pa dang / rtsod pa thams
84b5(rgyud): cad zhi bar byed pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug sgrub par byed pa'o// 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa dpal stug po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i me tog yon tan
84b6(rgyud): gyi rgya mtsho bai DUR+Shar+ya dang / gser gyi ri bo mdog mdzes gser 'od dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa gang+gA'i mu stegs kyi sgo thams cad bkra shis kyi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de
84b7(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa n+dan gyi me tog gzi brjid skar ma'i 'od kyi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu snang ba g.yul las rnam par rgyal ba'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo//
85a1(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan rgya mtsho snang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi cho 'phrul rgyal mtshan shugs kyi dpal/
85a2(rgyud): la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa skar 'od zhi ba'i spos snang dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa sems can gyi bsam pa zhi bar mdzad pa'i sku'i dpal la phyag 'tshal
85a3(rgyud): lo de bzhin gshegs pa smon lam rgya mtshos snang ba'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu yongs su brjod pa mtshan gsol dpal la phyag 'tshal
85a4(rgyud): lo de bzhin gshegs pa phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo rin po che'i gnas kyi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'od 'phags dpal la phyag 'tshal lo//
85a5(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa brtson 'grus grangs med pa la yang dag par rdzogs pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dpag tu med pa'i gser mchog snang ba'i dpal la phyag 'tshal
85a6(rgyud): lo de bzhin gshegs pa gsung gi yan lag thams cad kyi sgra dbyangs dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa shes rab sgrol ma grangs med pa'i 'od kyi tog gi rangal la phyag
85a7(rgyud): 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa sred med kyi bu'i brtul zhugs kyi cho ga lhun po'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs
85b1(rgyud): pa dbang phyug chen po'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa'i zla'i 'od dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa zab mo'i chos kyi 'od kyi rgyal po'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo//
85b2(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha'i sgron ma 'od bzang dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa nyi 'od tog gi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa spos kyi sgron ma'i dpal la phyas
85b3(rgyud): 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rgya mtsho'i snying po las byung ba'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa sprul pa'i 'brug sgra snyan pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs
85b4(rgyud): pa chos kyi snang ba thams cad bkod pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa shing gi rgyal po ltar skyes pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'od 'bre
85b5(rgyud): bo'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes 'od 'phro rgya mtsho'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa smon lam chen po'i shugs kyi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo//
85b6(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen po'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dran pa'i tog gi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po tog gi rgyal mtshan gyi rgyal
85b7(rgyud): po'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa nor dang 'bru thams cad sdud pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa zhi ba 'dren pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de
86a1(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa phun sum tshogs pa 'gugs pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan 'di dag rim gror byas te bcang bar bya'o// bklag par
86a2(rgyud): bya'o/ de ltar byas na rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams shin tu mang du bskyed par 'gyur ro// lha mo chen mo'i dpal de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis lung bstan te/
86a3(rgyud): lha mo chen mo dpal khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dus na 'jig rten gyi khams dpal chen po rin po ches brgyan pa zhes bya bar/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
86a4(rgyud): dpal nor bu ring po che las byung ba zhes bya bar 'gyur te/ 'jig rten gyi khams de'ang lha'i rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan par 'gyur ro// 'jig rten gyi khams der de bzhin gshegs pa de
86a5(rgyud): nyid snang bar mdzad par 'gyur la/ 'jig rten gyi khams de na gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag kyang rang las 'od 'byung zhing tshe dpag tu med par 'gyur ro// nam mkha' las kyang sangs
86a6(rgyud): rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun gyi sgra 'byung bar 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing der byang chub sems dpa' gang dag skye bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad kyang pad+ma'i snying po dag las skye bar
86a7(rgyud): 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan to// de la ming bar rtsa brgyad dri ma med pa lta bu zhes bya ba'i bstod pa rgyun chags bcu gnyis gang zhe na/ 'jigs pa med pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug lha mo tshon mo/
86b1(rgyud): dpal gyi ming rnam par 'od cig/ 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dbang bskur ba/ lha thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yum/ lnga tham/
86b2(rgyud): cad kyim/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dpal/ byang chub sems dpa' thams can kyi dpal/ 'phags pa nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dpal/ tshangs pa dang / khyab/
86b3(rgyud): 'jug dang / dbang phyug ched po rnams kyi dpal lha la sogs pa thams cad kyi dpal/ gnas thams cad yod pa'i dpal/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma
86b4(rgyud): yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po thams cad kyi dpal/ rigs sngags 'chang dang / lag na rdo rje dang / rdo rje 'chang thams cad kyi dpal
86b5(rgyud): 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi dang lnga'i dpal/ gza' brgyad dang rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa brgyad kyi dpal lo// oM nyi ma'i bu mo 'am/ yum rig byed bzhi'i dpal/ bkra shis ma/ sems
86b6(rgyud): can gyi ma/ rnam par rgyal ma/ gang+gA ma/ mu stegs thams cad ma/ bkra shis thams cad ma/ dri ma med par byed pa'i dpal/ sdig pa thams cad 'phrog ma/ rgyags byed ma/
86b7(rgyud): zla ba'i dpal/ nyi ma'i dpal/ gza' thams cad kyi dpal/ seng ge la zhon ma/ pad+ma'i mchog 'bum gyis bkab ma/ pad+ma/ pad+ma las byung ma/ pad+ma la gnas ma/ pad+ma 'dzin/
87a1(rgyud): / ma pad+ma dang ldan pa/ rin po che 'od 'bar ba'i 'phreng ba du ma dang ldan da/ nor sbyin ma/ dkar mo/ dkar mo chen molag dkar ma bkra shis thams cad 'dzin/
87a2(rgyud): mabasod nams thams cad bsags pa'i lus can ma/ shes nyen gyi bu mo lag pa 'bum ldan ma/ mig 'bum ldan ma mgo 'bum ldan ma/ nor bu rnam pa sna tshogs kyi cod pan dang
87a3(rgyud): ldan ma/ gzugs bzang ma/ kun gyi gzugs can ma/ grags mashin tu grag sa mazhim/ sprin 'dra ba'i sgra gtsang ma/ zla ba ltar mdzes ma dge ma/ dge byed ma/ sems
87a4(rgyud): can thams cad la mngon du phyogs pa'i dpal 'phags ma me tog gi dpral me tog gi dbang phyug mari'i rgyal po ri rab thams cad kyi dpal chu klung dang mtsho thams cad kyi dpal/
87a5(rgyud): chu dang rgya mtsho thams cad kyi dpal/ mu stegs thams cad mngon du phyogs pa'i dpal sman dang / rtswa dang / nag sa tshal dang / nor dang 'bru thams cad kyi dpal gser sbyin
87a6(rgyud): ma zas dang skom sbyin ma/ 'od gsal ma/ snang ma/ lus gtsang ma de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang sgyur ma/ lha'i tshogs thams cad la mngon du phyogs ma'i dpal
87a7(rgyud): gshin rje dang / chu lha dang / lus ngan dang / brgya byin la sogs pa'i dpal/ sbyin byed ma/ longs spyod ma/ gzi brjid ma/ gzi brjid ldan ma/ phun sum tshogs ma/ 'byor pa ma/ rnam
87b1(rgyud): par 'phel ma/ mthong ma/ chos kyi dpal ma/ khyab 'jug la brten ma/ ku mu da la gnas ma/ gnod sbyin ma/ bzod sbyin ma/ mthu rdul gyi gnas ma dag byed dang bkra shis thams cad kyi/
87b2(rgyud): lag lngan ma/ bkra mi shis pa thams cad 'jig byed ma/ bsod nams thams cad sdud pa'i dpal sa thams cad dang rgyal po thams cad kyi dpal/ rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal po thams cad kyi
87b3(rgyud): dpal/ 'byung po dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / yi dgas dang / sha za dang / grul bum dang / lto 'phye chen po thams cad kyi dpal/ lha'i gnas dang / lha thams cad kyi dpal/
87b4(rgyud): bzlas brjod dang / bzlas brjod du bya ba dang / sbyin sreg dang / sbyin sreg tu bya ba dang / bkra shis thams cad kyi dpal/ 'od ldan pa mchog dga' ma skal bas 'gyur ma/ drang srong
87b5(rgyud): thams cad dga' bar brjod pa'i dpal/ bud med thams cad kyi gnas/ kun gyi gtso mo dpal gyi mchog/ mi 'am ci mo thams cad dang / lha ma yin mo thams cad kyi dpal gyi mchog/ kha na
87b6(rgyud): ma tho ba med pa'i gnas na 'dug ma/ yid 'ong ba sim byed ma/ lus ngan la sdug pa/ chos kyi rgyal po'i dpal/ oM sdug bsngal thams cad las rnam par gzigs shing sgrol cig/ thar
87b7(rgyud): par mdzod cig/ bsod nams kyi tshogs thams cad bdag la mngon du gyur par mdzod cig swA hA/ oM gang+ga sarba tir+tha mu khe swA hA/ oM sarba bit+te swAhA/ sarba maM ga la d+hA ra Ni swA hA/ tsa tu ra be da
88a1(rgyud): sarba nak+Sha tra/ g+hA hA ga/ na hA ga/ na d+hA mAH ye swAh+ma/ brah+ma ya swAhA/ biSh+Nu ye swAhA/ ru dA ya swA hA/ bi shwa mu khA ya swA hA/ oM gri ni g+ni nu sarba kAr+ya sA d+hA ni/ si ni si ni/
88a2(rgyud): A bA hA/ de ba hA/ bai shra ma NA ya sAhA/ su bar+Na/ d+ha na d+ha n+ya kI A kaR+Sha d+h+yaM sAhA/ sarbe puN+ya a kAR+Sha d+h+r-i sAhA/ shrI he be te a kaR+Sha d+hi sAh+ma/ sarba pA paM na sha myaM sU hA/ sarba A lak+Shi pra shra ma
88a3(rgyud): N+yai swA hA/ sarba ta thA ga ta a b+hi Sha ka yai swA hA/ sarba de ba ta a b+hi mu kha shrI ye e yur ba la par+Na ke ra ye sAM hA/ sarba biti tra maM ga la ha s+t+rai yai swA hA/ sing ga ba ha na nai sA hA/ pad+me saM b+hU ta ye
88a4(rgyud): swA hA/ sarba kr-i ta ka kho rda bi nA sha re swA hA/ 'jigs pa med pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gang la li lha mo chen mo dpal gyi ming / nyes sdig thams cad med par byed pa sdig pa thams cad
88a5(rgyud): 'joms par byed pa bsod nams thams cad sdud par byed pa/ bkra mi shis pa thams cad med par byed pa dpal dang / bde ba dang / skal ba bzang po thams cad sdud par byed pa 'di dag
88a6(rgyud): dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan 'di dag 'chang ba dang klog par byed pa des nang par langs te gtsang bar byas la/ sangs rgyas thams cad la me tog dang bdug pa gsol nas/ lha mo chen mo dpal
88a7(rgyud): la'ang tsan dan gyi bdug pa phul te bklags na/ des dpal thams cad mthong bar 'gyur/ bde ba dang yid bde ba thams cad thob par 'gyur/ lha thams cad kyang srung ba dang / sgrub pa dang / sbed
88b1(rgyud): par byed par 'gyur/ de'i dgos pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jigs pa med pa spyan ras gzigs dbang /
88b2(rgyud): phrug dang / wa mo chen mo dpal de dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang wa dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
88b3(rgyud): gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa lha mo chen mo dpal lung bstan pa rdzogs so// / rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya ma hA
88b4(rgyud): shri yaHsU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa dpal chen mo'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig ni
88b5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das bde ba can na bzhugs so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/
88b6(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das la bskor ba lan sum byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dpal chen mo
88b7(rgyud): la gzigs nas/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// dpal chen mo'i mtshan bcu gnyis po 'di dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen
89a1(rgyud): nam dge bsnyen ma 'am/ de ma yin pa gzhan yang rung ste/ gang gis shes pa dang / gang la la 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / 'dri ba dang / 'drir 'jug/
89a2(rgyud): pa de ni dbul bor te phyug por 'gyur ro// de nas 'byung po'i tshogs thams cad kyis de ltar gyur cig ces kun ras gsol to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dpal chen mo'i mtshan bcu gnyis
89a3(rgyud): po bka' stsal ba/ 'di lta ste/ dpal ldan ma/ bkra shis ma/ pad+ma'i 'phreng ba can/ nor gyi bdag mo dkar mo/ grags pa chen mo pad+ma'i spyan 'od chen ma byed pa mo
89a4(rgyud): zas sbyin marin po che rab tu sbyin ma/ dpal chen mo s+yAda? ya the dan/ dzi ni/ gri Ni/ sarba ar+tha sA d+ha nisha shi ni/ a lak+Shi Nime nA sha ya sid d+ha nu me man+ta pa rAHsA hA
89a5(rgyud): oM b+h+r-i ku TI pa ra ma su b+ha ge swA hA/ lan gsum du brjod par bya ste/ gang la la dus gsum du 'don pa de'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs thams cad 'jig par 'gyur ro// skal ba bzang po dang ldan par
89a6(rgyud): 'gyur ro// 'byor pa zang mi shes par 'gyur ro// mi dang phrad du 'gro ba'i tshe bklags ras phrad pa byas na mi des de la bu'i 'du shes skyed par 'gyur te dga' bar 'gyur la/ ji skad bsgo ba
89a7(rgyud): bzhin byed do// rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par bklags na tshangs pa dang bram ze sa drag shul gyi las byas kyang mi tshugs par 'gyur la/ sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byas par yang 'gyur ro//
89b1(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis de snang bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang drug yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bsod do/
89b2(rgyud): 'phags pa dpal chen mo'i mdo rdzogs so// rgya gar gyi mngon po dzi na mi tra dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing nus te gtan la bang ga/
89b3(rgyud): dpal gyi lha mo'i mtshan bcu gnyis pa/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo// phyag na rdo rje la
89b4(rgyud): phyag 'tshal lo// dpal lha mo chen mo la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das bde ba can gyi 'jig rten na bzhugs te/ de nas byang chub sems dpa'
89b5(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bcom ldan 'das gal ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// de nas byung /
89b6(rgyud): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dpal lha mo chen mo'ang bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste drung du phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu
89b7(rgyud): 'dug go// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dpal chen mo la gzigs nas/ spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dge slong ngam pa dge slong /
90a1(rgyud): ma 'a/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma'am/ sems can gang su'ang rung bas dpal chen mo 'di'i ming bcu gnyis shes te 'chang ba
90a2(rgyud): dang klog pa dang / sgrub par byed pa dang / rjod par byed na de dbul po spangs nas drug po chen por 'gyur ro// de nas 'byung po'i tshogs thams
90a3(rgyud): cad kyis kyang de bzhin du gyur cig ces smras so// dpal lha mo chen mo'i ming bcu gnyis ni/ 'di lta ste/ bkra shis ma/ dpal ldan ma
90a4(rgyud): pad+ma'i 'phreng thogs ma/ nor bdag ma/ dkar sham ma/ grags chen ma/ pad+ma'i spyan mnga' ma/ 'od chen ma/ byed pa mo
90a5(rgyud): zas sbyin ma/ rin chen 'od ldan ma/ dpal chen mo ma/ sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag
90a6(rgyud): 'tshal lo// dpal chen mo la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di lta ste/ dzi na/ g+h+r-i Ni/ dgos pa thams cad sgrub par mdzad ma/ si mi si mi/
90a7(rgyud): ni mi ni mi bdag gis mi shes pa thams cad bsal bar mdzod cig swA/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal ba dang / byang chub sems
90b1(rgyud): dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa la mngon par dga' 'o// dpal gyi lha mo'i mtshan bcu
90b2(rgyud): gnyis pa rdzogs so// // rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / nu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan
90b3(rgyud): la bab pa// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya sarba karmA A ba ra Na bi sho d+hi ni nA ma d+hA rabod skad du
90b4(rgyud): 'phags pa las kyi sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs bcom ldan 'das mi 'khrugs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// na mo tat+na tra yA ya/
90b5(rgyud): oM ka ka ni kaM ka n+de re tsa ni rotsan tho Ta ni tr-iT nA trA sa ni trA sa rI prA ti han pra ti han/ sarba karba pa ra ba ra NaM m+b+hi sa/
90b6(rgyud): gzungs sngags 'di'i cho ga ni 'di yin te/ rtag tu bzlas brjod bya se na la se gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyur ro//
90b7(rgyud): dus gsum du bzlas brjod byas na mtshams med pa lnga'ang 'bying bar 'gyur ro// lan cig bzlas brjod byas na ltas ngan pa dang / rmi lim ngan pa
91a1(rgyud): dang bkrA mi shis pa rnams med par 'gyur ro// lus la 'chang ngam glegs bam la bris nAs mgul/
91a2(rgyud): du thogs te 'chang na de la dus ma yin par 'chi ba rnams gtan du 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// gang zhig snying rjes non te ri dgas dang khya dang / mi dang
91a3(rgyud): mi ma yin pa rnams kyang rung ste/ 'chi ba'i rna khung du brjod na de ngan song du 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro// yang nu shi ste dus las 'das na shi 'phos pa'i
91a4(rgyud): ming nas smos te/ de'i phyir byams pa dang snying rjes lan brgya'am/ stong ngam/ 'bum brjod na de sems can dmyal bar skyes su zin kyang
91a5(rgyud): de'i mong+ga la thar par 'gyur ro// sa 'am/ til lam/ yungs kar ram/ chu gang yang rung ba la bzlas brjod byas te
91a6(rgyud): shi ba'i lus la gtor ram khrus byas nas de'i 'og tu ma chad pa 'am yang na mchod rten gyi nang du bcug ste bzhag la rig sngags kyang bris nas mgo
91a7(rgyud): btags na de ngan song du skyes pa'ang zhag bdun gyis gdon mi za bar thar te/ bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur ba 'am
91b1(rgyud): yang na rlung gi smon lam gyi dbang gis skye bar 'gyur ro// gang zhig zla ba nya ba'i tshe khrus byas la gtsang mar byas te/ dus gsum du gos brje rnying
91b2(rgyud): kha zas mi za ba 'am yang na kha zas dkar bgra bza' zhing / sku gdung dang mchod rten skor bzhin du gang gi ming dang ldan pas lan 'bu ma bzlas brjod
91b3(rgyud): byas na/ de ngar song nas thar te gnas gtsang ma'i lha'i ris su skyes nas sgrub pa po'i thad du 'ongs te mchod par byed cing lus kyang ston la legs so zhes
91b4(rgyud): bya ba'ang byin nas lan gsum bskor ba byas te mi sdang bar 'gyur ro// de'i ming bris la gzungs sngags bzlas brjod byed cing mchod rten
91b5(rgyud): 'i'abum byas la/ gdugs dang / rgyu la mtshan dang / bya ngan la sogs pas legs par mchod nas rgya mtsho chen po dang / yang na
91b6(rgyud): klung du btang na des sems can dmyal ba la sog pa nas thar par 'gyur ro// lung na de ltar mchod pa byas nas mjug tu lam gyi bzhi mdor mchod rten chen/
91b7(rgyud): po byas te/ gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan la sogs pas legs par mchod la/ 'phags pa'i dge 'dun la'ang mchod ston
92a1(rgyud): gsol nas yon yang phul te legs par mchod nas che ge mo zhig gi dge ba'i rtsa bar gyur cig/ 'di kho nas bde 'gro
92a2(rgyud): mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du skye bar gyur cig ces kyang shes par byas na// de kho na bzhin du skyes nas lus kyang ston cing legs so zhes bya ba'ang byin
92a3(rgyud): nas mi snang bar gyur to// mtshams med pa lnga byed byed pa'am// dam pa'i chos spong ba 'am/ 'phags pa la skur pa btab pa'ang rung ste/
92a4(rgyud): 'chi khar rtsig pa la gzungs sngags 'di bris pa mthong na de'i las kyi sgrib pa thams cud zad par 'gyur na/ 'don pa dang bzlas brjod byas pa lta
92a5(rgyud): ci smos te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de nyid byon nas 'di skad du/ rigs kyi bu tshur nga'i gan du shog ces kyang gsung bar 'gyur ro//
92a6(rgyud): 'phags pa las kyi sgrib pa thams cad rngam par sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// // / rgya gar skad du
92a7(rgyud): Ar+ya bid+ya ut+ta ma ma hA tan+t+ra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa rig pa mchog gi rgyud chen po sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag
92b1(rgyud): 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig ra bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod du rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas stir gyi kun
92b2(rgyud): dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje rig pa bye ba phrag du mas bskor nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga
92b3(rgyud): la der song ste phyin na sa bar snang las babs ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba
92b4(rgyud): byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// de nas byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug kyang rig pa bye ba du mas yongs su bskor nas 'khor de nyid du
92b5(rgyud): 'dus par gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/
92b6(rgyud): de nas 'byung po'i bdag po'i dbang ldan 'byung po bye ba phrag du mas bskor nas 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs dang phyag na rdo rje la mgo bos 'phyag 'tshal te/
92b7(rgyud): phyogro gcig tu 'dug go// de nas gdol pa'i rgyal po phur bu gsum pa'ang 'khor nyid du 'dus par gyur to// rgyal po chen po bzhi'ang g.yog 'khor bye ba phrag du mas kun nas bskor te 'khor de nyid du/
93a1(rgyud): 'dus nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhangs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// de nas byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rjes bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gas/
93a2(rgyud): te pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btung de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sems can
93a3(rgyud): thams cad kyi don gyi slad du bdag gsang sngags kyi tshig 'chad par gnang ba mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// lag
93a4(rgyud): na rdo rje khyod ni shin tu ma rungs pa/ lag na rdo rje khyod ni shin tu brtsam pa med pa/ shin tu gtum pa yin na/ ji ltar sems can rnams kyi don gyi phyir gsang sngags 'chadalag na rdo rje khyod ni dam tshig
93a5(rgyud): shes pa yin la/ sems can gang dag dam tshig mi shes par brjod pa rnams ni rdo rjes mthar byed pa yin na/ khyod ji ltar gsang sngags 'chang/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de de ltar lags mod kyi/
