121a6(rgyud): 'debs par bgyid do// mar dang gu gul gyi sreg thugs lan brgya stong sbyin sreg bgyis na zhi bar 'gyur ro// yar gyi ngo nya nas brtsams te gdugs kyi gung la gos gsar pa bgos la/ zangs kyi
121a7(rgyud): snod du zho dang 'bras chan stsal te gdong gdugs la bstan cing phyugs chung gi ming nas phyung ste lan brgya stong bzlas brjod bgyis na phyag chung mchi'o// gal te mi mchi na phyugs chung de 'gum mo//
121b1(rgyud): gdugs bduran du bgyi'o// 'bras chan gyi gdugs la dbul lo// shing sha mi'i phur bu sor brgyad pa blangs te srad bus dkris te lag na rdo rje'i mdun du lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis la klu mi/
121b2(rgyud): 'gul bar bgyi'o zhes bgyi ste/ chab tu dor na gru mi 'gul ba bgyis par 'gyur ro// mar gyi ngo zhag bzhi la zhag gcig spud pa bgyis te mtshan gcig mchis pas mchis la/ 'byung ngo'i
121b3(rgyud): gter ma stsal te lho phyogs kyi nges la shu dag brkyang stong sbyin sreg bgyis na dI na ra gsum rnyed ngo // shu dag la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis te so phrag tu stsal na gshegs 'gyed pa'i tshe gnan
121b4(rgyud): gyis lan mi thabs par smra bar 'gyur ro// lag na rdo rje'i mdun du gi'u wang la lan brgyang stong bzlas brjod bgyis la/ des thig le bgyis na dpal che bar 'gyur ro// rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor du lan thebs par
121b5(rgyud): smra bar 'gyur ro// bud med dbang du bgyid na lag na rdo rje'i mdun du pa la sha'i shing gi zhugs bus la/ snga dro lan tshwa'i lan stong rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg bgyis nas ming nas brjod na nyi ma bdun gyis 'grub ste/
121b6(rgyud): za gcig par bgyi'o// yug sa mo dbang du bgyid na mar gyi ngo zhag drug nas brtsams te/ bcu'i bar du dus gsum du lag na rdo rje'i mdun du lung thang gi shing la zhugs bus la mon sran gre'u lan brgya/
121b7(rgyud): rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg bgyis na dbang du 'gyur ro// bram ze'i bu mo dbang du bgyid par 'tshal bas mar gyi ngo zhig brgyad la lag na rdo rje'i mdun du du ba ma mchis pa'i me mngag la rgya skyegs kyis lan brgya
122a1(rgyud): stong sbyin sreg bgyis na dbang du 'gyur ro// skyes pa dbang du bgyi na mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la zhag gcig sbyang ba bgyis nas/ lag na rdo rje'i mdun du dong ka'i shing gis zhugs/
122a2(rgyud): bus la yungs kar la lan brgyang stong sbyin sreg bgyis na dbang du 'gyur ro// Dak+ki hUM dzaHrA dzA nA ma pa shi ka tu me na shuk+ka pany+tsa mye mo ho ra ta shI te badz+ra pA Ni s+ya a gra/ pri ya~M ku ba ta she rad+d+hi ma pra dz+wa l+yaM shaM
122a3(rgyud): sar sha paM in+d+ra ya baM tse ki kri t+ya ba shi ru d+hi ra a ka tA nAM aSh+Ta sa ha sr-i dzu ya sho ba ti/ mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad dam bcu bzhi nas zhag gsum sbyang ba bgyis te/ lag na rdo rje'i mdun du mchod pa tsi nus kyis
122a4(rgyud): mchod de/ rig pa mchog gis dri dang / me tog dang / bdug pa thams cad la phul la/ de'i 'og tu rig sngags 'chang gis shing sa la ser po las sgrom bu bgyis te/ sbom bu der li ge bu
122a5(rgyud): mig stsal la dro bar gyur pa dang / du bar 'thul ba dang / 'bar ba'i bar bzlas brjod bgyi'o// dro bar gyur na dbang du 'gyur ro// du ba 'thul na mi snang bar 'gyur ro// 'bar na nam mkha' la
122a6(rgyud): mchi bar 'gyur ro// mdog gdugs shar ba 'dra bar 'gyur ro// lo bdun stong thub par 'gyur ro// lus zhig nas lag na rdo rje mthong bar 'gyur ro// mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la nyin zhag gcig smyung ba
122a7(rgyud): bgyis te dur khrod du mchis la skyes pa'i ro ma snang pa blangs te/ rig pa mchog gis dri dang / me tog dang / bdug pas brgyan pa bgyis la mgo bo shar phyogs su bstan te/ de nas rig sngags
122b1(rgyud): de chang gcer bur phyung la skra bshig ste/ de'i snying khar mchis la mi ro'i khar mi'i thod pa yungs kar gyis bltams pa bzhag la yungs kar rnams mi snang bar gyur kyi bar du bzlas brjod bgyi'o// de nas
122b2(rgyud): dngos grub tu 'gyur ro// mi thong blangs la mtshe'ur bor na de nas yid kyis bsams pa tsam gyis nam mkha' la 'chi bar 'gyur te nam mkha' la mchi'o// mi snang bar 'gyur ro// rgyal por bgyid do//
122b3(rgyud): bdag mi sdug par yang ston to// slar yang rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa dang / mdog gdugs shar ba lta bur yang ston to// bdag gis gang bsams pa de dag thams cad 'grub bo// tshe lo
122b4(rgyud): stong thub par 'gyur ro// mar gyi ngo nag brgyad la nyin zhag gcig smyung ba bgyis te/ lag na rdo rje'i mdun du rig pa mchog gis lag na rdo rje la dri dang / me tog dang / bdug pa rnams dbul lo//
122b5(rgyud): grong gi phug ron gyi mkhar ldong ros stsal la dro bar gyur pa dang / du ba 'thul ba dang / 'bar gyi bar du bzlas brjod bgyi'o// dro bar gyur pas thig le bgyis na chab kyi nang du dgung zla gcig mchis
122b6(rgyud): shing chab kyi nang na 'dug go// gang mthong ba de dbang du 'gyur ro// du ba 'thul na mi snang bar 'gyur te/ mi snang bar gyur na grub pa rnams kyi spyod yul du mi 'gyur ro// lo stong thub par 'gyur ro//
122b7(rgyud): 'bar na nam mkha' la mchi bar 'gyur te/ dpag tshad stong tshun chad mthong zhing sgra'ang thos so// lo khri nyis stong thub par 'gyur ro// lag na rdo rje grub par 'gyur ro// chu la lan bdun bzlas
123a1(rgyud): brjod bgyis pas gar bgyid du stsal te ldan gsum bzlas brjod bgyis pa'i dubs gsang tshig spar stsal to// yid kyis lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis pa'i me tog gis skur
123a2(rgyud): stsal to// lar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la zhag gcig smyung ba bgyis te/ lag na rdo rje'i mdun du pa la sha'i shing gis zhugs bus la ku mu da'i me tog zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar la bsnyugs pa brgyad stong
123a3(rgyud): sbyin sreg bgyis na yid kyis bsams pa de dag thams cad 'grub ste/ rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal po nyid ni ma gtogs so// mar gyi ngo nag brgyang ras brtsams te zas su'o skyo 'tshal zhing / lag na
123a4(rgyud): rdo rje'i mdun du bil ba'i shing gis zhugs bus la/ bil ba'i yam sreg shing 'bum sbyin sreg bgyis na rgyal po nyid stsol to// cho ga 'di nyid kyis rig sngags 'chang nyid kyang stsal to// mar gyi ngo zhag
123a5(rgyud): brgyad la nyin zhag gcig srung ba bgyis te/ lag na rdo rje'i mdun du seng ldeng gi shing gis zhugs bus la ske tshe'i me tog la lan brgya stong sbyin sreg bgyis na las grub pa'i mchog tu 'gyur ro// mar
123a6(rgyud): gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi la lag na rdo rje'i mdun du arka'i shing gis zhugs bus la arka'i me tog las lan 'bum sbyin sreg bgyi san ti nar skyong stsol lo// byang chub kyi shing gi 'og tu zas su chu grog 'tshal
123a7(rgyud): zhing lan sum 'bum bzlas brjod bgyis na rig sngags 'chang brgyas bskor ba'i rig sngags 'chang du 'gyur ro// 'dod pa thams cad longs spyod du 'gyur ro// lo dgu stong thub par 'gyur ro// gang rig
123b1(rgyud): pa'i rgyal po bsgrub par 'tshal ba nges mar gyi ngo 'ag brgyad nas bzung ste/ zas su'o skyo 'tshal zhing rgya mtshor 'bab pa'i chu klung du zhugs te ku mu da'i me tog rgyas pa 'bum phul na/ de nas rig
123b2(rgyud): sngags 'chang la chu'i nang du klu reg par bgyid de de la 'jigs par mi bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das rig pa'i mchog 'grub par 'gyur te/ de grub pas cho gas rgyas pa thams cad grub par 'gyur
123b3(rgyud): ro/ rig pa'i mchog gi snying de'i cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs so// // de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ phyag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das nye ba'i snying po
123b4(rgyud): 'di mchog tu mi bzang pa/ cho ga rgyas pa mang po rab tu sgrub pa bgyid pa/ lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis 'gal bar bgyi ba ma lags pa/ 'byung po tham cad dang lha thams cad kyis mi tshug
123b5(rgyud): te phyir zhing bshad par bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// shod cig gnod sbyin gyi dbang po sems can rnams kyi don gyi phyir de bzhin
123b6(rgyud): gshegs pas gnang gi shod cig/ de nas lag na rdo rjes thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor 'dus pa la rnam par bltas nas/ lha de dag la 'di skad ces smras so// kye kye lha'i tshogs rnams nyon cig/
123b7(rgyud): nye ba'i snying po 'di ni mchog tu mi bzad pa/ de bzhin gshegs pas kyang 'gal bar mdzad pa ma yin te/ phyi phyir bshad kyis/ lha'i tshogs rnams de nyon cig/ de nas lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan
124a1(rgyud): 'das kyis zhabs gnyis la gtugs nas gsang sngags smras pa/ na mo rat+na tra ya s+ya/ na ma sh+tsan+d+ra badz+ra pA Ni s+ya/ ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa ti s+ya/ nam sh+tsaN+Da pra ma ta nA ya
124a2(rgyud): swA hA hi ri mi ri ti ri Ni swA hA/ de nas gsang sngags smras pas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnam pa drug tu g.yos so// gzhal med khang na gnas pa'i lha rnams kyang khas bug
124a3(rgyud): tu 'gyel nas skyabs med cing dpung gnyen med de 'dar yeng led nas/ gsang ba'i bdag po ci nas bdag cag srog dang bral bar mi 'gyur bar bdag cag la yongs su bsgrub tu gsol zhes lag na rdo rje/
124a4(rgyud): la skyabs su dong ngo // log 'dren rnams kyang 'gul ma nus nas yid kyis lag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rjes cung zad 'dzum pa'i bzhin gyis/ lha de dag la
124a5(rgyud): 'di skad ces smras so// grogs po khyed longs shig/ nga'i dam tshig la'ang gnas par gyis shig/ de thos nas lha rnams rab tu dga' ba'i bzhin gyis bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rje'i rkang pa gnyis
124a6(rgyud): la phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rje 'di ni mchog tu mi bzang ba lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha dag dang /
124a7(rgyud): bzhin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gi rig pa 'di ni lha rnams 'chi 'pho bar bgyid pa/ gnod sbyin rnams phung bar bgyid pa/
124b1(rgyud): dri za rnams lhung bar bgyid pa/ log 'dren rnams nges par rlag par bgyid pa/ rdo rje'i rigs thams cad skrag par bgyid pa/ tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po la sogs /
124b2(rgyud): la sogs pa la gnod par bgyid pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das bdag gi nye ba'i snying po 'di ni bdag la'ang phur bus 'debs pa lags te/ bcom ldan 'das mgu bar bgyid pa/ skam par
124b3(rgyud): bgyid pa/ chang pas gcod pa lags so// lha rnams 'chi 'pho bar bgyid pa dang / gnod par bgyid pa dang / phur bus gdab par bgyid par 'tshal bas mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi la zhag gsum
124b4(rgyud): srung ba bgyis te/ ba'i lci ba sa la ma lhung ba las brgya byin gyi gzugs bgyis la lag na rdo rje'i mdun du bzhag ste/ de'i steng du shing kun gyi shing gis zhug bus la pri yang ku'i yam sreg shing yungs
124b5(rgyud): kar gyi 'bru mar la bsrugs la brgya stong sbyin sreg bgyi'o// de nas lha rnams so so nas tshig cing brgya byin gyi gan du mchi'o// brgya byin yang lha rnams dbugs 'byin te/ grogs po dag ma 'jigs
124b6(rgyud): shig ces lha rnams dbugs byung nas rig sngags 'chang gi gan du mchi ste phyin pa dang / tshig 'di skad du kye ma'o rig sngags 'chang la dge sbyong gi tshul med do zhes smras pa dang / rig sngags
124b7(rgyud): 'chang gis 'di skad du/ bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rjes gang bshad pa de dran par gyis shig ces brjod par bgyi'o// de thos nas shin tu dga' ba'i bzhin gyis rig sngags 'chang la rig pa/
125a1(rgyud): stsol lo// de'i 'og tu rig sngags 'chang gi rig pa mchog gis slar gtang bar bgyi'o// rig pa des rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur te/ rig sngag/
125a2(rgyud): 'chang bdun stong gi bdag por bskul par gnas par 'gyur ro// lha rnams kyang g.yos par bgying bar 'gyur ro// gnod sbyin rnams kyang phung bar bgyid par 'tshal bas/ gang na gnod sbyin nas/
125a3(rgyud): gnod sbyin mo gnas pa der mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la mchis la nyin zhag gcig srung ba bgyis te/ byang chub kyi shing gis zhugs bus la a pa marga'i yam sreg shing las lan brgyad stong sbyin sreg bgyi'o//
125a4(rgyud): de nas gnod sbyin de dag 'bros pa dang tshur shog ces brjod na slar mchi'o// mchis nas kyang nga'i bsnyen bkur gyis shig ces brjod do// gdugs gcig bzhin du tI nar bdun bdun stsol lo//
125a5(rgyud): gang du bskos pa de thams cad bgyid do// dri za rnams lhung bar bgyid par 'tshal bas rgya mtshor 'bab pa'i klung gi ngos su yar gyi ngo tshes brgyad la nyin zhag gcig smyung ba bgyis te/ kham po dza'i shing
125a6(rgyud): gis zhugs bus la yungs kar mar dang bsres pas lan khrir sbyin sreg bgyi'o// de nas yi dgas kyi gzugs can gyi mi zhig mchi'o// mchis nas kyang rkang pa gnyis la phyag bgyid pa dang /
125a7(rgyud): bde bar gyur cig ces brjod par bgyi'o// de nas mi nges rkang pa gnyis la lig bu mig bzhag nas slar mchi'o// lig bu mig des mig bskus na dri za'i gzugs su 'gyur ro// rkang gis 'gro
125b1(rgyud): bar 'gyur ro// lo lnga stong thub par 'gyur ro// dri za rnams kyang srung ba dang / skyob pa dang / sbed bar bgyid do// log 'dren rnams kyang drug par bgyid na sngams sa de ba dang / shing ba
125b2(rgyud): la kA ra ba sa'i tshig gu dang / ne'u le'i spu dang / sbrul kogs brjes pa dang / rjes de dag gis gnod sbyin gyi gzugs la bdug par bgyi'o// rig pa'ang lan brgyad stong bzlas
125b3(rgyud): brjod bgyi'o// de nas rmi lam du log 'dren rnams bred cing ci bya gtol med par mthong ngo // de'i nang nas mi zhig 'di skad ces kyi rig sngags 'chang bdag cag la gnod pa ma mdzad par 'di
125b4(rgyud): snoms shig ces smra'o// de nas nang par ti na ra gcig stsol lo// sgrub pa'i dus na'ang bdug pa 'di nyid kyis bdag la bdugs na log 'drer thams cad nyams par 'gyur ro// log 'dren
125b5(rgyud): gyi las bgyi ra'ang mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la nyid zhag gcig srung ba bgyis la bgyi'o// rdo rje'i rigs skrag par bgyi na lce 'bab pas bcag pa'i shing blangs la mar gyi ngo zhag gcig smyung ba bgyis
125b6(rgyud): te lag na rdo rje'i mdun du lce 'bab pas bcag pa'i shing gis zhugs bu sa la lam po dza'i yam sreg shing brgyad stong sbyin sreg bgyis na/ rdo rje'i rigs thams cad skrag par 'gyur ro// ri'i
125b7(rgyud): dngos grub kyang stsol lo// tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa la gnod pa bgyid ni mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi la zhag gsum srung ba bgyis te mtshan gcig mchis
126a1(rgyud): par mchis la ci nus kyis mchod de/ mtshan la khrag gis bsus la khros pa dang bcas pas lag pa gnyis kas 'khyung de/ rig pa lan brgyad stong bzlas brjod bgyis na/
126a2(rgyud): de na mtshan 'gul lo// skrag par 'gyur zhing rang gi cho ga rgyas pa rnams kyis dngos grub stsol to// de ltar cho ga rgyas pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// lag na rdo rje la phur bus gdab na maraH
126a3(rgyud): ngogag brgyad la nag gtsug srung ba bskyes te/ lag na rdo rje'i mdun du seng ldeng gi shing gis zhugs bus la kham po dza'i yam sreg shing brgyad song ston sreg pagyis na sreg zugs gsum pa'i hU~M dUr
126a4(rgyud): ro/ brgyas tshar gcod par 'gyur ro// sum brgyas bskam par 'gyur ro// bzhi brgya pa'i tshe lag na rdo rje la phur bus btab par 'gyur ro// lag na rdo rje phur bus btab pas lag na rdo rje'i rigs/
126a5(rgyud): thams cad dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa lha thams cad kyang phur bus btab par 'gyur ro// brgyad stong tshang ba'i tshe lag na rdo rje tshig nas mchi ste/ rig
126a6(rgyud): sngags 'chang ci 'dod/ ci sbyin ces brjod pa dang / bcom ldan 'das cho ga rgyas pa dngos grub bdag la stsal du gsol zhes brjod par bya'o// de ltar gyur cig ces brjod nas mi snang bar gyur/
126a7(rgyud): de nas rig sngags 'chang gis sbyor bar lag na rdo rje'i gzugs 'o mas bkru bar bgyi'o// de nas mchis pa'i mar dang gu gul gyis lan brgyad stong sbyin sreg bgyi'o// de nas sos par 'gyur ro//
126b1(rgyud): lha la'ang mchod pa rgya cher bgyis la shugs ldan mas slar gshegs su gsol lo// bcom ldan 'das rig pa'i rgyal po sgrub pa'i rig sngags 'chang la gal te dngos grub tu ma gyur na/ rig sngag/
126b2(rgyud): 'chang des las bdag gir bya ba yin par dmigs par bgyi'o// lan gnyis su'ang bsgrub par bgyi'o// ma grub na'ang las bdag gir bya ba yin par dmigs par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis
126b3(rgyud): bka' stsal pa/ ci'i phyir de skad smra/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das pa 'gums pa dang / ma 'gums pa dang / tshangs pa la gnod pa bgyid pa'i sems can dag kyang mchis/ mtshams ma/
126b4(rgyud): mchis pa lnga dang ldan pa'i sems can dag kyang mchis te/ bcom ldan 'das de'i slad du bdag 'di skad ces brtson 'grus brtsams la bsgrub par bya'o zhes mchi'o// lan bdun du'ang sgrub/
126b5(rgyud): pa la 'jug par bgyi'o// gal te ma grub na las 'di brtsam par bgyi ste/ mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la nyin zhag gcig smyung ba bgyis la dur khrod kyi shing gis zhugs bus te/ seng ldeng gi yam
126b6(rgyud): sreg gi shing la bdag gi khrag byug la lan brgyad stong sbyin sreg bgyi'o// mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la gal te ma mchis na rang gi shas lan brgyad stong sbyin sreg bgyis na mchis par bgyi ste/ bcom ldan 'das rig
126b7(rgyud): sngags kyi dngos grub kyang stsal bar bgyi'o// las 'di ni mchog tu mi bzad pa lags te/ rig sngags 'chang des mi bzad pa'i las 'di thog mar mi bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs
127a1(rgyud): pa rnams kyi byang chub ni bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang 'gal bar bgyi ba ma lags pa lta bu ste/ gal te rig sngags 'chang gi sa las thog mar brtsams te/ bcom ldan 'das/
127a2(rgyud): de ni bdag la gnod par bgyid de de kho na nyid kyang mi mthong la bdag la gnod pa bgyid do// bcom ldan 'das bdag la gnod pa bgyid na lha thams dud la gnod pa bgyid par 'gyur ro// gnod sbyin thams
127a3(rgyud): cad thams cad la'ang gnod pa bgyis par 'gyur te/ de dag rig sngags 'chang de la glags tshol zhing mchis par 'gyur/ gal te mtshams ma mchis pa lnga dang ldan pa'i rig sngags 'chang zhig rig
127a4(rgyud): pa'i rgyal po sgrub pa bdun pa la dngos grub stsal bar bgyi'o// gal te ma stsal na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la 'khus par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang gang gis rig sngag 'drang rnams
127a5(rgyud): kyi dngos grub tu 'gyur ba'i rdzas rnams mi 'phrogs par brjod par bgyi'o// byang chub sems dpa' chen po smros shig/ bcom ldan 'das rig sngags 'chang gis lig bu mig dang ldor ros la
127a6(rgyud): sogs pa sgrub na thog mar 'o mas bkru bar bgyi ste/ bkrus pas dngos grub tu 'gyur ro// dngos grub tu gyur pa'i rdzas rnams kyang rig sngags 'chang gis bla ma dang / bdag dang
127a7(rgyud): grogs rnams la cha gsum du bgo bar bgyi'o// ral gri dang / 'khor lo dang / mdung rtsi gsum pa zhig grub la/ stor na yid kyis 'di snyam du sems can gang bsod nams chung ba de'i stor grang
127b1(rgyud): snyam du bsams la/ rig sngags 'chang des sbyin sreg bgyi'o// yang na lag pa bkan te mnan no// gal te shin tu gnod pa bgyis na rig sngags 'chang des 'di skad du/ rdzas 'di ni lag
127b2(rgyud): na rdo rje'i yin no zhes brjod par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das bdag gi ming thos nas yid kyis kyang 'khu bas sems pa ni lha dang bcas pa dang / bdud dang bcas pa dang / tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang /
127b3(rgyud): dge sbyong dang bram ze'i skye dgu dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten nam mthong ngo // de nas thams cad dang bcas pa'i 'khor des/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po legs so legs so// stobs dang pha rol
127b4(rgyud): gnod pa dpag tu med pa khyod seng ge'i sgra 'di lta bu 'byin pa legs so zhes te/ legs so zhes bya ba byin no// bcom ldan 'das 'di ni bdag gi nye ba'i snying po lags te/ 'di lan cig brjod
127b5(rgyud): pas cho ga chen po rgyas pa brgyad brjod par 'gyur ro// lagar rdo rje de de bzhin te/ de de bzhin no// bcom ldan 'das rig pa'i rgyal po 'di bdud sgrub pa dang / gnod pa bgyid na yid kyis/
127b6(rgyud): bzlas brjod bgyi'o// ci ste rig sngags 'chang rig sngags sgrub par 'tshal na/ rig sngags 'chang des thog mar rig sngags de lan brgya rtsa brgyad brjod par bgyi'o// nye ba'i snying po'ang 'an
127b7(rgyud): brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis rig sngags bsgrub par bgyi'o// gal te rig sngags ma grub na de nyid du mchis la du ba ma mchis pa'i me mngag tu ske
128a1(rgyud): las lan brgyad stong sbyin sreg bgyis na rig pa de nyams par gyur nas de'i mdun du mchi ste dngos grub stsol to// de nyid du mchis la rig sngags 'chang gis yang rig pa
128a2(rgyud): bsgrubs na myur du 'grub bo// gsang sngags thams cad kyi las kyang 'dis 'grub pa lags so// spos rnams kyis lag na rdo rje'i gzugs bgyis la gdugs bdun dus gsum du lan brgya rtsa/
128a3(rgyud): brgyad bzlas brjed bgyid la mar gyi ngo 'ag bcu bzhi pa la nyin zhag gcig srung ba bgyis te/ dpag tu ma mchis par bzlas brjod bgyis na gnod sbyin mo mchi bar 'gyur te/ rdo rje gzhad mas
128a4(rgyud): sngar stsal bar bgyi'o// gang gi tshe ngas che ge mo zhes bya ba la rgyob cig rgyob cig/ sregs shig sregs shig/ zungs zhig/ myos par gyis shig/ ma rungs par gyis shig ces bsgo ba tham
128a5(rgyud): cad la gnod pa gyis shig/ bcom ldan 'das drad pa tsam gyis kyang theb cad gyis shig ces bsgo bar bgyi'o// nye ba'i snying po rdzogs so// / nag mo drag mo'i las rnams lags te/
128a6(rgyud): gsang sngags thams cad du gsang sngags gang las mi bgyid pa de nag mo drag mo 'dis bkug na de las bgyid do// bkug kyang gal te ma grub na phye ma red lag na rdo rje'i mdun du rig sngags de lan
128a7(rgyud): bdun brjod la/ de'i 'og tu nag mo drag mo'i sngags lan brgya rtsa brgyad brjod par bgyi'o// de nas sngags de rmi lam du ston par bgyid do// yi ge ma tshang ba dang pur bu btab pas smra bar bgyid do//
128b1(rgyud): gal te yi ge ma tshang bar gyur na rig pa mchog gis tshang bar bgyid do// gal te phur bus btab par gyur na rig pa mchog nyid kyis phur bus 'byung bar bgyid de/ phye ma reng lag na rdo rje'i mdung du mchod/
128b2(rgyud): pa bgyis la sngags de rang gi khrag gis shing ta la'i lo ma la bris te/ rtswa ku sha las bgyis pa'i rdo rje la lan bdun bsngags la bsnun na de nas phur bu'i'abyin par 'byin par 'gyur ro// gdon dgug na mi to
128b3(rgyud): gis bgyi'o// gdon rengs par bgyi na lan gsum bzlas brjod bgyis pa'i chab kyis bgyi'o// gdon spong bar bgyi na bdug pas bgyi'o// gdon dbab na rna bar bzlas brjod bgyis pas so//
128b4(rgyud): gdon gtong bar 'dod na sha ka ra'i cha ba la lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis na gtong ngo // tsan dan dmar po las rdo rje bgyi sa la mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la nyin zhag gcig smyung ba bgyis te/ lag na rdo rje
128b5(rgyud): mdun du ba lang gi shas bdug par bgyi'o// rig pa'ang lan brgyad steng bzlas brjod bgyis na pha rol brjed byed kyis zin par bgyid do// rdo rje 'o mas bkrus la rig pa'ang lan brgyad stong bzlas
128b6(rgyud): brjod bgyis na thar par bgyis par 'gyur ro// rdo rje de nyid la sha chen gyis bdugs la rig pa'ang lan brgyad stong bzlas brjod bgyis na 'gum par bgyid do// tshes grangs dang skar ma bdam mi 'tsha
128b7(rgyud): spyang ba bgyi mi 'tshal te/ 'di la rgyu ni khro bo nyid do// dgra gsad par 'tshal bas gos rlon pa bgos la kha gdugs la bltas te dgra'i srog bskams kyi bar du gsang sngags bzlas brjod bgyi'o//
129a1(rgyud): rdo rje 'o mas bkrus la rig pa'ang lan brgyad stong bzlas brjod bgyis na snga mkhon bzhin 'gyur ro// gal te nag mo drag mo sgrub par 'tshal na thog ma nyid du zas su 'o skyo 'tshal/
129a2(rgyud): zhing lan 'bum bzlas brjod bgyi'o// de'i 'og tu ri mo mkhan gso sbyong bzung bas ma god pa'i ras la sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs gser mdog lta bu bri bar bgyi'o// de'i g.yor rol du nag mo drag
129a3(rgyud): mo bri bar bgyi'o// mar gyi ngo zhag bcu pa'i la zhag gsum spyad pa bgyis te/ mchod pa rgya cher bgyis la nag mo drag mo mchi bar 'gyur gyi bar du rig pa bzlas brjod bgyi'o// mchis pa dang
129a4(rgyud): rig pa mchog gis mchod yon dbul lo// de nas ris rig sngags 'dzin ci sbyin par bya zhes mchi ba dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das ma rgyal po bgyid du stsol cig ces brjod na/ de bzhin
129a5(rgyud): du gyur cig ces brjod nas mi ganga' bar 'gyur ro// nag mo drag mo'i cho ga rdzogs so// // rgyal ba ldan ma'i las rnams lags te/ lha thams cad dgug na ldan
129a6(rgyud): gsum bzlas brjod bgyis pa'i chab kyis bgyi'o// dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gtogs pa thams cad dgug na yid kyis bgyi'o// bud med dbang du bgyi na yar gyi ngo tshas brgyad nas brtsams te/
129a7(rgyud): lag na rdo rje'i mdun du gdugs bdun dus gsum du du ba ma mchis pa'i me mngag la na le sham gyis lan brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg bgyis na dbang du 'gyur ro// dbab par bgyi na chab bam bye'u rug
129b1(rgyud): pa'i 'o mas bgyi'o// gdon bcing ngam bskyod par bgyi na gu gul gyis bgyi'o// dur khrod kyi thal ba la gzugs bgyis la lan gsum bzlas brjod byas pas gdon gyis gtong bar bgyid do//
129b2(rgyud): dur khrod kyi sol ba la gdon gyi gzugs bgyis la mtshon rnon pos bcang na bcad par gyur te gtong ngo // dug las gson yal gas bgyi'o// mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi la dur khrod du dur khrod kyi
129b3(rgyud): thal ba la gzugs bgyis la/ bzlas brjod lan brgyad stong bgyis pa'i seng ldeng gi phur bus snying khar btsugs na gzer thabs drag pos btab par 'gyur ro// phyung na sos par 'gyur ro// yar
129b4(rgyud): gyi ngo tshas bdun la nyin zhag gcig sbyang ba bgyis te/ lag na rdo rje'i mdun du bya rog ma langs kyi bar du lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis na ti ra gcig stsol to// sgrub pa bgyid na ma god pa'i
129b5(rgyud): ras la sbyin dang ma 'dres pa'i tshon gyis sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs gser gyi mdog can bri bar bgyi'o// de'i g.yon rol du 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bri bar bgyi'o// de'i g.yas
129b6(rgyud): rol du 'phags pa lag na rdo rje bri bar bgyi'o// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ni 'das bu mda' rgyu'i kha dog ltar dkar ba'o// lag na rdo rje ni sngo bsangs te rgyan thams cad kyis
129b7(rgyud): brgyan pa'o// lag na rdo rje'i g.yas rol du ni rgyal ba ldan ma sngo bsangs la de'ang rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'o// de'i 'og rol tu ni sgrub pa po lag na pog por thogs par bri'o// de nas
130a1(rgyud): zhag gsum sbyang ba bgyis te/ mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la ri mo'i sku gzugs la mchod pa rgya cher bgyis la/ gu gul gyi bdug pa sreg cing ri mo'i su gzugs kyi
130a2(rgyud): mdun du zhugs bus la ka ra wI ra'i me tog zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar la bsnyugs pa brgyad stong sbyin sreg bgyi'o// de nas me thab nas ka ra wI ra'i me tog pad+ma'i tshad tsam du 'byung
130a3(rgyud): ngo ka ra wi ra'i pad+ma'i dbus nas ka ra wIr 'dra ba'i ldong ros 'byung ste/ rig pa'i rgyal po bzlas brjod bgying bzhin du de blang bar bgyi'o// blangs pa tsam gyis gdugs shar ba'i mangs
130a4(rgyud): lta bu dang / skra lung lo 'khyil ba dang / lo bcu drug lon pa'i lus lta bur 'gyur/ lo brgyad khri thub par 'gyur/ nam mkha' la mchi ba dang / mnyam pa ma mchis pa dang / kha
130a5(rgyud): zas ci 'tshal ba rnams 'tshal bar 'gyur ro// rig sngags 'chang rnams kyi spyod yul ma lags par 'gyur ro// bdag 'gum pa'i dus 'tshal bar 'gyur ro// gal te slad kyis
130a6(rgyud): kyang brtson 'grus bskyed na tshe de'i nyis 'gyur thub par 'gyur ro// yar gyi ngo zla ba nya la nyin zhag gcig spyang ba bgyis te/ mchod pa bgyis la me tog dri zhim po lan brgyad stong phul na kar sha
130a7(rgyud): pa Na lnga stsal to// dgra bskrad par 'tshal na yar gyi ngo tshas gcig la dur khrod kyi gnas su zhugs bus la dur khrod kyi thal bas sbyin sreg bgyis na bskrad par 'gyur ro// mar gyi ro zhag bcu
130b1(rgyud): bani la nyin nag gcig srung bu bgyis te/ lag na rdo rje'i mdun du pri yang ku'i shing gis zhugs bus la be ka ta'i lam sreg shing brgyang stong sbyin sreg bgyis na nor srol to// dpal che dar /
130b2(rgyud): babyin lag na rdo rje'i mdun du til gyis lan brgyang stong bzlas brjod bgyi'o// dbye bar bgyin yar gyi ngo chos lnga la nyin zhag gcig smyung ba bgyis te/ lag na rdo rje'i mdun du mon sran gre'u las/
130b3(rgyud): lan brgya stong sbyin sreg bgyis na dbye ba bgyis par 'gyur ro// tshes grangs dang skar ma padam mi 'tshal/ smyung ba bgyi mi 'tshal te/ lag rdo rje'i mdun du gdugs bdun dus gsum du ba ru
130b4(rgyud): rabargya rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg bgyis na phyugs chung rnyed do// bud med dbang du bgyis na gdugs bdun dus gsum du mon sran gre'u las sbyin sreg bgyi'o// skyes pa dbang du bgyi na mar gyi na zhag bcu
130b5(rgyud): bzhi la lag na rdo rje'i mdun du nyin zhag gcig smyung ba bgyis ti las lan rgyad stong bgyin skyes pa dbang du 'gyur ro// rA dzA ma te ba shI ka ra mi shuk+ka pra ti pa d+ha maM b+he badz+ra pA Ne rak+Sha ta ar+k+ka a se rag nim badz+ra/
130b6(rgyud): l+ya gI ta sa ra sha ba naM aSh+Ta ha sa sr-i dzu phu yang ya bid a s+tha mi ti ba sha/ rgyal ba ldan ma'i cho ga rdzogs so// / rdo rje lcags sgrogs gi las rnams lags te/ rig sngags
130b7(rgyud): bcing na srad bu la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis te marung pa dor ro// yungs kar gyis ni zhugs kyi ra bar 'gyur ro// chab kyis ni yul gru chen por 'gyur ro// thal bas ni rdo rje ra bar
131a1(rgyud): 'gyur ro// bcing ba thams cad rdo rje lugs sgrog 'di nyid sbyor bar bgyi'o// gang dag bdag gi rig pa mchog gi cho ga rgyas pa la dam tshig mthong nas 'jig rten pa dang /
131a2(rgyud): 'jig rten las 'das pa'i rig sngags sgrub pa de dag la/ gang dag bgegs bgyid dam rdzas 'phrog pa de dag ni dam tshig ma 'tshal cing rigs la 'khu ba lags te/ de dag ma rung bar bgyi ba'i
131a3(rgyud): sad du las 'di brtsam par bgyi'o// tsan dan dmar po las lag na rdo rje'i gzugs bgyis te mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la nyin zhag gcig sbyang ba bgyis te/ lag na rdo rje'i mdun du seng ldeng gi
131a4(rgyud): shing gis zhugs bus la/ sha chen po sreg blugs lan bdud sbyin sreg bgyis te/ de'i 'og tu 'di skad ces lha 'am/ gnod sbyin nam/ grub pa 'am/ rig sngags 'chang ngam/ log
131a5(rgyud): 'dren nam/ log 'dren gyi g.yog 'khor ram/ grul bum mam/ 'byung po 'am/ sha za 'am/ gang gis bdag gi rdzas ji ltar khyer ba des slar byin cig ces brjod par bgyi'o// de sdang
131a6(rgyud): thos nas gal te des su la na ni cang mi bgyi'o// gal te ma stsal na yang 'di skad skrag par bgyi ste/ gang gis bdag gi rdzas khyer ba des slar byin cig ces bgyi'o// ci ste ma stsal na
131a7(rgyud): lag na rdo rje'i rigs las phyi rol pa lag na rdo rje'i rigs la 'khu ba lags pas/ bya gag gi rtug pa blangs la yang lan gsum brjod par bgyi'o// de ltar bgyis kyang ma stsal na bya
131b1(rgyud): grag gi drug pa lag na rdo rje la bdug cing rig sngags kyang lan brgyad bcu bzlas brjod bgyi'o// de nas lag na rdo rje'i rigs la 'khu ba des kyi hud kyi hud ces mchil tshig cings phyogs/
131b2(rgyud): der lung ngo // mig kyang 'jar ro// 'gum par yang 'gyur ro// de'i rigs rabs chad par 'gyur ro// nor ni slar khugs par 'gyur ro// gsad par ni mi bgyi'o// gdon gyi las
131b3(rgyud): rnams kyang bgyi ste/ sa zin pa 'am ma zin pa'ang rung ste yid kyis dbab par bgyi'o// bye'u rug pa'i lo ma 'am/ sra rtsi pog gam/ chab kyis dug las gso bar bgyi'o// bdag
131b4(rgyud): gso zhing mdze nad ma mchis par bgyi na dog sa la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis la bsku bar bgyi'o// nad krita ta sim ma mchis par bgyi na srang bu la ldan brgya rtsa brgyad
131b5(rgyud): bzlas brjod bgyis la/ gang na nAd kri ta si mchis pa der bcing bar bgyi'o// mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la nyin nag 'i srung ba bgyis te/ lag na rdo rje'i mdun du bil ba'i shing gis thugs
131b6(rgyud): bus la bil ba'i yam sreg shing khri sbyin sreg bgyis na longs spyod dag stsol lo// yar gyi ngo nya la nyin zhag gcig sbyong ba bgyis te/ lag na rdo rje'i mdun du a pa marga'i yam sreg shing
131b7(rgyud): khri rig pa mchog dang lhan cig pas sbyin sreg bgyis na/ rdo rje lcags sgrog mthong zhing gang bslangs pa de stsol lo// rdo rje lcags sgrog gi cho ga rdzogs so//
132a1(rgyud): rdo rje ser mo'i las rnams lags te/ gdon babs pa gtong bar bgyin chub kyis bgyi'o// 'dar bar bgyin mdzub mo la lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis
132a2(rgyud): bstan na 'dar ro// gdon rnam par gzhom na yid kyis lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyi'o// chab kyis ni rengs par bgyid do// rig pas bcings pa las dgrol na rdo rje ser mo'i sngags lan
132a3(rgyud): bdun brjod de/ song zhig song zhig ces brjod na grol bar 'gyur ro// bcings pa dgrol na lan 'bum bzlas brjod bgyis pas 'grol lo// rkang rdul la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod
132a4(rgyud): bgyis pas thig le bgyis na gang bsams pa de rnyed do// mar gyi ro zhag bcu bzhi nas zhag gcig srung ba bgyis te/ n+ya gro d+ha gcig pu mchis par mchis la mchod pa rgya cher bgyis
132a5(rgyud): te/ n+ya gro d+ha'i drung du mchis la shwe sh+le ta ka'i lo ma ngag gi steng du rtswa dur ba'i lo ma bzhag ste/ 'bar gyi bar du bzlas brjod bgyi'o// 'bar nas mgo bor bzhag na re me tog gi
132a6(rgyud): 'phreng bar 'gyur ro// des mgo la bcings na dpag tshad steng du gyen du 'phag go// lo khri nyis stong thub bo// zla ba spang kis zin pa'i tshe zhag gcig sbyang ba bgyis la/ lag na rdo rje'i
132a7(rgyud): mdun du ras dkar po bzhag la 'bar gyi bar du bzlas brjed bgyis na/ blangs pa tsam gyis gdugs shar ba lta bu'i mdog can du 'gyur zhing lo nyis stong thub par 'gyur ro// rdo rje ser
132b1(rgyud): mo'i cho ga rdzogs so// / shugs ldan ma'i las rnams lags te/ gdon tshar gcad na dur khrod kyi sol bas gzugs bris la/ lan gsum bzlas brjod bgyis/
132b2(rgyud): pa'i lcug mas gnus na gdon gyis gtong ngo // sba las bgyis pa'i srad bu gtun shing gis brdungs na gdon du zhing gtong ngo // gzegs ma las sbyin sreg bgyis na gdon gyi yan lag
132b3(rgyud): 'tshig par 'gyur ro// ba lang gi lci ba las gzugs bgyis la lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis pa'i thur mas mig phyung na zhar bar 'gyur ro// lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis pa'i gsems
132b4(rgyud): shing ljon pa la bsnunan 'pho bar 'gyur ro// dbab na me tog gis bgyi'o// dgrol na yid kyis so// 'di dag la sogs pa ni gdon gyi las rnams lags so// bsrung ba ni lan
132b5(rgyud): shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis pa'i thal bas bgyi'o// yul gru bsrung ba ni lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis pa'i chab kyis bgyi'o// baspang ba ni yungs kar gyis bgyi'o// nang par
132b6(rgyud): langs te shugs ldan ma'i sngags lan brgya rtsa brgyad brjod na/ nad thams cad las thar bar 'gyur ro// bud med dbang du bgyi na mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad nas brtsams te/ dgung bdun dus
132b7(rgyud): gsum du lung thang gi shing gis zhugs bus la/ til gyi sreg blugs lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sbyin sreg bgyis na dbang du 'gyur ro// rA dzA na ba ma shi ka ma kr-iSh+Na sra a b+ha mi ma a ho ra tr-i sha~M te/
133a1(rgyud): na badz+ra pA Ni ra g+hu ta ti la ka sh+le ra ka ni pra dzA l+ya ru d+hi ra ak+Sha naM ra dzi ka naM aSh+Ta ha sa sr-i dzu hU yaM ba sho b+ha ba ti/ rgya mtshor 'bab pa'i chu ngogs gnyis ka'i sa blangs la za ma
133a2(rgyud): tog bgyis te/ zam tog der lig buM mig stsal le/ za ma tog kyang mi thod kha sbyar gyi nang du stsal te/ mar gyi po nas brgyad nas dgung gsum spyang ba bgyis te/ mtshan gcig mtsha
133a3(rgyud): par mchis la lho phyogs su mchis te mi thod thogs la 'bar gyi bar bzlas brjod bgyi'o// 'bar nas blangs te rig pa mchog gis bsrung ba bgyis te lig bu mig gcig la btags te/
133a4(rgyud): lig bu mig de 'o ma dang lhan cig 'tshal na 'tshal ba tsam gyis skra lcang lo 'khyil bar 'gyur/ mtshon gang dag 'phangs pa de dag phye mar lpags par 'gyur/ lo drug khri thub par 'gyur
133a5(rgyud): dbang phyug chen po'i tshogs rnams grogs su 'gyur ro// mar gyi ro zhag bcu bzhi la nyin zhag gcig smyung ba bgyis te/ lag na rdo rje'i mdun du byang chub kyi shing gis zhugs bus la me tog
133a6(rgyud): ut+pal zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar la bsnyugs pa brgyad stong sbyin sreg bgyis na yul rnyed ngo // 'byung po thams cad dbang du bgyi bar 'tshal bas mar gyi ngo zhag gsum du sbyang ba bgyis
133a7(rgyud): te dur khrod du mchis la pri yang ku'i shing gis zhugs bus te mar la lan brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg bgyis na 'byung po thams cad mchi bar 'gyur te/ de dag la phyag brnyan gyis shig
133b1(rgyud): ces brjod na gang dang gang du bsos pa de dag thams cad bgyid do// yar gyi ngo tshes lnga la nyin zhag gcig sbyang ba bgyis te/ lag na rdo rje'i mdun du ma ti muk+ka ka'i me tog stong rtsa brgyad/
133b2(rgyud): phul na longs spyod rnams stsol te/ shugs ldan ma'i cho ga rdzogs so// / rdo rje gdong gi lus rnams lags te/ lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis pa'i
133b3(rgyud): bum pas gdugs bdun khrus bgyis na sdig pa thams cad las grol bar 'gyur ro// byis pa gang dag gdon gyis zin te khrug bgyis na gtong bar 'gyur ro// gdon gyis zin pa rnams
133b4(rgyud): la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis pa'i bdugs pas bdugs na gtong bar 'gyur ro// gang dag nam gru dang / srul po dang / gdon brnyan nas zin pa de dag mtshon sna lnga'i
133b5(rgyud): skud pa la mdud pa bdun bor te lag pa la bcings na gtong ngo // dug las gso na yal gas bgyi'o// srin bu ti ka sa zin pa dang / nad tsi lu ta dang / rkang shu byung ba la sa la lan
133b6(rgyud): nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis te bskus na lan gsum gyi tha ma la sos par 'gyur ro// phyag rgya gzhig na chab kyis bgyi'o// dbyigu dug bsal bar bgyi na rkang lag bkrus
133b7(rgyud): la snod du stsal te/ de nas rtsa ku shas bya ba sa na 'byang bar 'gyur ro// gdon spon lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis pa'i thal bas bgyi'o// nad tsi lu ma mchis par bgyi na
134a1(rgyud): mtshon rnon pos sa shur gyis dra sa la yang rked bcang na ci ma mchis par 'gyur ro// nang bri ha ma mchis par bgyi ba'ang de bzhin no// 'dzer ba ma mchis par basbyin/
134a2(rgyud): sa la lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis pas bgyi'o// mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi la nyin zhag gcig srung ba bgyis te/ lag ra rdo rje'i mdun du mchod pa ci nus su bgyis la gi'u wang ras dkar po'i
134a3(rgyud): steng du banag ste 'bar gyi bar du bzlas brjod bgyi'o// 'bar nas blang bar bgyis te/ blangs nas thig le bgyis na mi ganga' bar 'gyur/ 'byung po thams cad kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ro//
134a4(rgyud): zla ba gcig srong mo pa'i zas 'tshal zhing tha mar zhag gsum sbyang ba bgyis la/ mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi la lag na rdo rje'i mdun du mchod pa rgya cher bgyis te/ shu dag chad par bcangs la sbrul du gyur gyi/
134a5(rgyud): bar du bzlas brjod bgyi zhing / des mi 'jigs par bgyi'o// slar yang shu dag tu gyur kyi bar du bzlas brjod bgyi'o// de nas bza' bar bgyi ste/ 'tshal ba tsam gyis gdugs shar ba lta bu'i
134a6(rgyud): mdog can du 'gyur zhing lo lnga skyong thub par 'gyur ro// mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la lha chen po'i gnas su mchis la nyin zhag gcig sbyang ba bgyis la/ lha chen po'i gzhog sa g.yas par lig bu mig a
134a7(rgyud): shAt+tha'i lo ma'i steng du bzhag ste/ du ba 'thul gyi bar du bzlas brjod bgyi'o// de nas lig bu maug blangs te lha'i skal ba bzhig la mig la bskus na mi gda' bar 'gyur ro// lo bdud stong thub
134b1(rgyud): par 'gyur ro// a rka'i me tog dur khrod kyi mes bsregs nas mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la nyin zhag gcig smyung ba bgyis nas lha chen po'i gnas su ma ti sa la/ shing a shwat+tha'i lo ma'i steng du bzhas/
134b2(rgyud): ste lan brgyad stong bzlas brjod bgyis la thig le bgyis na mi gda' bar 'gyur ro// lo lnga stong thub par 'gyur ro// zla ba gcig 'o smyo 'tshal zhing mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi la mi'i rus pa zla gab lta bur
134b3(rgyud): bgyis la/ de nas rigs sngags 'chang gis ring srel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten gyi drung du lag ni rdo rje'i gzugs dang / dbang phyug chen po'i gzugs bzhag la/ rig sngags 'chang gis bcom ldan
134b4(rgyud): 'das dang / lag na rdo rje dang / dbang phyug chen po la rgya cher mchod de/ rig sngags 'chang gi sa yar gyi ngo'i tshe sa brgyad nas nyin zhag gcig spang ba bgyis la/ zla gam blangs te ras dkar po'i
134b5(rgyud): steng du bzhag la 'bar gyi bar du bzlas brjod bgyi'o// 'bar nas blangs te mgo bor bzhag na ci 'dod pa'i gzugs can du 'gyur ro// lag na rdo rje dang / dbang phyug chen po'i gzugs su'ang
134b6(rgyud): bsgyur/ yid kyis gang bsams pa de thams cad kyang 'grub bo// lo stong thub par 'gyur ro// 'chi ba'i dus kyang 'tshal lo// zas su 'o skyo 'tshal zhing lag na rdo rje'i mdun du sh+le sh+le ta ka'i shing
134b7(rgyud): gis zhugs bus la/ a pa mtha'i yam sreg shing 'bum sbyin sreg bgyis na rgyal po nyid thob bo// rdo rje gdong gi cho ga rdzogs so// / rdo rje lte ba'i las rnams lags te/
135a1(rgyud): ri mo'i mngan gso sbyong brdung bas mgod pa'i ras la sbyin dang ma 'dres pa'i tshon gyis 'phags pa lag na rdo rje mdog stobasangs rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ dar ras ras kyi
135a2(rgyud): thabs can bri bar bya'o// de'i g.yas rol tu rdo rje'i lte ba gser gyi mdog lta bu bri bar bgyis te/ de'ang rgyaran thams cad kyis brgyan par bgyi'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang zas su'o skyo 'tshal bar
135a3(rgyud): bgyi'o// mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi nas zhag gsung sbyang ba bgyis te/ ci nus kyi brjod pa bgyis la tsan dan dmar po mtho gang la rdo rje bgyis te/ rdo rje'i rkeng par ldong ros bzhag la/ byang chub kyi
135a4(rgyud): shing gi lo mas g.yogs te/ dngos grub rnam gsum byung gi bar du bzlas brjod bgyi'o// 'bar bar gyur na bskal par gnas shing rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ro//
135a5(rgyud): dpag tshad stong gyen du 'phags cing de'i mo la slar mchi'o// gang gi tshe 'grub pa de'i tshe lag na rdo rje'i rigs su ste'o// ci ste du ba 'thul nas blangs te thig le bgyis na mi gda' bar 'gyur te/ lo bcu
135a6(rgyud): drug lon pa lta bu'i lus su 'gyur/ lo bdun stong thub par 'gyur ro// dro bar gyur nas blangs la thig ler bgyis na gang mthong ba de dbang du 'gyur te/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gtogs pa'ang dbang du
135a7(rgyud): 'gyur ro// zla ba gcig zas su chu grogs 'tshal zhing mar gyi ngo nag brgyad nas zhag gsum smyung ba bgyis te/ ba lang gi lngas sam/ kun dga' ra ba 'am/ yang na gnas gtsang mar mchod pa rgya cher/
135b1(rgyud): bgyis la/ ldong ros til gyi lo ma bdun gyi steng du bzhag ste/ gdol pa'i bu mo'i mo mtshan nam/ 'jib la bgyis pa'i mo mtshan gyi steng du gzhag par bgyi zhing / gdol pa'i bu mo ral gri thogs pa/
135b2(rgyud): babazhi phyogs bzhir bzhag par bgyis la/ de nas rig sngags 'chang gis dngos grub rnam pa gsum byung gi bar du bzlas brjod bgyi'o// 'bar bar gyur na gdugs shar ba 'dra ba'i mdog tu 'gyur/
135b3(rgyud): sgralung lo 'khyil bar 'gyur/ lo bcu drug lon pa lta bur 'gyur/ 'og tu dpag tshad stong du mchi bar 'gyur/ steng du'ang de bzhin mchi bar 'gyur/ dpag tshad stong tshun chad kyis thos shing mthong
135b4(rgyud): bar 'gyur/ lo khri nyis stong 'tsho bar 'gyur/ nam mkha' la rlung gi shugs dang mtshungs par 'gyur/ grub pa thams cad kyang 'dis dbang du 'gyur/ tshes grangs dang skar ma bdam mi 'tshal/
135b5(rgyud): srung ba bgyi mi 'tshal te/ bud med kyi ro blangs la lig bu mig de'i mo mtshan gyi steng du bzhag ste/ mar gyi de zhag brgyad la nyin zhag gcig snang ba bgyis la/ lag na rdo rje'i bdun du mchod pa bgyis te/
135b6(rgyud): lan brgya stong bzlas brjod bgyis la/ lig bu mig de blangs te mig la bskus na mi gda' bar 'gyur/ lo bdun stong thub par 'gyur ro// mar gyi ngo zhag brkyang la zhag gcig sbyang ba bgyis te/
135b7(rgyud): gdol ba'i khyim nas zhugs blangs la seng ldeng gi shing gis zhugs bus te dug dang khrag dang bsres pa'i yungs kar gyis lan brgyad stong sbyin sreg bgyis na/ gang gi ming nas spos te sbyin sreg
136a1(rgyud): bgyis pa de dbang du 'gyur ro// mar gyi ngo zhag bcu gnyis la mi rus kyi thur mas blangs te lan brgyad stong bzlas brjod bgyis la dgra'i khyim sgor btsugs na dgung
136a2(rgyud): gsum gyis 'bros par 'gyur ro// rdo rje lte ba'i cho ga rdzogs so// me kha la'i las rnams lags te/ srung ba bgyid na lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis pa'i srad
136a3(rgyud): bus lag pa la bcing bar bgyi'o// yul gru srung na lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis pa'i chab kyis bgyi'o// dbab na bye'u rug pa'i lo ma 'am rma bya'i mdongs kyis bgyi'o// gdon la gnod
136a4(rgyud): pa bgyid na chab kyis bgyi'o// khyim mam/ lha khang ngam/ kun dga'i ra bar mchis la gang du bzlas brjod bgyis pa de nas 'byung po dang gdon thams cad 'bros par 'gyur ro// gdon tshar
136a5(rgyud): gcad na rdza gis gzugs bris la gang bas mnan d+helan bcwartsa brgyad brgyas brjod bgyis na gdon gyi rigs zung bar 'gyur ro// rig pa smra ba na dog pa nyid las 'di bgyis te/ lagan
136a6(rgyud): mdun du shwe shwe ta ka'i shing gis zhugs bus la ku ra ba'i me tog brgyad stong sbyin sreg bgyis na lha des rig pa'i lha bzung nas khrid de mchi'o// khrid de mchis nas dngos grub tu 'gyur ro//
136a7(rgyud): ciste log 'dren rnams kyi rigs sgrub par 'tshal na log 'dren rnams kyi log 'dren gyi rigs ni bzhi mchis te/ so gcig pa'i rigs dang / kam po dza'i rigs dang / rnam par 'joms
136b1(rgyud): pa'i rigs dang / phung byed kyi rigs so// so gcig pa'i rigs la gtsug pud 'phyang la sogs pa log 'dren brgyad khri mchis te/ de dag ni stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na ba seMH/
136b2(rgyud): bgyid // kam po dza'i rigs la ni dbang phyug chen po'i g.yog 'khor ba yang rna ba la sogs pa la bgegs drug khri mchis te/ dbang phyug chen po'i cho ga rgyas pa la bgegs bgyid cing rig par
136b3(rgyud): 'joms par bgyid do// rnam par 'joms pa'i rigs la ni 'jig rten stong ba'i g.yog 'khor mya ngan med pa sogs pa log 'drer drug khri mchis te/ de dag kyang dbang phyug chen po dang phur bu gsu/
136b4(rgyud): pa'i cho ga rgyas pa la bgegs bgyid do// phung byed kyi rigs la ni lag rna rdo rje'i g.yogs 'khor murda ta ka la sogs pa'i log 'dren bye ba phrag 'bum mchis te/ de dag ni rig pa'i cho ga rgyas pa thams
136b5(rgyud): cad la bgegs bgyid cing rig pa'ang 'joms par bgyid do// 'di ni log 'dren de dag gi sgrub pa lags te/ so gcig pa'i rigs kyi sgrub pa ni mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi la nyin zhag gcig srung ba/
136b6(rgyud): bgyis te/ lag na rdo rje'i mdun du dur khrod kyi shing gis zhugs bu sa la ba lang gi mkhris pas sngags pa'i yungs kar la lan brgyad stong sbyin sreg bgyis na/ kyi hud kyi hud ces 'chi nga'i sgra grag cing grub
136b7(rgyud): par 'gyur te/ grub nas kyang sgrub pa la bgegs mi bgyid de/ bde bar sgrub tu mchis so// kam po dza'i rigs kyi sgrub pa ni mar gyi ngo zhag lnga la nyin zhag gcig srung ba bgyis te/ lag na rdo rje/
137a1(rgyud): dang dbang phyug chen po mchod pa bgyis nas/ lag na rdo rje'i mdun du arka'i shing gis zhugs bus la mor srang gre'u dang mar bsres pa la lan brgyad stong sbyin
137a2(rgyud): sreg bgyis na/ lag na rdo rje'i gzugs 'gul te/ de nas grub par 'gyur ro// grub nas kyang dbang phyug chen po'i cho ga rgyas pa bklags pa tsam gyis rig pa thams cad 'grub bo//
137a3(rgyud): rnam par 'joms pa'i rigs kyi sgrub pa ni mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi la nyin zhag gcig spur ba bgyis te/ mtshan gcig mchis par mchis la/ mtshan gcig pa la mchod pa chen po bgyis
137a4(rgyud): la rnga log 'dren rnams la'ang gtor ma bgyi'o// de'i mdun du bai kang ta'i zhugs bus la khrag dang bsres pa'i yungs kar gyi sa lan brgyad stong sbyin sreg bgyis na de'i 'og tu grib ma gda' zhing grub
137a5(rgyud): par 'gyur ro// rnam par 'joms pa'i rigs grub na leg 'dren rnams dbang du 'gyur ro// gang dang gang du dgos pa de thams cad bgyid do// phung byed kyi rigs kyi sgrub pa ni zla ba phyed zas
137a6(rgyud): su'o skyo 'tshal zhing mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi la nyid zhag gcig smyung ba bgyis te/ lag na rdo rje'i mdun du mchod pa rgya cher bgyis la zhugs mar gnyis bus te/ gcig ni lag na rdo rje la dbul
137a7(rgyud): lo gcig ni mudza ta ka la dbul lo// de nas rig sngags 'ching gis bsrung ba bgyis la/ lag la rdo rje'i mdun du seng ldeng gi shing gis zhugs bus te na le sham dkar po bdag gi khrag dang
137b1(rgyud): bsres byas lanu brgyad skyong sbyin sreg bgyis na/ lag na rdo rje'i rkang pa g.yas pa'i mthe bong las 'od zer byung ste/ de nas grub par 'gyur ro// bung byed kyi rigs srub du rig pa'i cho ga thams can/
137b2(rgyud): bde bor sgrub tu mchis to// bgegs ma mchis pa'o// log 'dren de dag kyang phyag b.rar du 'gyur ro// log 'dren rnams kyang rig sngags 'jang la gsang sngags stsol te/ des lo stong
137b3(rgyud): thub par 'gyur ro// zas su 'o thug 'tshal zhing lag na rdo rje'i mdun dru lar 'bum bzlas brjod bgyis na me kha la grub par 'gyur te/ gdugs gcig bzhin kar sha pa Na brgyad stong stsol to//
137b4(rgyud): rtag tu bzlas brjod bgyis na dgra las rgyal lo// mar gyi ro zhag gcig spur ba bgyis te/ lag na rdo rje'i mdun du pad+ma brgyad sdong phul na/ rig pa'i rgyal po dam pa stsol bar 'gyur ro// me ba
137b5(rgyud): la'i cho ga rdzogs so// / gdong dkar mo'i las rnams lags te/ ri mo mkhan gso sbyong bzung bas ma gor ba'i ngas la spyi dang ma 'dres pa'i tshon gyis lag na rdo rje mdo/
137b6(rgyud): sngo ba sangs rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ pho nya mo bcu gnyis kyis bskor ba bri bar bgyi ste/ kha dog ji lta ba bzhin du bri bar bgyi'o// po nya mo thams cad kyang rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa
137b7(rgyud): bri bar bgyi'o// tha mar ri'i rtse mo rnams bri bar bgyi'o// de nas rig sngags 'angang gis yar gyi ngo tshes gcig nas brtsams te zas su chu grog 'tshal ning mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la zug gi bar du bzlas
138a1(rgyud): brjod bgyi'o// mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la nyin zhag gcig srung ba bgyis te/ lag na rdo rje la mchod pa rgya cher bgyis la 'byung po'i gtor ma'ang bzang du bgyi'o// de'i 'og/
138a2(rgyud): tu rig sngags 'chang gis ri mo'i gzugs kyi mdun du byang chub kyi shing gis zhugs bus la pad+ma zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar la bstsags pa brgyad stong sbyin skyeg bgyi'o// de nas ca co'i sgra chen
138a3(rgyud): po grag par gyur to// de la'ang mi 'jigs par bgyi'o// de nas gdong dkar mo gzugs mi sdug par bsgyur nas mchi ste/ de la'ang mi 'jigs par bgyi'o// rdo rje bzhad pa'i bzlas brjod
138a4(rgyud): bgyis la/ de la 'di skad ces la gar rdo rje'i gdang chen ma bcom ldan 'das ma khyod legs par byor tam zhes brjod par bgyi'o// de de skad thos nas dga' bar 'gyur te/ des 'di skad du
138a5(rgyud): ci bya ba zhes brjod pa dang / bcom ldan 'das ma lo lnga skyong thub par 'tshal lo zhes brjod par bgyi ste/ de bzhin du gyur cig ces brjod nas dga' ba'i yid kyis ral gri stsol te/ de nas mi
138a6(rgyud): gda' bar 'gyur ro// ral gri de blangs nas skra lung lor 'khyil bar 'gyur/ gdugs shar ba lta bu'i mdog can du 'gyur/ rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi snying du sdug par 'gyur
138a7(rgyud): ro ma bsgrubs par las rnams 'grub par 'gyur ro// dbab par bgyi na gdon gyis zin pa'i rkang pa la rkang pas mnan te dbab par bgyi'o// 'byung po dang sha za rnams dbab na lan
138b1(rgyud): bdud bzlas brjod bgyis pa'i yungs kar gyis bgyi'o// dug las gson yal gas bgyi'o// gdon bza' bar bgyi na lan gsum bzlas brjod bgyis pa'i me tog dmar pos
138b2(rgyud): bgyi'o// gdon 'khums par bgyi na yid kyis bzlas brjod bgyis pas bgyi'o// dbye bar bgyi na mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad nas brtsams te/ lag na rdo rje'i mdun du bdugs bdun dus gsung
138b3(rgyud): du ba ru ra'i shing gis zhugs bus la/ sbrul khog brjes pa'i sreg blugs gsub sbyin sreg bgyi'o// long bar bgyi na dbang phyug chen po'i gnas su mchis la ne'u le'i lces lan brgyad
138b4(rgyud): brgya sbyin sreg bgyi zhing ming nas phyung na leng bar 'gyur ro// lag ra rdo rje'i mdun du shu dag brgyad brgya sbyin sreg bgyis na snga mkho bzhin du 'gyur ro// gdong dkar mo'i cho ga rdzogs so//
138b5(rgyud): rdo rje ser mo'i las rnams lags te/ yar gyi ngo tshe sa brgyad nas brtsams te dur khrod du zla ba drug bzlas brjod bgyis ra rgyal po nyid stsol to// zla ba gsum bzlas
138b6(rgyud): brjod bgyis na nyi tshe ba'i longs spyod rnams stsol to// zla ba gcig bzlas brjod bgyis na ri na ra khri nyis stong stsol to// zas su ni slong mo'i zas rnams bza' bar bgyi'o// dgra bskad
138b7(rgyud): par 'tshal na bya nag bkra'i 'dab ma blangs te/ lag na rdo rje'i mdun du lan brgyad stong bzlas brjod bgyis la dgra'i khyim du bzhag na dgra 'phral du 'bros so// gzhan nad kyis 'debs par
139a1(rgyud): 'tshal na mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la lag na rdo rje'i mdun du shing badz+ra'i rtsa bas rdo rje la bdug par bgyi zhing / rig pa'ang lan brgyad stong bzlas brjod bgyis na gang yid la
139a2(rgyud): bsams pa de nad kyis thebs par 'gyur ro// lag na rdo rje'i mdun du lce pog gis bdug cing rig pa'ang lan brgyad stong bzlas brjod bgyis na gsos pa bgyis par 'gyur ro// 'byung po
139a3(rgyud): dang sha za rnams rengs par bgyi na yid kyis bgyi'o// dbab pa ni me long gis bgyis te/ me'i sbyin sreg bgyis pa'i thal bas dag par phyis la khye'u dag bstan na bden pa brjod do//
139a4(rgyud): gdon pa skrad na yungs kar gtun du brdungs na ngu zhing gtong bar 'gyur ro// dur khrod kyi sol bas sa la gzugs bris la/ de'i lag pa'am mgul par lag na rdo rje bris te mnan na gtong
139a5(rgyud): bar 'gyur ro// mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la nyin zhag gcig smyung ba byas te/ lag na rdo rje'i mdun du yungs kar za ma tog tu stsal la bzlas brjod bgyis na ngas reg pa tsam gyis gdon du zhing gtong
139a6(rgyud): bar 'gyur ro// dgra gsad par 'tshal na dur khrod kyi sol ba blangs la gzugs bris te snying khar mnan la bzlas brjod bgyis na 'phral du dgra ma lags par 'gyur ro// tshes grangs dang
139a7(rgyud): skar ma bdam mi 'tshal/ smyung ba bgyi mi 'tshal te/ dgra bskam par bgyi na mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la shing mnga' na las gzugs bgyis la seng ldeng gi dung bu snying khar btsugs te/ rig pa
139b1(rgyud): gang lan brgyad stong bzlas brjod bgyis na nad drag pos 'debs shing bskams par yang 'gyur ro// phyung na sos par yang 'gyur ro// rdo rje ser mo'i cho ga rdzogs so//
139b2(rgyud): nag ser gyi las rnams lags te/ yul gru bsrung na chab kyis bgyi'o// mtshams bcad na lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis pa'i phur bus bgyi'o// sman bsrung na yid kyis bgyi'o//
139b3(rgyud): rkang gnyis pa dang rkang bzhi pa rnams dgar na thal mos brdabs pas bgyi'o// rig sngags bcad na mtshon rnon pos sa la shub rar dras na rig sngags bcad par 'gyur ro// gdon dbab na
139b4(rgyud): yid kyis bgyi'o// gdon spon lan bdud bzlas brjod bgyis pa'i me tog gis bgyi'o// yar gyi ngo tshes brgyad la nyin zhag gcig sbyang ba bgyis te/ rgya mtshor 'bab pa'i chu klung du zhugs
139b5(rgyud): la rig pa lan brgyad stong bzlas brjod bgyis na 'grub par 'gyur ro// grub nas las su gyur te/ glang po che rengs par bgyi ba dang / na rengs par bgyi ba dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshigs reg
139b6(rgyud): par bgyi ba dang / gang yid la bsams pa de dag thams cad rengs par bgyid do// mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la nyin zhag gcig srung ba bgyis te/ nag mo'i mdun du arka'i shing gis zhugs du
139b7(rgyud): la 'bras sA lu mar dang bsres pas lan brgyad stong sbyin sreg bgyis na nag mo mchis par 'gyur te/ de la pho nya mo'i gsang sngags kyis mchod yon phul na de khyod nyid la dam pa gang sbyin par bya
140a1(rgyud): zhes smra bar 'gyur ro// de la 'di skad du sa'i bdag por gyur pa stsol cig ces brjod par bgyi'o// des 'di skad du yul gcig gi rgyal por gyur cig ces brjod na/
140a2(rgyud): de bzhin du gyur cig ces brjod par bgyi ste/ slar gtang ba'i gsang sngags kyis kyang slar gtang zhing / me tog dkar pos kyang sngar btang na de nas mi gda' bar 'gyur ro// lung thang gi shing drungan
140a3(rgyud): gtum mo kha shar phyogs su bstan pa mchis pa de'i mdun du mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la zhag gcig smyung ba bgyis te du ba ma mchis pa'i mngag mar mar me'i snying po brgyad stong bor na ti na ra stong stsolato/
140a4(rgyud): nag ser gyi cho ga rdzogs so// / rdo rje bstod de 'dzin pa'i las rnams lags te/ mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la zhag gcig smyung ba bgyis te/ lag na rdo rje'i mdun du
140a5(rgyud): me tog dkar po brgyad stong phul na mtshan mas btab pa stong stsol to// mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi la zhag gcig srung ba bgyis te/ lag na rdo rje'i rkang pa g.yas pa'i mthe bong nas bzung la
140a6(rgyud): gzugs 'gul gyi bar du bzlas brjod bgyis na yid kyis bsams pas rengs par bgyid de/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas su mchis pa'i sems can de dag thams cad rengs par bgyid do// yid
140a7(rgyud): kyis grol bar 'gyur ro// mar gyi ro zhag brgyad la zhag gcig smyung ba bgyis te/ lag na rdo rje'i mdun du lag na rdo rje la mchod pa bgyis la shing sh+le sh+le ta ka'i phur bu blangs te skud par mar
140b1(rgyud): pos dkris la/ de ras rig sngags 'chang gi sa pa la sha'i shing gis zhugs bus te/ phur bu la lar brgya stong bzlas brjod bgyis la/ de nas dum bu gsum du bcad de dum bu re re la lan nyi shu/
140b2(rgyud): rtsa re re bzlas brjod bgyis la zhugs su bor na nang par ti na ra sum stong stsol to// yar gyi ngo tshes brgyad la zhag gcig sbyang ba bgyis te/ rgya mtshor 'bab pa'i chu klung du zhugs la pad+ma 'bus/
140b3(rgyud): phul na rgyal po nyid stsol to// skyes pa dbang du bgyin par gyi ngo zhag brgyad la zhag gcig srung ba bgyis te/ lag na rdo rje'i mdun du byang chub kyi shing gis zhugs bus la ku mu da'i me tog zhi
140b4(rgyud): dang sbrang rtsi dang / mar la bsnyugs pa brgyad stong sbyin sreg bgyis na skyes pa dbang du 'gyur ro// bud med dbang du bgyi na mar gyi ngo zhag bcu gnyis la lag na rdo rje'i mdun du dri mchog
140b5(rgyud): gi me tog brgyad stong gis lag na rdo rje la bsnun na bud med dbang du 'gyur ro// rdo rje bstod de 'dzin gyi cho ga rdzogs so// // rdo rje seng ge'i khri'i las rnams lags
140b6(rgyud): te dbab na gdon gyis zin pa 'am ma zin pa'ang rung / gu gul gyis dbab bo// gdon bcings na yid kyis bgyi'o// gdon skrag par bgyi na lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis pa'i thal
140b7(rgyud): mos brdeb par bgyi'o// gdon 'bros par bgyi na sol bas gzugs bris la lcug mas bsnun na gtong bar 'gyur ro// gdon bskam na gu gul gyi bdug pas bgyi'o// gdon bza' bar
141a1(rgyud): bgyi ra lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis pa'i shas bgyi'o// gdon bcad na mchod rnon pos rtsa ku sha bcang na gdon pa cad par 'gyur ro// dug sngon chab bam yal gas
141a2(rgyud): bgyi'o// byis pa gdon gyis zin pa rnams la yal gas byabs par bgyi'o// chur mi 'bying bar bgyi na lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis pa'i yungs kar gyis bgyi'o// mtshon gyis mi tshugs
141a3(rgyud): par bgyi na yid kyis bgyi'o// mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi la lag na rdo rje'i mdun du tsan dan dmar pos gdong dmar bris te/ de la gtor ma sna tshogs sprul cing grog mkhar gyi sa la mdung rtse gsum pa
141a4(rgyud): bgyis te lag pa g.yon na rdo rje thogs pa mdung rtse gsum pa'i steng du mchis te/ lan brgya stong bzlas brjod bgyis na gter mthong bar 'gyur ro// yar gyi ngo tshes lnga nas brtsams te rgya mtshor
141a5(rgyud): 'bab pa'i chu klung du zhugs la lan 'bum bzlas brjod bgyis na rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur/ rig sngags 'chang dgu stong gi g.yog 'khor dang ldan par 'gyur ro// bskal/
141a6(rgyud): par gnas par yang 'gyur ro// zla ba gcig zas su 'o skyo 'tshal zhing mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi la zhag gsum smyung ba bgyis te/ dbang phyug chen po'i gnas su mchis la glo g.yas logs su mchod
141a7(rgyud): pa bgyis te/ phag rgod kyi mche ba la gi'u wang gis bskus la ras dkar po'i steng du bzhag ste/ rig pa bzlas brjod bgyis na bgegs rnam pa sna tshogs 'byung ste/ rig pa'i rgyal pos bsdun
141b1(rgyud): par bgyi'o// de nas mche ba de 'bar bar 'gyur te/ 'bar nas thang bar bgyi'o// blangs ma thug tu mdung rtse gsum par 'gyur te/ rig sngags thams cad kyi spyod yul du mi 'gyur
141b2(rgyud): dpag tshad sdong gyen du 'phag par 'gyur ro// lo dgu song thub par 'gyur ro// rdo rje seng ge'i khri'i cho ga rdzogs so// / rdo rje ldan ma'i las rnams lags te/ ri mo
141b3(rgyud): mkhan gso sbyong bzung bas ma gong pa'i ras la sbyin dang ma 'dres pa'i tshon gyis 'phags pa phyag na rdo rje mdog bya sangs rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa bri bar bya'o// de'i g.yas rol du rdo rje sde dang
141b4(rgyud): lag bzangs kyang bri bar bgyi ste/ gnyis ka'ang gser gyi mdog can rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan par bgyi'o// g.yon rol du rdo rje ldan ma rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa bri'o// tha mar ri'i rtse mo
141b5(rgyud): rnams bri bar bgyi'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis tshes gcig nas brtsams te zas su 'o skyo 'tshal zhing zla ba nya'i bar du bzlas brjed bgyi'o// de nas zhag gsum srung ba bgyis te/ bcom ldan
141b6(rgyud): 'das la mchod pa rgya cher bgyis la bil ba'i shing gis zhugs bus la bil ba'i me tog zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar la bsnyugs pa brgyad stong sbyin sreg bgyis na de nas rdo rje sde 'bul nas 'grub par 'gyur
141b7(rgyud): te nyid gcig bzhin ti na ra lnga lnga stsol to// de bzhin du dgod par bgyi'o// mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi la zhag gcig sbyang ba bgyis te/ ri mo'i gzugs kyi mdun du du ba ma mchis pa'i mngag ma
142a1(rgyud): la a kaR+sha klong sbyin srem bgyis na/ ma'i gzugs kyi ma tog gi 'byung ba 'gul nas thub par 'gyur te/ krung nas yul bu stsol to// bung med dang du brtsin
142a2(rgyud): gdugs bdun dus gsum du kar l+li ra'i shing gis nus bus la mar dang bsres pa'i yungs kar gyis sbyin sreg lan brgyang stong bgyi'o// lugs mo dbang du bgyi nas phyogs gtsang mar lung ba
142a3(rgyud): shing gis rmugs byas pa trail la lan brgyang kong sbyin sreg bgyis na lugs sa mo dbang du 'gyur ro// skyes pa dbang du bgyin mar gyi zhig bcu bzhi la zhig gcig spang ba bgyis te/ lag
142a4(rgyud): rarje'i mdun du man gyi shing gis zhugs bus la se che'i 'phrul ldan brgyad song sbyin sreg pahU~Ms na dbang du 'gyur ro// rje rje ldan ma chog rdzogs so// rdo rje bzha
142a5(rgyud): las rnams lags te/ dbab na me tog dkar po dag gis bgyi'o// bcing na yid kyis bgyi'o// spar skul na lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis nga'i chab kyis bgyi'o// gar bgyid du stsal na guT
142a6(rgyud): gyis bdug par bgyi'o// zas stsal na kar wI ra'i me tog la lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis pas bgyi'o// brjod du stsal na lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis pa'i yungs kar gyis bsnun na 'das
142a7(rgyud): pa dang ma 'ongs pa brjod do// gdon dgod du stsal na lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis pa'i me tog gtor ro// bcings na chab kyis bgyi'o// brdeg na se gol gtogs par bgyi'o// tshar gcad
142b1(rgyud): na rtsa la lan bdun sngags kyis btab la mgo la bzhag na myos par 'gyur te gdon 'bros so// gcod na pa lang gi wI ba las gzugs bgyi sa la mchon rnon pos bcung na bcad par 'gyur ro//
142b2(rgyud): don bsdigs pa dang rgyug tu gzhugs na mdzub mos bsdigs par bgyi'o// gdon dkyil 'khor du gzhug na rdo rje'i phyag rgyas bsdur na dkyil 'khor du gzhug go// gdon 'thos par bgyir
142b3(rgyud): gdon gyi mdun du lan brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg bgyis na gdon du zhing 'bros so// gdon sngon yid kyis gar 'tshal ba der rbad do// du ba dbab na sra rtsi pog gi bdug pas bgyi'o// pur bu dang nga
142b4(rgyud): ra lung thang gi lo ma'i bdug pas bgyi'o// rims dbab na kA ra wI ra'i me tog gis bdug pas bgyi'o// rims zhag bzhi pa rabab na mangs bgyi'o// bsrung ba bgyi na lan bdud bzlas brjed
142b5(rgyud): bgyis pa'i srad bus bgyi'o// chang ma rung bar bgyi na gseg ma la lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyi sa la khang stengs su bor na chang ma rung bar bgyis par 'gyur ro// gdon gyis btab par bgyin

143a2(rgyud): phyogs su bstan la/ de nas rig sngags 'chang gis rdo rje bzhad ma brjod par bgyis na bud med de dgod cing ldang bar 'gyur te/ de la nyal bar bgyi'o// gal te ma
143a3(rgyud): nus na rig sngags 'chang gi sa la gor du rig pa mchog dran par bgyi zhing / snying po gnyis ka bzlas brjod bgyis pa'i yungs kar gyis bsnun par bgyi'o// de nas bud med de dgod cing mchi ste
143a4(rgyud): de la rtse bar bgyi'o// de nas bud med de sbrum par gyur te/ de nas rig sngags 'chang gis rdo rje bzhad ma bzlas brjod bgyis pa'i yungs kar gyis bsnun par bgyi'o// de nas de mi 'gul
143a5(rgyud): bar 'gyur ro// yang rig pa mchog gi yungs kar gyis bsnun par bgyi'o// de nas lho 'gas te rdo rje bzhad mas bzlas brjod bgyis la mngal blang bar bgyi'o// mngal blangs nas kyang yuH
143a6(rgyud): kar gyis bsnun na dum bu brgyar 'gyur te phru ma'i nang du stsal la/ mi thod gsum gyi steng du mchis la yongs su smin par 'gyur gyi bar du rdo rje bzhad ma bzlas brjod bgyis la blangs te

146b7(rgyud): de nas mur+ha Ta ka sa lag na rdo rje'i rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te bdag bcing ba'i gsang sngags smras pa/ na mo rat+na tra ya s+ya/ na ma sh+tsan+ta badz+ra pA Ni s+ya/ tad+ya thA/ rdzi rdzi ru ru kha ri ba kha ri/
147a1(rgyud): tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ tsal tsa la ya/ badz+ra pA Ni s+thA/ a kro d+ha p+la sha d+d+haM/ sA ra s+pha ra/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha swAhA/ lag na rdo rje dang mur+Na Da ka'i mdun du me tog dmar po dang 'dug pas/
147a2(rgyud): mchod la/ de nas sgrub pa'i dus na srad bu dkar po la mdud pa gsum dor ro// su zhig rtag tu 'chang ba de la thams cad dngos grub tu 'gyur ro// sgrub pa thams cad dang las thams cad
147a3(rgyud): du'ang spra tshil las mur+ha Ta ka'i gzugs bgyis te/ lag pa g.yon na mdung rtse gsum pa thogs par bgyi'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis tsan dan dmar po'i mdung rtse gsum pas snying

147a7(rgyud): brgyan pa bri'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i g.yas rol du ni 'phags pa kun dga' bo gser gyi mdog can lag na rnga yab thogs pa bri'o// lag na rdo rje'i 'og logs su pu Ta ka mdog dparal
147b1(rgyud): mig gsum pa 'dod pa'i gzugs 'dzin pa gang mo rta gang 'dzin cing / lag pa g.yas pa kha 'gram du bzhag pa bri'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis mar gyi ngo 'og bcu bzhi la nyim dag
147b2(rgyud): gcig sbyang ba bgyis la/ ri ma'i gzugs la mchod pa rgya cher bgyis la/ de'i mdun du a kar sha'i shing gis zhugs bus te yungs kar dang / til nag mo dang / 'bras yos dang /
147b3(rgyud): 'di rnams mar dang bsres la lan brgya stong bgyis na ri mo'i gzugs kyi me tog gi 'phreng ba 'gul bar 'gyur te dngos grub tu 'gyur ro// dngos grub tu gyur na rdo rje'i rigs thams cad kyi
147b4(rgyud): dngos grub tu 'gyur ro// las gzhan dag kyang bgyis te sbrul gyis bzin pa dbab na sra rtsi phog gi bdug pas bgyi'o// gdon bslad na rkang rjes kyi sas lag mthil du mdung rtse gsum bris

148a2(rgyud): dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol te/ bcom ldan
148a3(rgyud): 'das bdag gis kyang lag na rdo rje la gsang sngags sul bar bgyi'o// lag na rdo rje 'di ni kho bo'i gos dkar mo'i snying po bton pa tsam gyis 'grub pa ste/ 'di kho bos brjod par bgyi'o//
148a4(rgyud): 'di bton pa tsam gyis sems can thams cad rengs par 'gyur ro// na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yo/ b+ha ga ba te/ oM b+ha ya nA sha ni trA sa ni/ trA sa ya/ b+h+r-i ku Ti ta ti b+he/ ta ti swAhA/ rig pa
148a5(rgyud): 'di bton pa tsam gyis bgegs thams cad bcom par 'gyur ro// bdag bsrung na thal ba la lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis pas bgyi'o// gzhan bsrung ba spyi bor lan gsum bzlas
148a6(rgyud): brjod bgyis te sgra mdud par bgyi'o// sems can thams cad rengs par bgyi na yid kyis bgyi'o// dbang du bgyi na yar gyi ngo zla ba nya la zhag gcig bsrung ba bgyis la/ 'phags pa
148a7(rgyud): spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mdun du byang chub kyi shing gis zhugs bus la til lan brgyad stong sbyin sreg bgyis na dbang du 'gyur ro// ma rungs par bgyi 'tshal na mi rus kyi phur bu blangs la/
148b1(rgyud): lan brgyad stong sngags kyis btab ste/ dgra'i khyim du btsugs na dgra ma rung bar 'gyur ro// dgra 'gum na mar gyi ngo zhag brgyang la dur khrod kyi thal ba blangs te dur khrod kyi zhugs su lan brgyad stong /
148b2(rgyud): sbyin sreg bgyis na 'gur mo// bskam nu mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi la chab lte ba nub tsam du zhugs la dgra'i srog bskams kyi bar du bzlas brjod bgyi'o// mtshams gcad par 'tshal na seng ldeng
148b3(rgyud): gi phur pa sor bzhi pa blangs te/ phur bu re re la'ang lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis la phyogs bzhir btsugs na mtshams bcad par 'gyur ro// yul 'khor bcing na lan nyi shu rtsa gcig
148b4(rgyud): bzlas brjod bgyis pa'i chab kyis bgyi'o// sems can rnams bskrang na lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis pa'i yungs kar bgyis bgyi'o// lig bu mig dang ldong ros bsgrub na zla ba gcig zas
148b5(rgyud): su 'o skyo 'tshal zhing / yar gyi ngo tshas brgyad nas nag gsum smyung ba bgyis te ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten nam/ sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar shing a shwat+thati lo ma bdun
148b6(rgyud): gyi steng du lig bu mig dang ldong ros bzhag pa dngos grub gsum byung gi bar du bzlas brjod bgyi'o// 'bar na ni lo stong thub par 'gyur ro// rig sngags 'chang sga lhung lo 'khyil pa can du 'gyur/
148b7(rgyud): ro ngu ba 'thul na ni mi gda' bar 'gyur ro// lo dgu stong thub par 'gyur ro// yul 'khor ma rung bar bgyid par 'tshal bas mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la dur khrod kyi shing gis zhugs bus la
149a1(rgyud): yungs kar dang / dug dang / khrag dang bsres la lan brgyad stong sbyin sreg bgyis na yul 'khor ma rungs par 'gyur ro// mar gyis lan brgyad stong sbyin sreg
149a2(rgyud): bgyis na ni bar 'gyur ro// dgra 'gum na tshes grangs dang skar ma bdam mi 'tshal te/ lung theng gi shing gis zhugs bus la shing arka'i lo ma lan brgyad stong sbyin sreg bgyis na zhag
149a3(rgyud): gsum na 'gum mo// gshegs 'gyeng na rig pa bzlas brjod bgyis la gdong byugs na rgyal bar 'gyur ro// khros pa'i mdun du bzlas brjod bgyis na dga' bar 'gyur ro// yugs
149a4(rgyud): sa mo dbang du bgyi bar 'tshal bas yar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mdun du me tog dkar po brgyad stong sbyin sreg bgyid na dbang du 'gyur ro// dgra tshar
149a5(rgyud): gcad na 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mdun du du ba ma mchis pa'i mdag mar rgya skyegs kyis lan brgyad stong sbyin sreg bgyi'o// bzlas brjod bgyis na gang 'dod pa de rnyed par
149a6(rgyud): 'gyur ro// mkha' 'gro ma thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor bcing ba yungs kar la lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis pas bgyi'o// chu srin kun bi ra'i kha bcing na gseg ma la lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis te
149a7(rgyud): chab tu bor mabacing bar 'gyur ro// seng ge dang / stag dang / ma he dang / glang po che dang / rgyal po dang / chom rkun gyi nang du chud na bsam par bya'o// ri mo mkhan gso sbyong bzung bas ma god pa'i ras la
149b1(rgyud): sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs bri bar bya ste/ g.yon rol du ni lag na rdo rje/ g.yas rol du ni 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug go// de bzhin gshegs pa ni gser gyi mdog can du dri'o// lag na/
149b2(rgyud): rdo rje ni lo bcu drug tsam lon pa'i gzugs 'dral kha dog sngo bsangs rgyun thams cad kyis brtan par bri'o// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug gi g.yas rol du ni lha mo bri/ de'ang 'dam
149b3(rgyud): bu mda' rgyu ltar dkar ba'o// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyang de dang 'dra'o// lha mo ni pad+mo'i 'phreng bas brgyan par bri'o// de'i 'og rol du sgrub pa pog por thogs par bri'o// sgrub pa po zla ba
149b4(rgyud): gcig gi bar du zas su 'o skyo 'tshal zhing yar gyi ngo tshes brgyad la mchod pa rgya chen po bgyis te/ lha mo la 'od zer byung gi bar du bzlas brjod bgyi'o// 'od zer de de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs
149b5(rgyud): kyi mthe bor nub par 'gyur ro// de nas dngos grub tu 'gyur te rgyal po nyid stsol to// yid kyis gang bsams pa de dag thams cad 'byor to// yar gyi ngo zla ba nya nas zhag gsum sbyang ba bgyis//
149b6(rgyud): te rgya mtshor 'bab pa'i chu klung du zhugs la pad+mo 'bum bor na lha mo nyid mthong ngo // dam pa gang blangs pa de rnyed de rgyal po nyid dam rig sngags 'chang nyid du 'gyur ro// tha mar zhag gsum sbyong ba bgyi'o//
149b7(rgyud): 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug gi cho ga rdzogs so// / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// lag ni rdo rje ngas
150a1(rgyud): kyang gang gis rdo rje'i rigs dang / cho ga rgyas pa chen po gzhan dag kyang 'grub par 'gyur ba'i gsang sngags cho ga rgyas pa 'dir sbyin par bgyi'o// de lta bas na cho ga rgyas
150a2(rgyud): pa thams cad du 'di gcig pu sbyar bar bgyi'o// lag na rdo rje 'di dran pa tsam gyis rig pa'i lha thams cad mngon du 'gyur ro// na ma sarba ta thA ga te b+h+yo/ b+ha ga bad+d+haHoM ru ru sU ru dz+wa la tiSh+Tha sid+d+ha
150a3(rgyud): lo tsa ne sarba ar+tha sA d+ha ni swA hA/ lag na rdo rje spyan 'di ni sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba phrag bcus dgongs te/ ngas kyang da lhor sems can rnams kyi don dang /
150a4(rgyud): khro bo rnams dga' bar bya ba dang / gdul dka' ba rnams gdul ba'i phyir bshad do// ri mo mkhan gso sbyong dang ldan pas ma god pa'i ras la sbyin dang ma 'dres pa'i tshon gyis sangs rgyas kyi/
150a5(rgyud): sku gzugs gser gyi mdog can chos ston pa bri bar bya'o// de'i g.yas rol du 'phags pa lag na rdo rje mdog sngo ba sangs rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa chos nyan par bri'o// de bzhin gshegs
150a6(rgyud): nga'i g.yon rol du 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'dam bu mda' rgyu ltar dkar ba/ skra'i thor tsugs dang cod pan can stag lpags kyi sham thabs gyon pa/ lag na rnga yab
150a7(rgyud): thogs pa bri bar bya'o// de nas zla ba phyed zas su 'o skyo 'thung zhing rig pa bzlas brjod bya'o// des mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi la nyin zhag gcig smyung ba bgyis te/ ri me'i gzugs la mchod pa
150b1(rgyud): rgyu cher byas la rig pa lan brgyad stong bzlas brjod bu'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i glo g.yas nas 'od zer byung ste lag na rdo rje la nub na grub par 'gyur ro// rgyal po nyid dam rig sngags 'chang /
150b2(rgyud): nyid de dpa pa gnyis skyid par byed do// rgyal po nyid du gyur na rig sngags 'chang rnams kyi 'khor los skur bar 'gyur ro// rig sngags 'chang nyid du gyur na ni rig sngags 'chang drug khri'i bdas
150b3(rgyud): po nyi ma shar ba lta bu'i mdog can lo bcu drug lon pa lta bu'i lus su 'gyur ro// lo khri bzhi stong thub par 'gyur ro// sems can thams cad kyi skad shes par 'gyur ro// slong mo'i zas
150b4(rgyud): bzang zhing ri'i rtse mor ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten gyi drung du me tog dkar po zho dang / sbrang rtse dang / mar la bsrugs pa 'bum sbyin sreg bya zhing lan 'bum bzlas brjod byas na/
150b5(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs mngon sum du 'gyur te/ mthong nas gang sgrub pa de 'grub bo// su zhig rtag tu lan gsum brjod cing phyag rgyang 'tshal na de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba phrag bcu
150b6(rgyud): la bsti stang byas pa dang / bla mar byas pa dang / rim gro byas pa dang / mchod pa byas par 'gyur ro// gang gi tshe shi ba de'i tshe bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro// mar gyi donag brgyad la nyin ni/
150b7(rgyud): gcig smyung ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas la tsAn dkar pos dkyil 'khor byugs te/ rig pa lan brgyad spong bzlas brjed byas na de nas dngos grub tu 'gyur ro// de'i 'og/
151a1(rgyud): tu las thams cad la sbyar bar bya'o// mig la lan bdud bsngags na gang mthong ba de dbang du 'gyur ro// lag ra rdo rje'i mdun du ldong ros la lan brgyad brgya bzlas
151a2(rgyud): brjod byas nas mig la bskus na gang mthong ba de dbang du 'gyur ro// rkang rjes kyi sa blangs la lan bdun sngags kyis btab ste/ bud med gang gi mgo bor gtor na de dbang du 'gyur ro// bdag
151a3(rgyud): gi mchil ma la lan bdun bsngags te thig le byas na gang mthong ba de dbang du 'gyur ro// gang gi ming nas brjod de yungs kar la lan brgyad brgya sbyin sreg byas pa de dbang du 'gyur ro// bud med/
151a4(rgyud): dbang du byA na til nag po la lan brgyang brgya sbyin sreg bya zhing ming nas kyang brjod na de dbang du 'gyur ro// kriSh+Na tsa tu ra da sh+ye na shwe ta/ puSh+Ta na ma aSh+Ta sa ha swe Na/ badz+ra pA Ni ra ha na ta ba pya/ rA dza ba
151a5(rgyud): dani ya sho ba ti/ ldong ros kyis lag mthil du gzugs bris la ming nas brjod cing nyi ma la bltas te lan brgyad brgya bzlas brjod byas na dbang du 'gyur ro// dur khrod kyi sol ba blangs te rtsig
151a6(rgyud): ngos la gzugs bris la mo mtshan gyi steng du mdzub mo bzhag ste lan brgyad brgya bzlas brjod byas na dbang du 'gyur ro// spra tshil la gzugs byas te ldan pa g.yas par bzhag la lan brgyad
151a7(rgyud): brgya bzlas brjod byas na dbang du 'gyur ro// gi'u wang dang / shu dag dang / dung gyi lte ba dang / rgya spos rnams bsres te btags la rig pa lan brgyad stong bzlas brjod byas te zas dang / skob dang /
151b1(rgyud): bza' ba'i nang du btab na dbang du 'gyur ro// dur khrod kyi thal ba blangs la lag ni rdo rje'i mdun du lan brgyad brgya bzlas brjod byas te gang la gtor ba de dbang du 'gyur ro// lag na rdo rje'i mdun du me/
151b2(rgyud): tog dkar po brgyad brgya gtor na dbang du 'gyur ro// dur khrod kyi sol ba blangs te rtsig ngos la gzugs bris la shing ka ra wI ra'i me tog brgya rtsa brgyad mo mtshan du phog par byas na dbang du 'gyur ro// bal
151b3(rgyud): gi lci ba sal ma lhung ba blangs te zhi ba'i mtshan gcig byas la/ de'i mdun du rtswa ku sha las mdung rtse gsum byas pas nyi ma gsum du yungs kar dang / zho dang / sbrang rtsi bsres pa'i sreg blugs lan
151b4(rgyud): bdun bdun sbyin sreg byas na dbang du 'gyur ro// lag na rdo rje'i mdun du ldum bu ba sha ka'i yam sreg shing brgyad brgya sbyin sreg byas na dbang du 'gyur ro// gzhon nu ma dbang du bya na a rang gi ni me tog
151b5(rgyud): brgyad stong gis lag na rdo rje la phog par byas na gzhon nu ma dbang du 'gyur ro// yug sa mo dbang du bya na lag na rdo rje'i mdun du mon sran gre'u sbyin sreg bya zhing ming nas kyang brjod na dbang du 'gyur ro// bral
151b6(rgyud): ba la lan bdun sngags kyis btab ste bud med la gtor na dbang du 'gyur ro// bud med kyi mdun du rig pa lan brgyad brgya bzlas brjod byas na dbang du 'gyur ro// shing bu sor bzhi pa blangs te
151b7(rgyud): g.yabs na 'ong zhing dbang du 'gyur ro// me tog dkar po blangs te lag ni rdo rje'i mdun du lar brgyad stong bzlas brjod byas la bud med mthong bar galabs na 'ong zhing dbang du 'gyur ro// gzhan yang las/
152a1(rgyud): byed pa 'dod na bu mo gtsang mas bkal ba'i skud pa brkyang nas blangs te/ lag na rdo rje'i mdud du nyis lugs dang bzhi khrugs byas pa bzhag la bzlas brjod byas te gshes /
152a2(rgyud): 'khril na dgongs pa 'grub par 'gyur ro// gi'u wang bsgrub par 'dod pas nyi ma bdun zas su 'o skyo 'thung zhing yar gyi ngo tshes bcu bzhi la nyin zhag gcig smyung ba byas te/ lag na rdo rje la mchod
152a3(rgyud): pa rgya cher byas la gi'u wang pad+ma'i snying du bzhag ste/ 'bar gyi bar du bzlas brjod bya'o// 'bar nas blang bar bya'o// blangs pa tsam gyis nyi ma shar ba lta bu'i me dog dang ldan par 'gyur ro// dgos/
152a4(rgyud): pa thams cad yid kyis bsams pa tsam gyis 'byung bar 'gyur/ rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyis mi sod par 'gyur/ lo dgu stong thub par 'gyur ro// zla ba phyed zas su'o skyo 'thung zhing / de nas
152a5(rgyud): rig sngags 'chang gis grog mkhar gyi sa la nor rgyas kyi gzugs byas la de'i steng du 'dug ste/ nam 'gul bar gyur kyi bar du rig sngags lan 'bum bzlas brjod byas na longs spyod ster ro//
152a6(rgyud): 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba rnams ston par 'gyur/ lo lnga brgya thub par 'gyur/ bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur/ zas su 'o skyo 'thung zhing lag na rdo rje'i mdun du lan 'bum
152a7(rgyud): bzlas brjod byas na longs spyod ster te/ zla ba gcig gis bar du slong mo'i zas bza' zhing yar gyi ngo tshes bcu bzhi la zhag gcig smyung ba bgyis te/ lag na rdo rje la mchod pa byas nas/ bcom
152b1(rgyud): ldan 'das la'ang ldag par mchod de/ lag na rdo rje'i rkang pa nas bzung la rig sngags bzlas brjod byas te/ lug na rdo rje'i gzugs 'bul bar gyur kyi bar du bzlas brjod pa'o// 'dul bar
152b2(rgyud): gyur na grub pa thams cad kyis mthong bar 'gyur ro// yid kyis bsams pas khwa zas 'byung bar 'gyur/ lo lnga stong thub par 'gyur ro// de nas gnod sbyin gyi dbang po lag na rdo rjes/ bcom ldan/
152b3(rgyud): 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag sems can rnams kyi don gyi slad du gsang sngags 'di lta bu gsungs pa ni ngo mtshar to zhes nas/ 'khor thams ca/
152b4(rgyud): ngo mtshar du gyur to// sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyi cho ga rdzogs so// / de nas 'byung po'i bdag po dbang ldan gyis bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas
152b5(rgyud): pa'i lgang sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gi ming 'di
152b6(rgyud): ni rig pa thams cad kyi gtso mo lags te/ 'di drad pa can gyis bdag gis dngos grub stsal bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang sems can rnams kyi don gyi slad du byang chub
152b7(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po lag ni rdo rje la ming dbul bar 'tshal lo// 'byung po'i bdag po de bzhin du gyis shig/ de nas 'byung po'i bdag po dbang ldan gyis/ lag na rdo rje'i zhabs gnyis la
153a1(rgyud): gtugs nas lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so// gsang ba'i bdag po khyod kyis rig sngags chen po'i ming 'di bzhes su gsol/ na mo ru drA ya/ le le/ li li li
153a2(rgyud): li ka mu kA ya swA hA/ lig bu mig bud med kyi sgras bcings la rgya mtshor 'bab pa'i chu klung gi ngos gnyis ka'i 'jim pa blangs pa'i nang du bcug ste bsregs la/ dbang phyug chen po'i
153a3(rgyud): gnas su song ras mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad dam bcu bzhi la zhag gcig smyung ba byas te lig bu mig blangs la lan brgya stong bzlas brjod byas nas sbyang bar bya ste/ mig la bskus nas gang la
153a4(rgyud): bltas na de dbang du 'gyur ro// mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la dur khrod kyi sol ba blangs te me'i thod pa la brdar nas lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas pas thig le byas na gang la bltas de dbang du 'gyur/
153a5(rgyud): ro/ sol ba'ang bsgrub par bya ste/ zhag bdun gyi bar du zas su chu dang phye'i 'dag gu za zhing mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi la zhag gcig smyung ba bgyis te dur khrod du song la/ de nas thag bu la
153a6(rgyud): sbyang nul ba ko tsam byas te/ mched pa chen po byas nas dur khrod kyi sol ba blangs te/ de ras rig sngags 'chang gis sel ba mi'i thod pa'i nang du bzhag la lag pas mnan te dung par 'thul bar
153a7(rgyud): gyur kyi bar du rig sngags bzlas brjod byas nas blangs te thig le byas na lus mi snang bar 'gyur zhing / bsams pas kyang kha zas 'byung bar byed de tshe lo stong thub par 'gyur la/ dbang phyug
153b1(rgyud): rin po'i las rnams bklags pa tsam gyis 'grub par 'gyur ro// tshes grangs dang skar ma 'dam mi 'tshal smyung ba'ang bgyi mi 'tshal bar bud med shi ba'i ro blangs la dri dang me tog gis brgyan te/
153b2(rgyud): de'i mo mtshan du til gyi lo ma bzhag nas/ de'i steng du ldong ros srang gcig gam/ srang phyed bzhag la 'bar bor gyur gyi bar du rig sngags bzlas brjod byas te/ 'bar bar gyur na dbang phyug
153b3(rgyud): chen po'i gzugs dang ldan par 'gyur zhing rab tu 'joms pa'i tshogs kyis bskor la/ lo dgu stong thub cing dbang phyug chen de'i tshogs rnams dbang du 'gyur ro// dur khrod kyi thal ba blangs te/
153b4(rgyud): mi'i thod pa'i snod du bzhag la/ mtshan gcig 'dug pa'i gnas su song nas zhag gsung smyung ba byas te/ mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi la 'byung po'i gtor ma'ang byas la/ de nas thong ba'i snod lag tu
153b5(rgyud): blangs te dngos grub rnam gsum du gyur kyi bar du bzlas brjod byas nas/ dud pa 'thul pos ni lus mi sdang bar 'gyur zhing tshe lo brgya stong thub par 'gyur ro// 'bar bar 'gyur te thi ga le byas pas
153b6(rgyud): ni swa lung lo 'khyil bar 'gyur zhing / nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang / tshe lo lnga stong thub par 'gyur ro// gi'u wang bsgrub par 'dod pas ni mar gyi ngo zhag gcig sbyang ba byas te/ lag na rdo rje'i
