346a2(rgyud): yan lag gi phyag rgya'o// de nyid las lag pa g.yon pa'i mdzub mo btang ste/ de bzhin du bzung ba ni gdon zhi bar bya ba'i phyir pho nya mo thams cad kyi spyi'i phyag rgya yin no// de bzhin du
346a3(rgyud): mdzub mo dang gung mo brkyang ba ni rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgya'o// de nyid las mdzub mo cung zad bkug ste g.yon brkyang ba'i tshul du byas pa ni spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya'o// gung mo'i rtse mos
346a4(rgyud): mthe bong bkab ste mdzub mo brkyang ba ni gdon 'joms pa'i phyag rgya'o// rtsa ba'i phyag rgya de nyid las mdzub mo dang srin lag gnyis kyis phyi rol nas dkris la g.yas brkyang ba'i tshul du
346a5(rgyud): byas pa ni mi bzad pa'i phyag rgya'o// de nyid las g.yon brkyang ba'i tshul du byas pa ni rnam par rgyal ba mi bzad pa'i phyag rgya'o// phyag rgya de nyid mgo bor bzhag pa ni 'jig pa'i phyag
346a6(rgyud): rgya'o/ rkang pa'i g.yas brkyang gi tshul du byas la lag pa g.yon pa sta zur gyi phyogs su bzhag nas/ g.yas pa'i mthe bong gi ngos kyis mthe'u chung dang srin lag bsnol ba mnan te/
346a7(rgyud): guphung mo bsgrengs la mdzub mo cung zad bkug nas rna ba'i phyogs su bzhag pa ni bcom ldan 'das ma rdo rje lcags kyu ma'i rtsa ba'i phyag rgya'o// de nyid las mthe bong btang ba ni lcags kyu mi/
346b1(rgyud): phyag rgya tha dad pa yin no// g.yon brkyang gi tshul du byas la lag pa g.yon pas de bzhin du byas pa ni lcags kyu'i phyag rgya'o// rtsa ba'i phyag rgya nyid las rkang pa bsnams te bsgreng ba ni sa'i
346b2(rgyud): lha mo'i phyag rgya'o// rtsa ba'i phyag rgya las rkang pa gnyis bskum la mdzub mo brkyang ste bstan pa ni rdo rje lcags kyu me'i gdon zhi bar bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// mdun logs su mdzub mo gcig gi
346b3(rgyud): dbus bkug ste bzhag la gud mo brkyang ste bstan pa ni rdo rje gdan gyi phyag rgya'o// g.yon pa'i sor mo gnyis kyang de bzhin du byas pa ni lha'i phyag rgya'o// mdzub mo gcig pu ni 'jam dpal
346b4(rgyud): gyi phyag rgya'o// gung mo ni rdo rje mdzes ma'i phyag rgya'o// g.yas brkyang gi tshul du gnas la lag pa g.yon pa'i sen mo rnams sbas te/ khu tshur bcangs nas de bzhin du lag pa
346b5(rgyud): g.yas pa'i rdo rje brkyang ste blta ba'i dmigs su gtad pa ni rdo rje khu tshur gyi phyag rgya'o// mdzub mo steng du bzhag pa ni snying po'i phyag rgya'o// gung mo'ang de ltar byas pa ni nye ba'i snying nge'i/
346b6(rgyud): phyag rgya'o// gung mo dang mthe bong gnyis sbyar la sor mo gzhan rgyab tu bzhug pa ni rdo rje 'joms ma'i yin te/ phyogs bzhi srung ba yin no// g.yas brkyang gi tshul gyis lag pa g.yon
346b7(rgyud): pa'i rdo rje g.yas pa'i dpung mgor bzhag la/ lag pa g.yas pa'i rdo rje bstod nas dpung pa g.yon pa rna thabs su bzhag ste blta ba'i dmigs su gtad pa ni rdo rje phag mo'i phyag rgya'o//
347a1(rgyud): g.yon brkyang gi tshul gyis lag pa g.yon pa bkan la mdzub mo dang mthe'u chung gnyis bkug ste pad+ma'i rtsa ba ltar byas la/ g.yas pa'ang de nyid dang 'dra bar bzhan/
347a2(rgyud): pa ni lus dmar gyi phyag rgya'o// 'bar ba'i phyag rgya'ang de nyid yin no// snying po gang nas 'byung ba'i phyag rgya'ang de nyid yin no// rdo rje b+h+ring gi ri ti'i phyag rgya'ang de nyid yin no// g.yas brkyang
347a3(rgyud): gi tshul gyis lag pa g.yon pa bkan te brkyang la mthe bong dang mthe'u chung so sor bskyed nas so sor mo lhag ma rnams klu mgo'i gdengs ka ltar gzhag/ g.yas pa'ang mtshan nyid de
347a4(rgyud): dang 'dra bar byas la/ gzhu 'gengs pa ltar gru mo rna ba'i phyogs su bzung ba ni klu chen po'i phyag rgya'o// khyab 'jug gi 'dug sbyangs kyis mthe bo'i sen mo rkang pa g.yon pa'i 'og tu sbyar te/
347a5(rgyud): lag pa stengs dang bcas par sbyar ba'i mthil gyis brdeg cing lag pa bsnol bas bzung la/ pheM long gi thabs su gyen du sbar zhing lag pa bskor te bkan pas nu ma'i bar du brdeg cing
347a6(rgyud): bskor la/ lag pa gnyis ka'i mthil logs kyi sor mo la bltas nas/ mig gyen khar bsgyur te bteg la glog sgyur ba'i phyag rgya'ang bcings nas g.yon pa'i sor mo'i rdo rje chen po bsten
347a7(rgyud): pa byas na/ des lha dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / klu dang / srin po rnams dang / log 'dren rnams dang / 'gram na gnas pa thams cad dang / tshangs pa dang /
347b1(rgyud): skem byed dang / dbang chen dang / drag po la sogs pa'i snying la glog 'gyu ba'i shugs 'di bab pas 'ong bar 'gyur te/ mthu stobs bcom nas rdo rje'i rjes su mthun pa dang dul zhing
347b2(rgyud): rdo rje la 'dud par 'gyur ro// de dag gi phyir zhi bar byas na de'i tshe phyag rgya de snying bar bkrol ba de dag de'i mod las mthun par bde bar 'gyur ba'i phyir dang zhing byams pa'i sems dang ldan par/
347b3(rgyud): bzlas brjed bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das ma rdo rje lu gu rgyud kyi phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid 'byung ste/ lag pa g.yod pa phyir bstan g.yas pa nang du bstan te gcig tu sbyar nas lag pa'i
347b4(rgyud): sor mo rnams kyi g.yon pa'i mthe'u chung nas brtsams te ri re nas bzung ste dkris la/ gru mo bsnams nas phyag rgya snying khar bzhag ste mthe bong gnyis kyis so so'i srin lag mnan la
347b5(rgyud): lag pa gnyis phyir bstan pa ni bcom ldan 'das ma rdo rje lu gu rgyud kyi rtsa ba'i phyag rgya'o// thabs de nyid las lag pa gnyis pa bkan pa ni bcings pa'i phyag rgya'o// lag pa gnyis
347b6(rgyud): ka'i mdzub mo dang mthe bong gdu bu ltar phan tshun sprad pa 'di ni rdo rje lu gu rgyud tha dad pa yin no// mthe bong gnyis bkyed pa ni rdo rje sgrog gi phyag rgya'o// g.yon pa bkan la g.yas pa
347b7(rgyud): las phub ste sor mo rnams gcig la gcig bsdams pa 'di'ang rdo rje lu gu rgyud kyi phyag rgya yin no// de las khu tshur bcangs te mthe bong gnyis brkyang ba ni rdo rje thog gi phyag rgya'o//
348a1(rgyud): sor mo rnams phye ste khu tshur bcangs la mdzub mo gnyis kyis mnan te sgra dang bcas par brdab pa ni dgrol ba'i phyag rgya'o// phyag 'tshal ba'i thal mo'i sor mo bsnam/
348a2(rgyud): la mdzub mo gnyis sor sor bkug ste gung mo gnyis ngos la bstan pa ni sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyi phyag rgya'o// phan tshur bsnol te snyims bzed la mdzub mo gnyis kyi sen mo gcig gis
348a3(rgyud): gcig bkab pa ni spyan drang ba yin no// de las bzlog pa ni slar gtang ba yin no// de bzhin du lag pa g.yas pa'i khu tshur gyi rdo rje tho ba phrag pa logs su bzhag ste lta stangs kyis snying la
348a4(rgyud): bsdigs pa ni khro bo'i phyag rgya'o// yig 'bru bcu pa'i tshul du byas pa ni rdo rje dbyug pa'i yin no// de nyid las bstod pa ni khro bo 'gro ba'i phyag rgya'o// mthe bong bkyed pa ni gzhom
348a5(rgyud): pa'i phyag rgya'o// g.yas pa'i mthe bong dang mthe'u chung gnyis kyis g.yon pa'i khu tshur bzung la mdzub mo dang / gung mo dang / srin lag rnams brkyang ste mdung rtse gsum pa'i
348a6(rgyud): dbyibs ltar byas pa ni gtsug nas byung gi phyag rgya'o// me lha spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya'ang de nyid yin no// g.yor pa'i srin lag dang gung mo sbas pa ni gtsug nas byung gi phyag rgya tha dad pa yin
348a7(rgyud): nolag pa g.yon pa'i srin lag dang gung mo bkug pa ni the bos bzung la mdzub mo dang mthe'u chung gnyis brkyang ba ni rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po'i phyag rgya'o// de nyid mdzub mo'i
348b1(rgyud): thor to mthe zer rtse mo logs su btud pa 'di ni rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po'i phyag rgya tha dad pa ste rdo rje rje gcig pa yin no// gzhan yang nam mkha' lding dang dpal gyi be'u'i dbyibs de
348b2(rgyud): las mthe'u chung dang srin lag gnyis kyi thor to bkug pa ni mig gi phyag rgya zhes grags so// mthe'u chung dang / srid lag dang / gung mo rnams kyi thor to legs par bkug pani
348b3(rgyud): khro gnyer can gyi phyag rgya'o// ming med dang / gung mo dang / srin lag dang / gung mo rnams kyi thor te legs par bkug pa ni khro gnyer can gyi phyag rgya'o// mdzub mo dang
348b4(rgyud): gung mo dang / srin lag dang / mthe'u chung rnams spang la/ mthe bong gnyis kyi thor to gung mo dang srin lag gi mtshams su bzhag pa ni rta mgrin gyi phyag rgya'o// de nyid las srin lag
348b5(rgyud): dang gung mo gnyis kyi tshigs nang du bkug ste/ mthe'u chung gnyis brkyang ba ni rus sbal gyi phyag rgya gnyis pa yin no// lag pa gnyis bla 'og tu bstan te bsnol la/ sor mo rnams
348b6(rgyud): gcig la gcig dkris nas mthe bong dang mthe'u chung rnams sprad pa ni ru sa sbal dang rdo rje sa 'og gi phyag rgya'o// lag pa gnyis ka khu tshur bcangs la gung mo brkyang ste rdo rje ltar byas nas g.yon
348b7(rgyud): pa'i mdzub mo brkyang ba ni rdo rje dbyug pa'i phyag rgya'o// sgrol ma'i phyag rgya nyid las mdzub mo gnyis kyi thor to nas gang tsam gyis phye ba ni rdo rje yangs pa'i phyag rgya'o// nas gnyis tsam
349a1(rgyud): gyis bye ba ni bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyi phyag rgya'o// mdzub mo gnyis brkyang ba ni kun tu yangs pa'i phyag rgya'o// de nas mdzub mo gnyis brkyang ste sprad pa ni pad+ma yang /
349a2(rgyud): pa'i phyag rgya'o// mdzub mo gnyis brkyang mar brjod pa ni rdo rje sa 'og gi phyag rgya'o// de nyid las gung mo gnyis kyi thor to'i tshigs dang po gdu bu ltar bkug la mdzub mo gnyis
349a3(rgyud): kyi rtse mo spyad pa ni rdo rje dgra sta'i phyag rgya'o// g.yon pa'i mdzub mo brkyang ba ni ral gri dang dgra sta'i phyag rgya'o// de nyid las gung mo dang srin lag gnyis thor to bsnol te sbyar la
349a4(rgyud): mdzub mo dang mthe'u chung brkyang ste gud mo dang mthe bong gnyis kyi rtse mo sbyar ba ni rdo rje sepa ge'i khri'i phyag rgya'o// mdzub mo dang gung mo gcig la gcig bstan la/ mthe bong brkyang
349a5(rgyud): ste sbyar nas mthe'u chung yang brkyang ste sbyar ba ni rdo rje lcags mnga'i phyag rgya'o// lag pa gnyis bsnol la mthe bong gnyis bsgreng ste sor gnyis tsam gyis phye ba ni rus sbal gyi phyag rgya dang /
349a6(rgyud): phur bu dbyung ba'i phyag rgya'o// lag pa gnyis bsnol te sor mo thams cad sbyar bar bya ba ni rdo rje ra ba'i phyag rgya'o// lag pa gnyis bkan la mthe'u chung nang du sbyar te mdzub mo dang /
349a7(rgyud): gu mo dang srin lag rnams rgyab tu bsgrengs nas mdzub mo dang / gung mo dang / srin lag rnams kyis mnan te/ mthe bong gnyis rus sbal gyi phyag rgya bzhin du byas pa ni shes
349b1(rgyud): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i phyag rgya'o// srin laganang du bkug la mtho bong gnyis kyi tshigs drang por mdun/ mdzub mo gnyis kyi rtse me gung mo gnyis kyi tshigs dang por sbyar nas mthe'u/
349b2(rgyud): rlung gnyis drang por sbyar ba ni mtshor cha chen po'i phyag rgya'o// de nyid las mdzub mo gung mo gnyis kyi sen mo la brten pa ni mtshon cha mchog gi phyag rgya'o// mtshon cha chen po'i phyag rgya
349b3(rgyud): de nyid las mdzub mo gnyis kyi gung mo gnyis kyi tshigs dang po'i bsrubs kyi glor gzhar ba ni mtshon cha'i shugs kyi phyag rgya'o// de nyid las mdzub mo gnyis kyi thor to gung mo'i tshigs dang /
349b4(rgyud): po ras cung zad bkug ste gung mo gnyis kyi tshigs dbu mar sbyar ba ni mtshon ra'i snying po yin no// mtshon cha chen po de nyid las srin lag dang mthe bong ngos sgyur ba ni tshol ba'i mtshon cha'o//
349b5(rgyud): lag pa'i phyag rgya drang thabs su sbyar ba ni dam tshig chen po'i phyag rgya yin te phyag 'tshal ba'i phyag rgya dang 'dra'o// nam mkha' lding gi dpal be'u'i phyag rgya ltar srin lag phye ste mthe bong gnyis
349b6(rgyud): drang por ga'ibs pa'ang rdo rje dbyug sngon gyi phyag rgya'o// de nyid las mthe bong gnyis kyi tshigs dang po legs par bkug ste srin lag gnyis kyi drung du brten pa ni rdo rje dbyug pa'i phyag rgya'o//
349b7(rgyud): mnga' bo che'i dbyibs ltar gung mo gnyis kyi drung du mthe bong gnyis gzhibs pa'i rtse mo bkug pa ni gtsug tor gyi phyag rgya'o// pad+ma'i gdan gyi dbyibs ltar byas te gung mo gnyis kyi thor to/
350a1(rgyud): spad pa ni spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi phyag rgya'o// mthe'u chung dang srin lag gdu bu wAr bkug la de bzhin du spang gung mo gnyis gzhibs pa mnan nas
350a2(rgyud): gzhibs pa'i tshogs dang por mdzub mo gnyis gzhar ba ni 'dod pa'i rdo rje ma'i'o// de nyid las mthe bong gnyis sen mo sprad pa de la srin lag gnyis sbyar ba ni lus las byung gi phyag rgya'o//
350a3(rgyud): thal ba'i khu tshur ni 'joms byed lnga'i phyag rgya'o// lag pa gnyis bkan te sor mo'i phyi rol du bsnol mar brkyang la/ mdzub mo bsrang ste thor to sbyar nas mthe bong brkyang nas mdung
350a4(rgyud): rtse gsum pa'i dbyibs ltar byas pa ni lha mu'i phyag rgya'o// mthe'u chung dang srin lag gi ther te mthe bos mnan la sor mo lhag ma rnams brkyang ste mdung rtse gsum pa'i phyag rgya'o//
350a5(rgyud): lag pa gnyis bkan te sor mo'i dbyibs ltar byas pa ni lus dpag med kyi phyag rgya'o// lag pa gnyis kyi glang po che'i sna'i dbyibs ltar byas pa ni 'jigs byed kyi phyag rgya'o// sprin
350a6(rgyud): ma'ang bkug pa ni khro bo dbang phyug gi yin te/ 'di dag ni rig sngags kyi rgyal po bco brgyad kyi phyag rgya yin no// mdzub mo gnyis so so'i gung mo'i drung du bkug pa ni lag 'dren rnams
350a7(rgyud): kyi phyag rgya'o// lag pa'i khu tshur nam mkha' ltar/ khong stong sbyar nas de bzhin du/ mthe bong gnyis kyang bstod pa ni// tshangs pa zhes ni bya bar bshad// mthe bong gnyis ni
350b1(rgyud): btung nas kyang // cung zad bstod pa khyab 'jug gi/ gung mo gyen du sbengs byas la// de yi steng du mdzub mo dang // mthe bong lhan cig bzhag pa ni// nyi ma yi ni yin par bshad/
350b2(rgyud): g.yon pa'i sor mo bzhi po rnams// g.yas pa yis ni btsum par bya// de ltar khu tshur bcang byas nas// mthe bong gnyis ni bskyed de sbyar// g.yon pa mthong bar byas pa ni// mig g.yon/
350b3(rgyud): gyi ni phyag rgya yin// lag pa g.yas pa'i mthe bong dang // mdzub mo yang ni de bzhin sbyar// sor mo gsum po rnams kyang ni// mthe bong lhan cig sbyar bya zhing / byi la'i sder mo dbyibs
350b4(rgyud): 'dra ba// zhabs kyi snying po'i phyag rgya 'di// 'jig rten gsum gyi mchod pa yin// sor mo dag ni bzhi po rnams// lag pa g.yon pas bcang bar bya// g.yon pa'i mthe bong
350b5(rgyud): bskyed nas ni// g.yas pa yang ni bstod par bya// phrag pa gnyis kyi rgyab tu ni// rtag tu 'dug par bya ba yin// sor mo yi ni mdzub mo dang // gung mo'i tshigs kyi bar du ni//
350b6(rgyud): mthe bong gnyis kyi tha ma'i tshigs// sbyar zhing legs par gzhag par bya// g.yon pa'i mkhrig ma'i phyogs su ni// g.yas pa'i mthe bong brten byas pa// seng ge'i rna ba 'dra ba ste/
350b7(rgyud): phyag rgya dpal ldan snying po yin// phyag rgya gsum po 'di dag ni// 'khrul 'khor rnams kyi snying por bshad// 'di dag gis ni sbyar byas shing // gsang sngags ldan par byas na ni/
351a1(rgyud): 'khrul 'khor 'od 'bar gang yin dang // 'khrul 'khor rtse mo mi bzang gang // snang ba dang ni mi snang dang // che chung dang ni dkar nag rnams/ thams cad kyang /
351a2(rgyud): 'jigs par gyur// 'di la spyad par mi bya'o// 'khrul 'khor phyag rgya gsum bshad pa// thor tsugs gsum pa yin par bshad// de la gnyis ka'i sor mo kun// reg
351a3(rgyud): gi phyogs su brten bya zhing // mthe bong yang ni de bzhin no// gung mo gyen du bsgrengs nas ni// gnyis ka lhan cig sbyar bya ba// nam mkha' phyag rgyar brten pa ste// lha chen gyi ni
351a4(rgyud): yin par shes/ bdag nyid dang ni ldan pa yin// g.yon pa'i gung mo gang yin pa// gnyis ka yi ni bar du gzhug/ lag pa gnyis ka'i sor mo yi// lhag ma yang ri dgyes par
351a5(rgyud): byed mthe bong gnyis kyang dkyeng bya ste// lha mo'i phyag rgya yin par bshad// mdor na phyag rgya 'di dag ni// byas na las rnams grub pa ste// bgegs rnams zhi bar
351a6(rgyud): 'dod pa bzhir// rab tu bsgrims te sbyar bar bya// de las gzhan pa rgyud kun gyi// don kun sgrub par byed pa yi// phyag rgya spyi yi sgrub pa'i thabs// 'di dag kyang ni
351a7(rgyud): bshad par bya// spyan drang la sogs gdon rnams la// srung ba la sogs las rnams las// sgrub pa pos ni rim bzhin du// phyag rgya 'di dag sbyar bar bya// phyag rgya
351b1(rgyud): kun gyi chog mi/ gtang ba dang ni dgub papa/ shin tu bzlas pa'i sgrub pa bo// bgegs rnams dang ni log 'dren gyis/ ring du yongs su spong bar byed/ thog mar las ni thams/
351b2(rgyud): cad la/ bgegs kun ni bar bya ba'i phyir// bgegs rnams kun gyi dgrar gyur pa// bdud rtsi thab sbyor bshad par bya// lag pa gnyis ka'i mthe bong gnyis kyis mthe'u rung /
351b3(rgyud): gi sen mo mnan la/ sor mo lhag ma rnams kyi bar nas gang tsam gyis phye ste rdo rje'i mtshan nyid du byas la/ de nyid las bsnol te dpung mgor bzhag nas mche ba mnan la drag tu lta
351b4(rgyud): zhing khur ba bus te rkang pa bral la 'greng zhing / g.yas brkyang gyi tshul gyis lus btung pa ni 'phags pa bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyi rtsa ba'i phyag rgya'o// 'di mngon sum du bstan te
351b5(rgyud): log 'dren rnams dang gdon gzhan rnams chings shig ces byas na bcings par 'gyur ro// lag pa g.yon pa'i rdo rje gang yin pa de ni las kyi rdo rje zhes bya'o// g.yas pa ni dam
351b6(rgyud): tshig gi rdo rje yin no// snyim pa bkan la mthe'u chung gnyis bsnol ba'i bar du srin lag gnyis bzhag nas mdzub mo gnyis dbus bkug la gung mo gnyis gzhibs pa de'i tshigs
351b7(rgyud): dang por bstar te/ mthe bong gnyis glo la bcur nas snying pa'i thabs su byas pa ni khrus kyi phyag rgya ste/ khrus byed pa'i tshe de la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas nas phyag rgya'i chu mgo rer
352a1(rgyud): blugs na/ bgegs rnams las grol zhing khrus byas nas kyang 'jug par mi 'gyur ro// de nyid las mthe bong gnyis bar du bcug la gzhan thams cad snga ma bzhin/
352a2(rgyud): dudu byas pa ni srung ba'i phyag rgya ste/ mgo bo dang / lag pa gnyis dang / snying kha dang / lkog ma dang / gnas lngar rim pa bzhin btug par bya'o// de nyid las mdzub mo gnyis bkug
352a3(rgyud): mthe bong gnyis tshigs dang po'ang nang du btud pa ni lha thams cad kyi spyi'i khrus kyi phyag rgya'o// srung ba'i phyag rgya las mdzub mo gnyis btang ste rdo rje'i tshul du byas pa ni srung ba chen po
352a4(rgyud): log 'dren thams cad 'joms par byed pa yin te/ snying khang bzhag la nyi ma gcig bzlas brjod byas na log 'dren gyis zin pa las grol bar 'gyur te/ gdon thams cad la'ang de bzhin
352a5(rgyud): du sbyar bar bya'o// g.yon pa'i sor mo gnyis kyis mthe bong sbas te gdu bu ltar 'dug pa'i rang mthe'u chung dang mdzub mo gnyis dbus bkug pa'i thor to bcug la/ lag pa g.yas pa sta zur
352a6(rgyud): phyogs su rdo rjer bya ste/ las thams cad la dri dang / me tog dang / bdug pa la so gA pa tham cad la sbyar na bgegs 'ong bar mi 'gyur ro// rdo rje de nyid g.yon pa'i gung mo phyogs su bzung
352a7(rgyud): nagazi byin ster bar 'gyur ro// g.yon pa'i srin lag bsgrengs pa'i ngos la mthe'u chung dang gung mo bsnol ba bstar te/ mdzub mos mthe'u chung gi thor to dam du bzung nas mdzub mo dang
352b1(rgyud): zung mo'i thor to mthe bos mnan pa ni bcom ldan 'das de nyid kyi mche ba'i phyag rgya ste/ gdon thams cad dang bgegs chen po rnams la sbyar bar bya'o// sor mo rnams par ngur bsnol la
352b2(rgyud): mthe bong gnyis nang du badrug pa'i steng du mdzub mo'i tshigs gcig bkug ste/ gdu bu'i thabs su sprad pa ni chu bsal ba'i phyag rgya ste/ tshu la bskor nas ci dga' bar khrus bya'o// rdo
352b3(rgyud): rje'i phyag rgya la mdzub mo bkug pa ni de nyid spyan drang ba'i'o// gnyis ka brkyang ba ni slar gtang ba yin te/ bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyi phyag rgya yin no// lag pa g.yon pa'i rdo rje gang yin pa ni khro
352b4(rgyud): bo chen po'i phyag rgya ste/ bcing ba dang dkyil 'khor gyi skabs su bshad pa'i las gang dang gang yin pa de phal khro bo chen po sbyar bar bya'o// spyan drang ba dang slar gtang ba la'ang phyag rgya rnams
352b5(rgyud): lta ba bzhin du sngags dang sbyar bar bya'o// rigs kyi phyag rgya thams cad la'ang de dag nyid kyis sbyar bar bya'o// snyim pa las mthe'u chung dang srin lag phar tshur bsnol te mthe bong gnyis glo/
352b6(rgyud): la gzhar/ mdzub mo glong de dbus bkug la gung mo gzhibs pa'i tshigs dang por bzhag pa ri rigs gsum char gyi spyi'i mchod yon gyi phyag rgya'o// de bzhin du sor mo phrug gsum par
352b7(rgyud): tshur bsnol la mdzub mo brkyang ba'i ther to spang nas mthe bong gnyis kyi gler bzhag ste snyim pa'i thabs su byas pa ni me tog gi phyag rgya'o// snyim pa bkan la mthe'u chung gzhibs te/ de'i
353a1(rgyud): rgyab tu srin lag gzhibs te gnang / de'i rgyab tu grung mo gnibs la mdzub mo gnyis logs shig tu brkyang ste/ gzhibs nas mthe bong gnyis grol gzhar te snyim/
353a2(rgyud): pa'i thabs su byas pa ni bdug pa'i phyag rgya'o// snyim pa bzed mdzub mo gnyis cung zad bkug pa ni spyi'i lha bshos kyi phyag rgya ste nang du me tog gzhag par bya'o// lag pa g.yas pa skyabs
353a3(rgyud): sbyin gyi phyag rgyar byas la g.yon pa mkhrig ma nas gdu bu ltar bzung ba ni dri'i phyag rgya'o// lag po g.yas pa khu tshur bcangs la mthe bong dang gung mo gdebs pa ni spyi'i mar me'i phyag rgya'o//
353a4(rgyud): mthe bong dang srin lag gnyis kyis sngags kyi nor bu bzung la mthe'u chung dang gung mo brkyang ste/ mdzub mo'i dbus bkug nas dgung mo'i rgyab kyi tshigs dang por bzhag pa 'di ni rig sngags
353a5(rgyud): kyi nor bu'i phyag rgya'o// snyim pa'i nang du sngags kyi nor bu grangs la gsang sngags bzlas brjod byas na dag par byas par 'gyur ro// lag pa g.yas skyabs sbyin gyi tshul du byas te bstan la mdzub
353a6(rgyud): mo bkug nas mthe bong yang lag pa'i mthil du bkug pa ni me spyan drang ba'i 'o// mdzub mo dang mthe bo'i thor to bkug ste lhan cig sbyar ba ni me slar gtang ba'i'o// g.yas pa'i rdo rje gang yin pa
353a7(rgyud): de ni sems dpa' yin no// lag pa gnyis gung mo gnyis dang sprad de sbyar la gzhan bsnol nas bla 'og tu bstan te dra ba'i thabs su bya ba ni rdo rje dra ba'i 'o// mdzub mo dang mthe'u chung bzhi pas/
353b1(rgyud): la mthe bong gnyis dkyeng nas 'og dang thang kar sa la bzhag ste/ gsang sngags bzlas brjod byas na las thams cad la sa gzhi bsal ba dang yongs su bzung ba byas par 'gyur te/ rigs kyi
353b2(rgyud): spyi'i snying po'i phyag rgya yin no// lha rnams la bstan na'ang lha rnams dga' bar byas pa dang / bskul bar byas par 'gyur ro// khre be ki li ki li'i phyag rgya bcings la phyag 'tshal ba'i thal mo
353b3(rgyud): las sor mo rnams sbyar ba ni mchod pa'i phyag rgya'o// bsnol mar sbyar ba ni phyag 'tshal ba'i phyag rgya'o// me tog la sogs pa ma 'byor na'ang phyag rgya bcings pas 'byor pa byas
353b4(rgyud): par 'gyur ro// las thams cad la'ang bskrad pa ni las kyi rdo rjes bya'o// sangs rgyas spyan gyi phyag rgya ni thams cad du rig sngags bsrung bar bya'o// sor mo phan tshun sbyar te khu tshur bcangs la/
353b5(rgyud): gung mo gzhibs pa'i phyi rol du mdzub mo rdo rje ltar byas nas mthe bong gnyis glo la gzhar ba ni dam tshig chen po'i phyag rgya ste ngan du byas pa dag la'ang srung ba chen po yin la/ nye 'khor
353b6(rgyud): du mtshams bcad de 'khor les sgyur ba'i bzlas brjod byas su zin kyang sus kyang rig sdug kyi mthu nyams par byed mi nus so// khro bo 'chol pa'i sbas pa'i phyag rgya la'ang bsrung bar 'gyur te/
353b7(rgyud): 'di dag ni sgrub pa rnams kyi spyi'i phyag rgya yin no// de las gzhan yang sbyid sreg gi gsang sngags las gang gi skabs su bstan pa lung las ji skad 'byung ba de dag la'ang las kyi phyag rgya
354a1(rgyud): sbyar bar bya'o// rdo rje'i phyag rgya ni rna rje'i rigs thams cad spyi'i yin no zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin gyis bshad do// na mo rat+natra yA ya/ na mo badz+ra d+ha raH/
354a2(rgyud): na me bi d+yA ka na s+ya s+t+waM/ 'di ri snying po yin te de bzhin du// rdo rje rigs chen de dang ni// rig sngags rigs ni thams cad kyi// rig sngags blon mo bdun dag dang // rig sngags yan lag
354a3(rgyud): bdun dang bcas// 'dod pa'i rdo rje 'dzin gyis bshad// dang po 'dod pa'i rdo rje ma// rig sngags rdo rje me tog bzhin// las mchog la ni gnyis pa yin// rdzu 'phrul dang ni stobs/
354a4(rgyud): napa// rdon zlog ces bya ba dang // 'og gser po gdum mo dang // de bzhin rnon tshugs par dka'// rig sngags chen mo bdun de dag/ zhem bdun dang skyobs mnyam nis
354a5(rgyud): sems can tshogs kun mchog rnams la// thal mo sbyar te phyag kyang bya// gzhan yang ya mtshan las 'das shing // dus kyi mtha' yi me 'dra ba// rdo rje khro bo khro bo che// de la yang dang
354a6(rgyud): yang du 'dud// de bzhin rdo rje thog thag ni// 'byung po rnams la thog thog bzhin// gzung dka' rig sngags las kun byed// lho phyogs sgo ni srung ba dang // rdo rje khu tshur mchog/
354a7(rgyud): sbyin dang // gtum po chen po stobs po che// bdag dang gzhan kun srung ba'i mchog/ byang phyogs sgo ni srung ba dang // pho nya chen mo grub pa bcu// de bzhin de dag g.yog mo rnam//
354b1(rgyud): ponyam ni drug du ba'i/ rig sngags tshogs ni sna tshogs dang // rdo rje dbyug pa nyi ma la// rdo rje rigs kyi slob dpor gyis// grub pa'i rdo rje cho ga yis// snying nas kyang ni phyag byas
354b2(rgyud): nas de las gzhan rnams bshang bar bya// las kyi dkyil 'khor gtso bo ni// ji bzhin du ni bris nas kyang // gdon gyi las rnams bsgrub par bya// gang gis ming ni spos tsam gyis
354b3(rgyud): ma bcos par yang gdon rnams 'jigs// dbang po'i rgyal mtshan bstan pa yis// ma bcos lnga min 'pham pa bzhin// 'byung po kun la so grol ba'i thabs// 'jig rten kun tu mchog
354b4(rgyud): gyur gang // thams cad zhi bar byed pa yi// dam pa gang yin bshad par bya// gang zhig tshul bzhin dran byas shing // bsgrims te mchod pa byas na ni// 'byung po kun gyis mi tshugs la/
354b5(rgyud): 'jigs med bde bar gnas par 'gyur// 'jig rten 'jig rten slob dpon 'dra// 'jig rten gyi ni snang byed mchog/ 'byung po'i tshogs ni thams cad kyis// rtag tu lha chen bzhin du
354b6(rgyud): mchod// mchog gyur mchog gis mchod pa des// cho ga bzhin du rgyas par ni// gdon gyi mtshan nyid bar du yang // legs par rab tu bshad par bya// zla phyed yud tsam nyin mo dang /
354b7(rgyud): rgyamar dag ni bzang ba la// gtsang ning gos gtsang bgos po dang // bsdams shing nges par gnas pa dang // gtsang ma'i grogs dang ldan pa dang // gtsang ma'i lam du zhugs
355a1(rgyud): pa yis// yar gyi ngo ni tshes gcig gam/ chos gnyis de bzhin lnga yang rung // chos drug gam ni brgyad dam bcu// bcu gsum yang na nya dag gi/ nyin pa/
355a2(rgyud): yongs su gzung bar bya// bab dang ni bal ba// be shA de ba de bzhin te// yang na te ru tu la'ang rung // zhag byed yongs su gzung bar bya// shA ta me tra ba la dang // gA ra maH
355a3(rgyud): a bi tsi// dza ya se'u mo'i yung tsam la// dkyil 'khor dam pa bya ba yi// bsgrims te lag na rdo rje dang // rgyal dbang la ni phyag byas nas// zhi zhing sngan chad las byas pa'i// sa
355a4(rgyud): phyogs mkhas pas 'gro bar byas// kun dga' tshong dus gtsug lag khang // zong dang grong khyer byang shar mtshams// de bzhin sgo nub mtshams kyang rung // mnyam zhing mdangs dpa
355a5(rgyud): mdog sdug dang // tshad ldan tshwa gro med pa dang // rdo dang gsog ma rus pa dang // skyon kun med pa des mthong nas// de 'dra'i sa de rnyed nas ni// rdo rje lcags kyu dran bya zhing /
355a6(rgyud): shar phyogs nas ni gom pa dor// ha cang mi drag rgod mi bya// rig sngags gang la dad pa yis// bdag nyid de nas bsrung bar bya// yan lag gsum po nas dang ni// yungs
355a7(rgyud): kar 'bras kyang gzhag par bya// de nas dkyil 'khor gnas der yang // dge ltas dag kyang blta bar bya// sngags kyis dag par byas pa'i chus// thams cad legs par
355b1(rgyud): gtor bar bya/ kha lang lcibs legs par sbyar// ku sha dag kyang gding bar bya// khru ni bzhi 'am drug gam brgyad// sa yi phyogs char thig kyang gdag/ thig skud gsar
355b2(rgyud): zhing grims pa dang // ran pa dang ni mdzes pa dang // dri zhim dang ni bal na sdug/ gzabs pa dang ni legs pa dang // thung ngu dang ni sdom la sogs// ma legs mdud pa
355b3(rgyud): rnams med na// dri dang me tog mchod pa yis// shes rab can gyis thig kyang gang ba// bu dag chog shes dben pa bde// chos la mi smong bde ba yin// 'tshe ba spangs pa 'jig
355b4(rgyud): rten bde// srog chags rnams la sdom pa dang // 'dod chags bral ba 'jig rten bde// 'dod pa rnams las 'das pa dang // nga snyam nga rgyal zhi ba dang // dul ba 'dir ni
355b5(rgyud): mchog tu bde// bu dag rgyun las zlog pa yis// lam bgrod zab cing blta dka' ba// mun nag thibs pos bsgrims pa dang // 'dod la chags pas rtogs mi 'gyur// ngas
355b6(rgyud): ni dka' ba rtogs byas nas// skye ba rgyan bzhir 'khyam pa dang // 'dod pa dag gi 'dun pa yis// bcings pa'i bar du bshad pa ste// 'di ni lag na rdo rje yi// yid 'ong ched du brjo/
355b7(rgyud): pa brgyad// ki li ki lis bsrungs byas nas// nges par kun tu 'jigs pa med// byang phyogs yang na nub phyogs su// tshon rtsil sogs de dag gzhag/ shar bltas la /
356a1(rgyud): g.yon pa yis// dri dang me tog 'phreng bas mchod// mtshon cha bsngags shing phyogs bcings la// thig gis grwa yang btsal bar bya// de ltar mnyam par
356a2(rgyud): bkod nas ni// khang pa gru bzhi bri bar bya// ji ltar thig ni gdab pa bzhin// thig dang mthun par bsgrub par bya// rig sngags rdo rje lcags kyu ma// ya mtshan de nyid dran par bya/
356a3(rgyud): nang gi khang pa mnyam pa dang // grwa ba ni legs par gnas par bya// grwa yi phyogs ni thams cad du// de yi tshad dang mthun par ni// rdo rje khang gnas rdo rje yi// dbus dang thog ma
356a4(rgyud): dbyibs legs shing // rtse mtho shin tu rgya che ba// shar du brten te gnag par bya// rdo rje yi ni byang phyogs su// rdo rje rig sngags gdab cing bya// dbus dang rtse mo legs pa 'i//
356a5(rgyud): rgyal mtshan rtse mo nang du bsgreng // nub byang grar ni gnag par bya// rdo rje go ni nub tu 'dod// 'di ni gsang ba'i sgor bshad de// 'byung po thams cad 'jigs par byed// dkyil 'khor/
356a6(rgyud): 'dod pas sgo de yi// byang phyogs kyi ni nye 'khor dang // lho phyogs su ni gang bshad pa// bsnyen te legs par gzhag par bya// gur kum dag ni yid 'ong ba// rgya skyegs khu
356a7(rgyud): bas sbyar ba 'am// le brgan rtsis ni dmar byas pa'i// dar ni yid kun 'phrog byed pa// des ni ba dan byas nas kyang / shing ring dag la gdags par bya// ske yi lho phyogs
356b1(rgyud): ngos sum pa// de dag las gzhan gang 'dod pa'i// kAr na li 'phreng ba dag/ rdorje rtse mor gdags par bya// yang na me tog dmar po yi// 'greng ba ma tshogs bzang ba
356b2(rgyud): gdags/ rdo rje sngon don grub pa// 'gyo dang mi 'gro'ajig rten gsug 'di dag 'joms nus gang yin pa// so srungs gnyis kyang gzhag bya zhing // de yang ra
356b3(rgyud): bzhin du bya// grags pa gtan yang gang 'dod pa// rdo rje rngog thog lho phyogs su// rdo rje khu tshur byung phyogs gzhag/ rdo rje rngog zlog lho phyogs su// me tog yungs kar
356b4(rgyud): sdeng dag tu// dri bsrung zhim pos cher bsgos shing // dri dang me tog rgyas pa'ang gzhag/ rdo rje khu tshur stobs po che// dpal ldan de bzhin byang phyogs su// rdo rje khu tshur phyag rgya
356b5(rgyud): yis bzhag na grags ni rnyeng mi 'gyur// 'jig rten gsum rgyal gang gang las// rdo rje 'dzin pa yid kyis bkug/ rdo rje khu tshur khu tshur gyis// bsnun na rnam par 'jig
356b6(rgyud): par 'gyur// rdo rje snying po'i khang pa der// g.yon logs nas ni 'jug par bya// de ni g.yas logs bsor ba yang // 'jig rten dag tu bshad par bya// 'khor kun dang ni
356b7(rgyud): lhan cig tu// rdo rje sgrog kyang gzhag par bya// klu yi gtso bo nor rgyas bu// gzi can gnyis kyang grwa ru gzhag/ 'di gnyis klu kun bdag po ste// klu kun gyi ni gnas kyang
357a1(rgyud): yin bram ze las byung dug can de// 'di gnyis sngags dang phyag rgyar ldan// 'di gnyis kyi ni mdun logs su// mkha' lding rnam par 'dud pa'i bu/
357a2(rgyud): mkha' lding gi ni cho ga bzhin// rkang dang byis pa la sogs bskor// de nas 'byung po'i tshogs bdun dag/ cho ga bzhin du gzhag par bya// gnod sbyin kun dang ku be ra/
357a3(rgyud): de yi be con byang phyogs gzhag/ de nas klu chen tshogs rnams dang // bya ba sgrub po g.yog dang bcas// klu yi g.yog rnams mthu stobs ldan// de dag shar phyogs ngos su
357a4(rgyud): dgod// de nas phyi rol rig sngags tshogs// thams cad gzhug ste dbang phyug che// chos kyi ngang can grags ldan ma// lha mo dka' bzlog zhabs 'bring ldan// lag na rdo rje lha
357a5(rgyud): chen dang // dka' bzlog gnyis kyi bar dag tu// rig sngags rigs dang gzhag par bya// der ni lag na rdo rje yi// rdo rje 'bar ba sa rab tu gzir// de nas grwa logs lha mo ra
357a6(rgyud): ka ta ya na log 'dren dang // sna yon sum cu rtsa gnyis po// de dag las ni gang 'dod dang // de yi 'og tu dri za ni// skal chen brtson 'grus che ba rnams// shar du dbang po rdo rje/
357a7(rgyud): dang 'de bzhin dbang po lha la tshogs// de yi 'og tu lha li bza'// de nas khyab 'jug 'khor lor bcas// me dang drug ma bstan pa li// me dang mdung thung zla ru gzhig/
357b1(rgyud): dang por lho phyogs kyi// 'byung po'i bya ba bsrub pa gzhag/ de yi 'og tu gshin rje dang // gshin rje'i dbyug pa grul bum rnams// grul bum la sogs tshogs kun dang // ma mo
357b2(rgyud): rnams dang 'jig rten ma// bder bral grwa ni 'phags ma'i mdun// 'byung po'i tshogs kyis bskor bar bya// nub phyogs dang por skem byed ni// drag mo tshogs ni mang por bcas/
357b3(rgyud): klu dang nam mkha' lding grags ma rnams// de yi 'og tu gtor ma'i gnas// tshi li zhes bya rgya cher yang // der ni nges par gzhag par bya// de ltar de dag thams cad du// tshogs
357b4(rgyud): rnams thams cad bkod pa'i dbus// rdo rje dkyil 'khor nang dag tu// rdo rje dbyibs kyi stegs bu ni// shar nub phyogs su lta ba'i dbyibs// de yi dbyibs legs gzhag pa
357b5(rgyud): bya de yi rub phyogs gnas su yang // rig sngags 'chang ni gus gnas shing // lag ra rdo rje'i snying po ni// rab tu bsgrims te bzlas brjod bya// tsan dan phye ma la sogs
357b6(rgyud): spos ras dang yungs kar la sogs dang // yang na de dag re raM yis// lag na rdo rje thog mar bris// bdag nyid g.yon phyogs ngos la 'dug/ lha mo lho nub mtshams su
357b7(rgyud): gzhag/ g.yas pas dri dang 'phreng bas mchod// bdug pa sna tshogs dag kyang sreg/ shin tu bkra shis tshigs bcad kun// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba 'am// yang na 'dus
358a1(rgyud): pa chen po'i mdo// the tshom med par gdon par bya// de nas chos kyi rdul po yi// chos kyi 'khor lo mkhas pas bri// dpal dang ldan pa lnga yi sku// sangs rgyas
358a2(rgyud): sku gzugs 'od can bri// de nas rdo rje lcags kyu yis// rig sngags gus pas mchod cing bzlas// lha mo stobs chen de nyid dang // rdo rje ri bo bri bar bya// snying po lag na rdo rje
358a3(rgyud): ni mtshon rtse gsum gyi bdag nyid kyi/ tshul bzhin bri zhing rigs rnams kyi// blon mo bdun gyis bskor bar bya// pho nya mo bcu dpung gi mchog/ drug cu rtsa bzhis rjes
358a4(rgyud): 'brang dang // rig sngags tshogs ni thams cad dang // rdo rje khro bo yan chad bri// yid bzhin nor bu 'dra ba dang // skal ldan mchog sbyin gzugs bzang 'dra// 'jig rten
358a5(rgyud): kun gyi thabs su ni// dus kun tu ni phyag bya ba// lha kun rig sngags chen mo ste// gnod sbyin 'byung po klu 'jigs byed// gdon chen dag ni stong phrag rnams// gcig
358a6(rgyud): bus gsod par byed pa ste// de yi ming ni brjod byas shing // me tog bdug pas mchod byas na// gdon rnams bye ba stong phrag dag/ 'khyam par 'gyur zhing g.yo bar 'gyur// de yi
358a7(rgyud): dngos grub gzugs bzang zhing / dpal dang ldan par mngon sum gnas// thams cad don ni sgrub pa pos// 'di la tho tshom med par sgrub// sgrub pas rab dang 'bring la sogs/
358b1(rgyud): bgos da 'jug pa la sogs mchod// a kar chos du druka/ yungs kar bu phul shu dag dang / nair kun dri dang shul sa// pang 'dras dang sgang rdzi mar/ ma hA bi sha la dang bcas
358b2(rgyud): 'di las kyang bya ba mer/ thams cad 'jug pa'i sgo dag tu// thams cad kyang ni 'byung bar bya// sgo ma yin pa gzhan dag tu// 'dir na ci yang mi bya'o// zhe sdang gti mug rmugs
358b3(rgyud): dang myos// 'dod chags mi shes dbang gis kyang // 'di la 'jug dang 'byung byas no// mi rnams myur du nad kyis 'debs// gdon rnams myos shing rgyags pa yis// rdo rje
358b4(rgyud): dag la rdzi byed dam// rkang pas rdo rje ri mo brdzis// myur du dam tshig nyams 'gyur te// de dag rdo rje 'dzin pa yis// myur du rdo rje chen pos 'joms// de dag gi ni rigs rnams
358b5(rgyud): kyang / rdo rje rig sngags tshogs kyis gzhan// slob dpon yang na dam tshig shes// gdon gang dag gis brnyas byed na// rdo rje lcags kyu'i bzlas brjod dang // sbyir sreg dag gis
358b6(rgyud): de yi rigs// skad cig gis ni bcom par 'gyur// gzhan yang rdo rje rigs chen las// rig sngags 'dod gyur gang yin pa// de yang sngar ni bsgrub byas la// myos la sogs
358b7(rgyud): pas gdon rnams bslang // gang phyir sgor yang 'grub pa'i phyir/ rtag tu 'di ni nang dag tu// mchod pa'i tshogs ni brjod pa dang // brdeg pa la sogs las mi bya// gzhan yang
359a1(rgyud): nad gtang mang po dang // mi dgas 'byung po sha za dug/ dkyil 'khor spong bar byed pa// de dag 'dir ni gshibs pa yi// drag po'i las la 'jug par bya//
359a2(rgyud): gzhig par bya ba gang yang rung // thams cad lho phyogs nang du bya// kun la me ni 'bar bar bya// bdug pa'i snod ni phyi rol gzhag/ lha ba shos sna tshogs mdzes pa dag ci 'dod
359a3(rgyud): kun ni thams cad du// thams cad zad mi shes par bya// gdon gyi dkyil 'khor pha rol gyi// byang shar mtshams su gang 'dod pa'i// lha yi phyag rgya'i tsho gas kyang bri// pad+ma 'khor lo
359a4(rgyud): rgyal mtshan mdung // mdung thung dbyug pa be con ri// zhags pa rtse gsum kha gdeng dung // gdon drag rnams la gnas par bya// gang na rig sngags gdon drag pa// mthu drag gnas
359a5(rgyud): pa de dag ni// mthu nyid kyis ni bsgrub bya zhing // 'di la dpyad par mi bya'o// dkyil 'khor de yi phyogs kun tu// 'byung po'i tshogs kun gnas kyang bya// gtor ma dang ni bdug pa
359a6(rgyud): rnams// rab tu rgyas pas mchod par bya// de nas gdon ni dul ba yis// thems par gyur na mchod par bya// mi bzad la ni snar blugs dang // mig bslu ba dang btung ba dang /
359a7(rgyud): sbyin sreg sogs pas gzhig par bya// gdon gyis drag tu btab pa la// ngal nas bzung bas longs mi bya// ngal nas byas pa sman pa nyid// mi bzad gdon gyis bcom par
359b1(rgyud): 'gyur// de phyir smar pa mi bzang ba/ gtum ning stong pa rig pa dang / brtan mchog dga' zhing spro ba dang / seng snyoms rig sngags brtson pa yis/ khros nas mthu ni songs/
359b2(rgyud): zhing // brdeg pa'am yang na bsdigs par bya// dul ba'i gdor ni dang ba yis// de ma thab tu 'grub par 'gyur// dkyil 'khor byi nang bcas par yang // gtor ma'i las ni
359b3(rgyud): bya ba dang // 'khur ba dang ni gnibs pa dang // kha zas ci 'byor rim bzhin dbul// dam tshig ci rigs sbyin par bya// rig sngags 'byung po la sogs kyi// gtor ma kun ni ci/
359b4(rgyud): rnyed sbyin// gdon kun la ni mchod pa bya// bcom ldan nyid kyis bshad pa bzhin// bden par smra zhing dam tshig shes// slob dpon phyir ni 'dir brtson pa'i// slob ma dam
359b5(rgyud): tshig 'dzin du gzhug/ thams cad kyi ni phyag rgya'i tshogs// skrag par bya dang mchod bya ba// de dag thams cad g.yon pa yis// rnam pa thams cad bstan par bya// rdo rje gom/
359b6(rgyud): par 'dor dang 'jig/ ci car yongs su bsgyur ba dang / g.yon pas brdab par bya ba dang // rgyags pa'i seng ge sgra ba sgrags dang // mdzub mo bstan te hUM zhes bya// shin
359b7(rgyud): tu sgra yang rab tu bkyed// rdo rje rigs cad skyes pa yi// slob dpon gyis ni bstan par bya// lha yi gdon ni thams cad kyi// rtags kyi phyag rgya'i tshogs bshad pa// rkyen du
360a1(rgyud): bab pa gang yin pa'i// so so'i phyag rgya'i tshogs 'di yin// tshangs pa'i pad+ma la chen mdung // gshin rje'i dbyug chen dam pa yin// khyab 'jug
360a2(rgyud): 'khor lo sman pa'i mi// nam mkha' lding gi sna dang 'dab// dbang po rdo rje me yi lce/ chu lA yi ni zhags pa bstan// rlung ni dar gyi shugs can te/ ta na ta yi be con sogs/
360a3(rgyud): 'byung po'i gdon rnams thams cad kyi// lag pa g.yon pas de dag zung // 'jug byed kyi ni 'khor lo rdzing // lta ba dang ni di ri ri// dri za dag ni thams cad kyi// gling bu dri/
360a4(rgyud): wa la sogs bstan// gar mkhan dag ni lhug par yang // gar dang rol mo'i cha byad bstan// gnod sbyin rnams kyis cher bgad pa// rab gtum gyi ni sgra chen te// ku be
360a5(rgyud): rwa yi mtshon mang dang // yang na phyag rgya'i tshogs kun yin// klu chen gdangs ka chas pa ste/ lag pa g.yon pas mgo bor gzhag dbugs ni rgyun rings rgyu ba dang /
360a6(rgyud): mig dmar dug dang bcas pa yin// klu rnams gdangs ka mang po dge gcig tu gzhibs nas ci dgar gzhag bya ba sgrub pa thams cad ni/ sbrul yod pa yi gdengs ka'i
360a7(rgyud): dbyibs// tshangs pa srin po gnyis kyi ni// sngags kyi ril pa nor bu dang / oM brjod pa'i dbyugs pa dang / mchod phyir thogs la sogs par bstan srin po rnams
360b1(rgyud): kyi sgo gtsigs dang // rdzu 'phrul dus kyang rab tu bas na// bza' ba dang ni bca' ba dang // mtshon cha dag kyang 'dra ba yin// sha za rnams ni 'tshe ba dang / ba ra la zhi
360b2(rgyud): pa sbed// 'jigs pa 'i tshigs ston pa dang / kun tu yang ni lta bar byed // sem byed kyi ni rang bzhin rdul/ mdung byung la sogs dpung la brten// ma me'i gdon ni thams
360b3(rgyud): cad ni// rang gi lha yi mtshon mchog byed// pad+ma phyir dang thor tshugs dbyug/ sngags ni nor bu bskor bar bya// rig pa 'dzin pa 'phags pa rnams// tshangs pa'i phyag rgya bdun pa
360b4(rgyud): yin/ mdung rtse gsum pa zla phyed dang // thor tsugs mig dang rgyal mtshar dang // khru mchog skad 'byir ral gri rnams// dbang phyug chen po'i phyag rgya bdun// mdung thung dril bu
360b5(rgyud): ba dan dang // de bzhin ra dang bya ga ga dang // rma bya yi ni mjug ma rnams// gzhon nu'i phyag rgya bdun po yin// 'khor lo dung dang be con dang // ral gri dang ni phub zlum dang /
360b6(rgyud): nam mkha' lding dang phag rnams ni// khyab 'jug phyag rgya bdun po yin// mche ba dang ni sprin dang sa// de bzhin bupa pa gtun shing dang / gshol dang rkang pa g.yon pa rnams/
360b7(rgyud): pag mo yi ni phyag rgya bdun// nam thung dag gi gnyir ma gdong // rgyan mang la sogs son pa dang // sem pa nam bu'i phyag rgya ste// rang bzhin nyid du bstan pa yin// zas su
361a1(rgyud): mdangs za rnams kyi ni// lhung bzed ral gri lag g.yon bcom// lha min rnams kyi mi yi gzugs// hUM dang bcas par bstan par bya// 'phags pa rnams/
361a2(rgyud): ni 'khor dang bcas// kun la mdung rtse gsum pa yin// dri ba byas na lhag par yang // gdon rnams mtshan nyid gsal bar shes// log 'dren sna tshogs brjod pa gang // de dag
361a3(rgyud): tshul ltas bstan par bya// de dag la rang gi lag pa bskum pa dang / brkyang ba dang / rkang pa tha mal par brkyang ba dang / sgra ra gzhug pa de dag las gsang sngags kyi las bstan te/
361a4(rgyud): dri ba dang / brdeg pa dang / dgrol ba'i tshul rnam pa gsum bya'o// las rgya che ba rig sngags kyi tshogs kyis bshad pa phyag rgya'i tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi las grub pa 'di ni shin tu //
361a5(rgyud): mtshar che ba ste/ sdebs su bya ba'i mdo bstan pa dang / sngags kyi tshogs rnams kyang bshad do// 'dus pa chen po'i mdo las shin tu bkra shis pa'i tshigs su bcad pa bstan pa dang //
361a6(rgyud): rdo rje'i rigs las rig sngags kyi tshogs rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa rnams kyang bshad do// lag na rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi rgyal po las/ lag na rdo rje dang lha chen po dang
361a7(rgyud): dka' bzlog mas bshad pa'i las kyi dkyil 'khor phyag rgya dang bcas par bshad pa rdzogs so// / dkyil 'khor chen po 'di dag las/ las kyi dkyil 'khor
361b1(rgyud): brnyan dang // ragazugs kyid kyil 'khor nams/ so sor rgyas par bstad pa dang / ga kyilas kyi phyag cu dang / phyag rgya'i tshe byed pa dang / rig sngags sgrub pa'i sarnams
361b2(rgyud): da // khrus kyi dkyil 'khor dag tu yang // dI dang me tog 'phrong ba dang // bdug pa dang ni mchod pa dang // gtor ma sna tshogs de dag kun// dbul bas kun tu rnam kun gyis//
361b3(rgyud): don kun rab tu bsgrub pa'i phyir// spyan drang 'di ni nges par bya// 'byung po thams cad bder 'gyur ba// 'byung po kun dga' zhes bya ba'i// gtor ma rig sngags ldan bya zhing /
361b4(rgyud): g.yas g.yon nas ni sbyin par bya// rtag tu 'di dag thams cad kyang // phyogs kun bltas pas 'di skad brjod// dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje 'dzin la phyag
361b5(rgyud): 'tshal lo// rig sngags tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo// phyag rgya'i tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo// rig sngags brgyad brgyar skyes pa yi// gdon gyi srog gi rten gyur dang // rgyu ba rab tu
361b6(rgyud): bshad par bya// dkyil 'khor spyan drang mchod pa dang // dkyil 'khor ris gsum mchod pa la// gdon rnams kyi ni gdon las mchog/ gdon gyi stobs ni rmugs bya dang //
361b7(rgyud): nges par rtag tu bzlas bya ba shad// bye ba phrag stong gdon rnams ni// sa steng dag na rgyu ba yod// dus tshogs sna tshogs bab pa na// de dag rgyu ba sna tshogs pa// gdon mtsha/
362a1(rgyud): dam pa 'grub pa'i byer// de dag bdag gis bshad par ga/ gdon rnams nyan par byed pa dang // gtor ma len cing zlab sbyin pa// de dag tshul dang /
362a2(rgyud): gnas byas pa// dben pa dag tu rgyu bar byed// ri bo yid du 'od rnams dang // rtse mo rnams dang khyim rnams dang // 'bras bu me tog rgyas rnams dang // drang srong dag gi
362a3(rgyud): gnas rnams dang // dka' thub tshul dang gzhal med khang // rig byed rjes su slob pa dang // me tog sna tshogs mchod ldan dang // gnas dang kun dga' yid 'ong dang /
362a4(rgyud): bya rnams skad chen 'byin pa dang // 'jig rten mar me byed kun dang // nyi ma'i gnas nas dga' byed cing // nyi ma lhan cig 'gro bar byed// nyi ma'i 'od dang kha dog mnyam// gza'
362a5(rgyud): dang rgyu skar skar ma la// de dag rtag tu rgyu bar byed// zla ba nye ba'i 'od zer gyis// phung po rgyas pa dag la gnas/ rin chen kun gyis rab brgyan cing // rtse nas ngos ni lnga ldi
362a6(rgyud): dang phug brgya dag gis gang ba yi// lhun po ril de dag gnas// gangs ri ri bo'i rtse mo dang // gangs kyi sul ni stong pa dang // sman kun gyis ni rgyas pa yi//
362a7(rgyud): gsang rnams dang ni nags tshal dang // sman brgyas yongs su gang ba yi// spos dang ldan la de dag gnas// spos kyi ngang ni zhim pa yi// phyogs rnams dang ni rgyas byed
362b1(rgyud): dung dpag bsam shing gis brgyan pa yi// skyed mos tshal chen dga' byed dang // wa rnams gnal med khang rnams sa// sa yi gzugs kyis gnas par byed
362b2(rgyud): de dag sprin phung gsab na gnas// sprin phung gi ni skye dag 'dra// sprin phung dag dang 'grogs byed cing // sbyin phung ldan cig dga' bar byed// rgya mtsho'i nang gi tshul gnas/
362b3(rgyud): chu yi shugs kyis rjes 'brang zhing // de dag rgya mtsho'i chu klung dang // lhan cig tu ni rgyu bar byed// mun nag gi ni gleng chen dang // rgya mtsho yi ni sgra rnams dang // rgya mtsho chen
362b4(rgyud): bo 'khrugs pa la// de dag rtag tu 'khrugs par byed// dpyid zla'i dus la bab pa na// shing rnams kun la gdon de dag/ khu byug bung ba'i gzugs su gnas// chu klung chen po'i
362b5(rgyud): 'gram dag na// gling ma rnams dang rdzong rnams dang // chu dmar ngag gis rgyas pa yi// 'jing rnams na ni gnas par byed// chu rgyun yid du 'ong ba dang // chu rnams rab tu 'byung
362b6(rgyud): ba dang / khron pa rnam pa sna tshogs dang // ri bo dag dang chu rnams dang // sbrul gyi tshogs kyis gang ba yi// nags khung chen po dag na yang // de dag sbrul du gzugs bsgyur nas/
362b7(rgyud): sbrul dang lhan cig dga' bar byed// sngon shing chen po mi bzang dang // 'byung po dag ni tshogs chen dang / khang stong dang ni yul stong dang // ba lang gnas ni gang ba dang // rgyal po
363a1(rgyud): ngag byed/ ra'ang dang / pad+ma rnams dang gzhan dag kyang // klung chen gnas ni yid 'ong dang d+ha rnams kyin bris ngag dang // gzhan yang thod
363a2(rgyud): khyer rnams dang gzhan// tshong dus dag na gnas par byed// chang 'thung gnas dang khyim dang gzhan// srang dang lam dang shing rta dang // d+hU ba dag gi gnas rnams dang /
363a3(rgyud): bu mo la sogs lta ba'i rnams// snyed mos tshal rnying mi bzang dang // lA mI gnas ni gzhigs pa dang / bu btsa' ba yi gnas gzhan dang // 'chi ba thug pa'i khyim
363a4(rgyud): dag dang // dga' ston sa dang 'dus pa dang // 'dus ston sa dang 'thab mo'i sa// yul gyis ni thams cad ni// gdon rnams rtag tu gnas par byed// drug cu rtsa
363a5(rgyud): bzhi'i gdon bshad pa// ying ltar mgyogs shing 'dod dgur 'gro// 'dod dgur bsgyur ba'i gzugs can de// thams cad rang dgar rtsen par byed// lho tshogs
363a6(rgyud): ma mo'i gdon drug bcas// tshangs pa'i srung bar byed pa ste// bar snang gza' ni nyi ma yang // gdon rnams kyi ni gtso bor bshad// skem byed la sogs srin po'i bar//
363a7(rgyud): rdzong ldan ma dang glu gnyis dang // srin po bcu dang lha mo dang // nor bu 'gul ni bar ma yin// grul bum la sogs yi dgas dang // brjed byed bcas dang srul por bcas//
363b1(rgyud): mdangs 'phrogs de bzhin skyo byed dang // thams cad gdon gyi tha mar bshad// de dag gi ni khyad par bzhin// dkyil 'khor mngon par mchod byas nas// mngon par
363b2(rgyud): dga' bar bya ba yi// bstod pas mchod pa dag kyang bya// dbang po rdo rje 'chang ba'i lnga// lha yi rgyal po gdon gyi bdag shar phyogs gdon gyi tshogs bcas la//
363b3(rgyud): mchod par byas te phyag kyang 'tshal// me ste bsreg bya ba zhes pa'i lha// 'byung po'i rgyal po gdon gyi bdag phyogs mtshams gdon gyi tshogs bcas la/ mchod par byas te
363b4(rgyud): phyag kyang 'tshal// gshin rje dbyug pa 'chang ba'i lha// sa'i bdag po gdon gyi bdag brnab sems bdag nyid gdon bcas la/ mchod par byas te phyag kyang 'tshal/
363b5(rgyud): bden dang bral ba legs ldan lnga// srin po'i bdag po gdon gyi bdag sna tshogs gdon gyi tshogs bcas la// mchod par byas te phyag kyang 'tshal// zhags pa thogs pa rla
363b6(rgyud): mi sa bden pa srung ba gdon gyi bdag/ nub phyogs gdon gyi tshigs bcas la// mchod par byas te phyag kyang 'tshal// rlung sde srog kyang 'dzin pa'i lha/ tshig srung gdan
363b7(rgyud): mi bdag pa'i dzung mi tshogs kyi mngan btsas la// mchod par byas 'a phyag kyang 'tshal/ gnod sbyin lagan brtson thogs/ nor srung gdon gyi bdabasam/ khring byo
364a1(rgyud): gdon dang bcas pa la// mchod par byas te phyag kyang 'tshal// dbang dang ldan pa 'dzin pa'i rtsa/ bgegs kyi rgyal po gdon gyi bdag/ dbang ldan phyogs
364a2(rgyud): kyi gdon bcas la// mchod par byas te phyag kyang 'a// 'og gi klu dang che ba'i lha// rgyal po chen po glang po che// dam tshig shes pa'i gdon bcas la// mchod par byas
364a3(rgyud): phyag kyang 'tshal// steng gi lha tshogs thams cad dang // zla ba nyi ma gza' chen dang / gza' skar rgyu skar bcas pa dang / skar ma'i 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor dang / rig sngag
364a4(rgyud): tshogs dang gsang sngags dang // de bzhin phyag rgya'i tshogs kun dang // dam tshig shes dang slob dpon dang // tshangs pa la sogs lnga chen dang // rdo rje 'dzin pa tshe yi lha//
364a5(rgyud): lag na rdo rje stobs po che// gtum po 'jig rten gsum gyi bdag/ 'jigs byed lag na rdo rje thogs// thams cad zhi bar byed pa ste// 'byung po'i tshogs ni kun gyis mchod// rnam
364a6(rgyud): pa kun gyis 'byung po kun// dus kun tu ni srung ba po// rig sngags bcas pa de dag dang // 'byung po'i tshogs ni thams cad la// ba shos dang dri sogs sna tshog sa rnams//
364a7(rgyud): des ni dga' zhing dbul bar bya// dam tshig shes pa rnams dang ni// 'byung po'i tshogs kyis bdag la srungs// de yi rgyas pa 'phel ba yang // bcom ldan 'das kyis mdzad par
364b1(rgyud): gsog/ sna tshogs tshig gis smra bar bya// zhi ba'i tshig ni yang dang yang // bdag gi bla ma'am yang na gzham// dam tshig shes pa gzhan gyis byas// 'di ni 'byung po kun la phan ra
364b2(rgyud): ba shang ba ste/ 'byung ba'i tshogs kun 'dus la nag tu mchod par bya// dkyil 'khor dag las gtor ma'i las ni rgyas pa 'di// rdzu bdag gi gnas dang rten gyur dpal bskyed byer
364b3(rgyud): 'dir ni thams cad dus su phyogs rnams thams cad du// yongs su dag pa'i yid dang rnam pa thams cad kyis// thams cad zhi bar byed pa gsum du rab bshad pa// don rnams
364b4(rgyud): bsgrub pa'i phyir ni bla mas bya ba yin// las kyi dkyil 'khor rdzogs so// kun rig sems can kun gyis mchod// rig sngags bdag po kun gyis rjed// mtshus
364b5(rgyud): pa med pa'i sangs rgyas ni// rnam gsum nyi ma'i 'od dang ldan// mtshan chen mang po mnga' ba ste// 'dom gang 'od chen 'chang ba dang // rig sngags ston pa chen po ste// mchog
364b6(rgyud): chen 'chang zhing sbyin byed dang // dag pa'i chos ni des gsungs pa// zhi ba'i grong khyer zhi ba'i lam// gang gis thub rnams shes pa dang // gzhan yang sngon gshegs gshegs
364b7(rgyud): gyur dang // yaM mtshan gnas ldan dge 'dun rnams// mya ngan 'das pa'i grong 'jug pa// shin tu rgyas pa de kun la// yang dang yang du phyag 'tshal zhing // thub pa sangs rgyas
365a1(rgyud): gnyis pa nI// 'phags pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu// sa dang lha min dri zar bcas/ klu dang gnod sbyin tshogs kyis mchod// de bzhin dam pa thub pa ste
365a2(rgyud): rig sngags 'chang kun dbang phyug r+b+he/ dpa' bo gcig pu da ga rdul ba/ lag na rdo rje phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin rdo rje lcags kyu yum/ rdo rje thog thog bzang mo dang // de nas
365a3(rgyud): pagan rdo rje'i mthus// kil-i ko li gtum po dang / rdo rje sgrog gi nyi ma bzhin// blo gros rdo rje pas mi thug/ 'og pag khri dril bu tsam/ de bzhin rdo rje nag mol// kyi ste shes rab
365a4(rgyud): can dag gis// gzhan don grub par 'dod pa na// mchod cing phyag kyang byas nas ni// dkyil 'khor gzung bya legs par bshad// grub pa lag na rdo rje yi// dngos grub thams cad
365a5(rgyud): sgrub byed cing // dngos grub thams cad rab rdzogs pa// ji skad du ni rab bstan pa'i// dkyil 'khor ci 'dra gang yin dang // de yi yon tan sna tshogs gang // tshogs kyang ji ltar bstan
365a6(rgyud): paM dang // dkyil 'khor gyi ni dam tshig dang // cho ga dam pa grub pa dang // phan dang mi phan don rnams dang // dam tshig shes pa'i yon tan dang // nyams pa'i gnas ni gang yin pa/
365a7(rgyud): de dang gzhan yang gang mthong ba// de dag thams cad legs par bshad// lag na rdo rje'i sras gtum pa// rdo rje sde la phyag byas nas// zla phyed yud tsam zhag gcig dang // rgyu skar/
365b1(rgyud): dag ni bya byung bra la// gtsang zhing dgos gtsang bgos pa dang // bsdams shing nges par gnas pa dang // grogs po gtsang mar ldan pa dang // gtsang ba'i las kyi rjes 'brangs pas/
365b2(rgyud): lar gyi ngo yi tshes gcig gam// tshes gnyis de bzhin lnga yang rung // tshes drag dang ni brgyad dang bcu// bcu gnyis yang na bcu gsum mam// yang na nya li sbyin par ni/
365b3(rgyud): yongs su gzung bar bya ba ste// de dag brtsam gyis gzhan la min// dkyil 'khor gnas ni sbyangs byas la/ zla ba nya yi nub mo ni// dkyil 'khor chen po bri bar bya// bsgrim
365b4(rgyud): te lag na rdo rje dang / rgyal dbang la ni phyag byas nas// zhi zhing sngan chad las byas pa'i// sar ni mkhas pas 'gro bar bya// tshong dus kun dga' gtsug lag khang // grong
365b5(rgyud): ngam yang na grong khyer gyi// byang shar mtshams ni gang mthong ba// de yi lho nub mtshams dag tu// zla ba re re brtul zhugs bya// mdangs dga' tshal ldan gtsang ma dang /
365b6(rgyud): sgo rdo gseg rus pa dang // mthong man skyon rnams rnam spangs pa// de 'dra'i sa de rnyed na ni// rdo rje lcags kyu dran byas la// shar phyogs nas ni gom pa 'dor// ha cang mi
365b7(rgyud): drag dgod mi bya// de nas rig sngags gang 'dod pas// bdag nyid kyang ni bsrung bar bya// de nas dkyil 'khor gnas der yang // dge ba'i ltas rnams blta bar bya// sngags
366a1(rgyud): kyis btab pa'i chu dag gis// thams cad legs par gtor bar bya// ba lang lci bas legs par sbyang // ku sha dag kyang gding bar bya// mnyam pa'idis/
366a2(rgyud): kyi dkyil dag tu// dkyil 'khor byed pa 'dug nas ni// phyogs mtshams steng dang thad kar yang // khar khor yug blta bar bya// srung zhing yid dga'i dri dag gis// khrus byas zhag/
366a3(rgyud): gsum sbyang bar bya// spos dang ldan pa'i ri bzhin du// spos kyis phyogs kun rgyas par bya// thig srung gsar zhing rab gtsang dang / tshad dang ldan zhing mdzes pa dang // dri zhim
366a4(rgyud): reg na 'jam pa dang // sra zhing legs par gzabs pa dang // thung dang sbom sogs ma legs dang // mdud pa rnams ni med pa yis// thig ni shes rab can gyis gdab// de yi/
366a5(rgyud): tshad kyang bshad par bya// rdo rje 'dzin chen dga' ba yi// dang po'i gnas ni rdzogs gyur nas// de las gzhan pa'i dkyil 'khor che// grangs rnams kyang ni bshad par bya// lag na
366a6(rgyud): rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i rgyal po ste gnas dang de'o// / bu dag cho ga shes dben pa bde// chos la mi spong bde ba yin// 'tshe ba spangs pas 'jig rten
366a7(rgyud): bde srog chags rnams la sdom pa dang // 'dod chags bral ba 'jig rten bde// 'dod chags rnams las 'das pa dang / bsam nga rgyal zhi ba dang // dul ba 'di ni mchog
366b1(rgyud): bde bu dag rnyan las zlog pa yi// lam bgrod zab cing bal dka' ba// munA na ga thibs bros bsgribs pa dang // 'dod la chags pas rtogs mi 'gyur// ngas ni dka' bas/
366b2(rgyud): rtogs byas nas// skye bo rgyan bzhin 'khyam pa dang // 'dod pa dag gi 'dun pa yis// bcings pa'i bar du bshad pa ste// 'di ni lag na rdo rje yi// yid 'ong ched du brjod pa brjod/
366b3(rgyud): rtse mo can gyis bsrung byas nas// nges par kun tu 'jigs pa med// dkyil 'khor khru ni bcu drug tu// ci nas rab tu tshang bar bya// srid du yang ni ci nas kyang // sum cu rtsa gnyis
366b4(rgyud): yod pa dang // gtsang mas gtsang ma'i gos bgos la// thig skud de ni bdag gis gzung // lha la dga' ba'i grogs po yis// kho ra khor yug drang bar bya// thig grangs de yi steng dag
366b5(rgyud): tu thig ni snyoms par legs par bri// rig sngags rdo rje lcags kyu ma// rmad du byung ba de nyid brjod// thub cher gnas par gyur pa yi// khor yug brag ni rgya che ba// rab byung
366b6(rgyud): gis ni bstan pa bzhin// blo can dag gis zlum por bya// thung sdom la sogs skyon bral zhing // thig ni legs shing snyoms par bya// sbom ches pa ni sngar bshad zin// thung chos
366b7(rgyud): pas ni nad kyis 'debs// gang zhig dngos grub mchog 'dod pas// de ni yungs kar dag gi bri// gang zhig tsan dan bye mas 'dri// des ni 'jig rten nges par 'joms/ nas
367a1(rgyud): rnams kyi ni ma 'dres pa'i// sA lu bzang por byas nas ni// de yi nor dang 'bru rnams dang // dbyig rnams rtag tu 'phel bar 'gyur// gang zhig dngos grub
367a2(rgyud): mchog 'dod pas// der ni gsum char gyis kyang bri// yang na de dag gcig pu yis// shes rab can gyis bri bar bya// de nas ri yi rgyal po ni// rin chen kun nas grub pa ste//
367a3(rgyud): nyi ma bzhin du rtag tu yang // rang gi 'od kyis rab 'bar zhing // bang rim yod pa'i ri rab de// thog ma nyid du gzhag par bya// sngar bstan pa yi khor yug ni// gru bzhi tshad du bya//
367a4(rgyud): ba yin// de nyid khongs su rim pa gsum// khru re tsam du bri bar bya// gzhan yang mtho ni ngo do dang // sor bzhi bcas par bri bar bya// gnyis pa dang ni lhag ma rnams// cha drug
367a5(rgyud): mdzes dang ldan par bya// gzhan ni mtshams la thug pa'i bar// ci rigs par ni bri bar bya// ngu 'bod chen po zhes bya ba'i// dmyal ba bden bral phyogs su gzhag/ bstan pa
367a6(rgyud): bzhin du de byas nas// gzhan yang bshad pa bzhin du bya// ras gsar pa ni sA lu 'am// tsan dar bzang po'i phye ma yis// rdo rje srid du khru gang ba// rtse drug yang na rtse gsum
367a7(rgyud): bri 'di yang ci snyem 'byor na// grog mkhar gyi ni so dag gis// sor bani tsam du bya ba yin// gang gis gdon ni stong phrag rnams// khyad par 'dir ni srub byed pa// de nyid
367b1(rgyud): na gsum dag gi/ 'jigs byed drag pa yin par nges// de nyid ngo mtshar bye ba sad// ya mtshan rnams kyang spyod pa yin// gcig pu rdo rje gnyis ldan pa// de nyid kyi ni drung /
367b2(rgyud): dag tu// dkyil 'khor rnam pa bzhi po dag/ byin gyis brlabs pa'i cho ga bya// bden dang gtor ma rgya che ba// ting 'dzin zhi ba ya mtshan ldan// yang na gang gis 'di dag kun
367b3(rgyud): thub pa'i shes rab byin brlabs bya// bden dang nges par gnas byas nas// bder bral phyogs su bri ba dang // chu lha'i phyogs su song nas kyang // rgyal chen don rnams bya ba ni/
367b4(rgyud): si ta ku ni bu dang bcas// bzhi pa de ni legs par gnas// grong khyer mchog gi drung dag tu// gru ni byang phyogs blta bar bya// de nas 'jug par rab bstan te// dkyil 'khor
367b5(rgyud): dag pa gzhan mi bya// gzugs gnas sgo mchog de nyid ni// rdo rje 'dzin pa dgyes pa yini// dkyil 'khor 'dod pa gang yin pa// de yi sgo yi byang phyogs drung // lho phyogs kyi ni//
367b6(rgyud): drung dag tu// bstan pa gang yin gzhag par bya// gur kum yid du 'ong ba dang // ldan pa'i rgya skyegs khu ba dang // le brgan rtsi yis bskur ba yi// sar ni dmar zhing yid 'ongab/
367b7(rgyud): thig rdol med cing mnyams la// dri nga bdag med pa yi// gdan dag kyang ni nges byas shing // shing ring la ni legs par gdags// de nas logs shig rtse mo yi// byang
368a1(rgyud): sna tshogs khyad par du// rnam par mdzes pa gzhag bya ste// rgya skyegs legs legs byas pa'i// pho long chen po ri mo can// gzhan yang dril dang sgo nga
368a2(rgyud): dbyibs// ste'u 'khor gyi tshogs rnams dang // gzhan yang rnam pa sna tshogs gzhag/ ku ran ta ka'i me tog 'phreng // rgyal mtshan rtse mor 'phyang du gzhug/ yang na me tog
368a3(rgyud): dmar po yi// 'phreng ba bzang po sna tshogs gdags// de dag bstan bcos shes pa yis// dkyil 'khor de yi phyi rol gzhag/ de nas ri dbang khor yug gi/ nang du yang ni 'gro
368a4(rgyud): bar bya// de ltar mtshungs med ces bya ba'i// dkyil 'khor gyi ni thig gdab pa// gnas gnyis pa ni rgyas par bstan// lag na rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi rgyal po las
368a5(rgyud): gnas gnyis pa rdzogs so// / rig sngags rdo rje lcags kyu ma// rmad du byung ba de dran zhing // g.yon phyogs dag tu go rims bzhin// lha rnams snang ni/
368a6(rgyud): dgod par bya// chu lha'i phyogs kyi sgo dag nas// kar sha pa Na brgyad dag gi/ 'gron bu rnams ni shar nub tu// mnyam zhing mdzes par dgod par bya// de yi lho phyogs rdo rje yi//
368a7(rgyud): rig sngags bla ma'i rigs rnams dgod// de ni rdo rje lcags kyu ma// rig sngags rgyal po dbus su gzhag/ dregs shing stobs kyis rgyags pa yi// sngon po chen po sngon po gnyis/
368b1(rgyud): der ni rig sngags rigs rnams kyi// sgo srungs dag tu gzhag par bya// rig sngags rdo rje'i rigs skyes rnams// shar phyogs su ni blta bar bya// 'dod pa'i rdo rje dang por
368b2(rgyud): bshad// rdo rje khro bo mjug tu gzhag/ me tog yid 'ong rtse mo can// lug rgyud gtum mo ser mo rnams// po nya mo dag grangs bzhin du// thams cad de yi pha rol dgod/
368b3(rgyud): bung ba ma dang lta ba ma// dga' ma thub dka' byang phyogs gzhag/ rdo rje ka ta ya na dang // 'di dag g.yas phyogs bri bar bya// rdo rje sde yi 'khor rnams kyang // de yi lho phyogs
368b4(rgyud): dgod par bya// de nas klu rgyal nor rgyas bu// bzhi pa dag la gzhag par bya// 'byung po sna tshogs bskor ba yi// gzhon nu tshogs dang bcas pa yang // dkyil 'khor lnga par
368b5(rgyud): gzhag par bya// mdung thung yang ni mdun du gzhag/ de nas drug la bden bral phyogs// 'byung po rangs byed mi bzad pa// 'phags pa yi ni mdung bris la// 'phags
368b6(rgyud): ma yi ni mdun du gzhag/ ma mo rnams kyi rigs lnga po// tshangs pa dang ni dbang phyug ma// skem byed khyab 'jug phag mo zhes// bya ba dkyil 'khor bdun par gzhag/ grong khyer/
368b7(rgyud): de yi nang ngag tu/ chu klung 'gram dang ldan par bri// gra rnams shar byang grwa dag dang // lho dang nub phyogs phyin par bya// sdig can chun gnas pa'i nang // ngoms mi shes pa'i ro
369a1(rgyud): dgas shig/ nang du mchu btsugs phyogs gcig nas// de nang khyu mchog 'gro bar bya// rlung lha'i phyogs kyi gnas gcig tu// bde byed lha mo khyA
369a2(rgyud): mchog dang // de bzhin ra dang bum rna gnyis// grong khyer gyi ni sgo srungs gzhag/ klung gi g.yas rol 'gram dag tu// rig sngags chen mo bu smad bcas/
369a3(rgyud): dbang ldan phyogs su gzhag bya ste// dkyil 'khor bdun pa 'das pa yin// dkyil 'khor brgyad pa sngar bshad pa'o// 'byung po'i bya ba sgrub pa bdun// 'byung po sna tshogs
369a4(rgyud): bskor ba gzhag/ dgu par yang ni rim bzhin bri// de nas dkyil 'khor bcu par ni// tshangs pa'i drang srong rnams kyang gzhag/ de nas gau shin rje tshogs mang bcas// bcu
369a5(rgyud): gcig par ni gzhag par bya// me lce 'bar bas bskor ba yi// me lha me yi tshogs kyis bskor// me de mthu las skyes pa ste// de ni bcu gnyis shes par bya// yi dgas
369a6(rgyud): rnams kyi 'khor dang bcas// ri dgas dag kyang gzhag par bya// lag na rdo rjes bshad pa bzhin// de ni bcu gsum shes par bya// zla ba phyogs bzang stobs po che//
369a7(rgyud): khyab 'jug dbang po nye dbang gnyis// rgyal ba'i dbang po sangs rgyas kyi// blo gros lha mo gnyis kyang gzhag/ gang na lha dbang gnyis gnas pa// de ni bcu bzhir shes par
369b1(rgyud): bya bco lnga pa yi dkyil 'khor du// klu chen rigs brgyad dgod par bya// bka' stsol pa zhes bya ba yi// tshangs pa'i srin rnams bcu drug tu// bcu bdud pa yi dkyil 'khor du//
369b2(rgyud): ka ta ya na gzhag par bya// de yi 'khor ni gang yin pa// de yang drung du gzhag par bya// dbang phyug chen po chung mar bcas// dbang ldan phyogs su gzhag bya ste// de ni bco brgyad
369b3(rgyud): shes par bya// de nas phyi rol rig sngags rigs// rig sngags kyi ni sna tshogs dge/ bcu dgu par ni gzhag par bya// de nas kyang ni rig sngags rnams// ming smos 'di
369b4(rgyud): dag la sogs bri// dri gshed thabs kyi dri gshed dang // ro langs mar ni grags pa dang // dkar mo chen mo dkar mo dang // gzhan yang sa stengs gnas rnams gzhag/ rdo rje'i mnga'
369b5(rgyud): bdag dges pa yi// gzhan gyi rig sngags mchog 'ching ba// rab tu gsal zhing 'bar ba de// dbus der mkhas pas gzhag par bya// de nas rdo rje 'dzin chen rje// nyi shu par ni gzhag par bya//
369b6(rgyud): gang na rdo rje 'dzin gnas te// ming ni rdo rje pho brang yin// nyi shu gcig pa'i byang phyogs su// ku be ra ni tshogs bcas bri// ku ba ra ni gar gnas pa// grong khyer ljang lo can zhes bya// klu yi bya ba
369b7(rgyud): sgrub pa brgyad// grong khyer nyi shu gnyis pa gzhag/ bya ba sgrub bcas klu chen rnams// lnga po nyi shu gsum par gzhag/ dkyil 'khor nyi shu rtsa bzhir ni// klu ni dkyil 'khor gzhag par bya/
370a1(rgyud): klu mgo yi ni gdengs ka can// klu chen gyis ni g.yas su bskor// dkyil 'khor de yi nang dag tu// klu chen kha dog sna tshogs pa// mtha' yas nor rgyas pad+ma dang /
370a2(rgyud): de bzhin nor bu la sogs klu// kal pa la dang rab mgyogs gnyis// de bzhin gzhan yang klu rnams kyi// ma dang rgyal tshab 'jog po yang // dkyil 'khor nang du gzhag par bya//
370a3(rgyud): shar ske 'ong ma'i rtse mo gzhag/ dga' bskyed pa ni lho phyogs su// nub phyogs su ni legs mthong gzhag/ byang phyogs su ni stobs kyi rgyu// de nas chung lha'i phyogs dag tu// 'byung po'i//
370a4(rgyud): tshogs ni bdun rnams dgod// de ni nyi shu lnga pa yi// dkyil 'khor du yang grags pa yin// dkyil 'khor nyi shu rtsa lnga pa// 'di dag kyang ni mkhas pa yis// ci rigs par ni bro bya zhing
370a5(rgyud): rdzogs byed rnams kyang legs par bri// chu lha'i phyogs su nyi ma bri// shar phyogs su ni zla ba gzhag/ kA ru na ni gling bzhir ni// phyogs mtshams dag tu gzhag par bya// lhag ma dag
370a6(rgyud): ni byang phyogs su// nges par yang ni dgod pa bstan// 'di dag rnams ni mdor bsdu na// khor yug gi ni khong nas dbyung // de nas rdo rje shugs kyis ni// der ni stobs chen 'gro//
370a7(rgyud): bar bya// bang rim la ni song nas kyang // dang po legs par dgod par bya// rdzong gi 'phags ma dor sgrub pa// dur khrod gnas na drag mo ni// bden bral phyogs su gzhag bya zhing
370b1(rgyud): ma yang drung du gzhag par bya// phyogs kyi la ni bye ba rnams// dbang ldan phyogs su dgod par bya// log 'dren drag po chen po yang // dkyil 'khor du ni legs par dgod// rlung
370b2(rgyud): lnga'i phyogs su mkha' lding gzhag/ de nas dang po skyong ba yi// rdzong gi 'phags ma gnyis pa yang // yongs su rdzogs par gzhag par bya// bang rim dag ni gnyis pa la//
370b3(rgyud): shugs kyis bsgom bya zhing // klu rigs nor bu gzhag par bya// mtha' yas bden bral phyogs su gzhag/ de nas phyogs kyi lha nyid ni// gshin rje'i phyogs su leg par gzhag/ de nas
370b4(rgyud): yi dgas tshogs rnams kyang // me yi phyogs su gzhag par bya// de nas cho ga shes pa yis// yi dgas kyi ni rigs rnams dgod// brjed byed kyi ni rigs rnams dang // nam
370b5(rgyud): glu dag gi rigs kyang gzhag/ dbang ldan 'byung po rnams dang ni// 'byung po'i chang khyu rnams kyang gzhag/ tshangs pa'i srin po zhes bya rnams// dkyil 'khor byang phyogs dgod par bya/
370b6(rgyud): phyi rol klu yi rigs rnams kyang // rlung lha'i phyogs su legs par dgod// dkyil 'khor dam pa gnyis pa las// bang rim 'di ni yongs su rdzogs// rdo rje rim gyis bsgoms nas ni// gsum pa
370b7(rgyud): yang ni bden bral phyogs// sha za bzhag ste song na yang // rnal 'byor mkha' 'gro'i dkyil 'khor gzhag/ yi dgas kyi ni khyim rnams kyang // gshin rje'i phyogs su legs par dgod/
371a1(rgyud): me yi phyogs su dkyil 'khor du// stobs chen lha ma yin rnams gzhag/ de nas dpal ldan 'jig rten spyo/ 'jig rten chos las phyir phyogs pa/ su
371a2(rgyud): 'khor srung ni dpag med pa'o// dri zar lhan cig kun tu dgod// dbang phyug chen mor bcas pa yi// dbang ldan phyogs su gnas par bya// de nas rig sngags rnams kyi bdag
371a3(rgyud): lagan rdo rje rnal 'byor che// grogs bcus rdo rje 'dzin pa y-i// rdo rje po brang dgor bar gzhag/ de nas stobs chen 'jig rten skyong // dpal ldan 'jig rten chos spangs pa// lag na
371a4(rgyud): rje 'dzin pa yi// dbang ldan byung gi phyogs su gzhag/ de bzhin lcang lo can dag tu// nor sbyin tshogs dang bcas par bri// klu rnams ma ni su ras// rlung lha'i phyogs su gnas par bya//
371a5(rgyud): de dag bu dang bcas par ri// de yi drung du dgod par bshad// mkha' lding rnam par 'dud pa'i bu// mthu rtsal shin tu rdzogs pa'ang gzhag/ de nas 'byung po'i tshogs rnams dgod//
371a6(rgyud): chu lnga yang ni nub phyogs gzhag gsum pa dag kyang 'das pa yi// bzhi pa dag gis bshad par bya// bad rim bzhi pa'i steng dag tu// rdo rje shugs kyi sa song nas ni/ nyi ma rnams
371a7(rgyud): ni g.yog dang bcas// chu lha'i phyogs su gnas par bya// bden bral phyogs su srin rnams dgod// de yi pha rol grul bum gzhag de nas grul bum lcags can yang // lho
371b1(rgyud): phyogs su ni gzhag par bya// me mi phyogs su rung lha gzhag/ shar phyogs zlab 'khor dang brnyas// thag bzangs rigs kyang de bzhin te// de gnyis kyi ni ba'i bgang / de nas
371b2(rgyud): bang rim lnga pa la// rdo rje shugs kyis 'gro bar bya/ lnga bsrung phyir ni klu rnams kyang // chu lha'i phyogs su dgod par bya// dbang ldan dang ni shar mtshams su// lnga yi mdzod kyang gzhag
371b3(rgyud): par bya// gzhan gyis mi thub rdo rje che// dbang ldan phyogs su gzhag par bya// de nas rdo rje'i drung dag tu// gnas gtsang rigs kyi lha chen gzhag/ lnga yi srung ma gnod sbyin che// byung /
371b4(rgyud): phyogs dag tu gnas par bya// rdo rje shugs kyis drug pa la// song nas chu lha'i phyogs dag tu// klu rgyal rgya mtsho chen po'i bu// drag cing shugs dang ldan pa gzhag/ der ni g.yog
371b5(rgyud): dang bcas par bya// gzhan dag gis ni sprul pa la// dbang byed la ni gang yin rnams// bden bral phyogs su gnas par bya// tshangs ris kyi ni tshogs rnams kyang // me yi phyogs su//
371b6(rgyud): dgod par bya// tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa yi// lha rnams shar phyogs gzhag par bya// shin tu mthong lha dbang ldan du// srid rtse de yi pha rol dgod// de bzhin dka' bzlog byang
371b7(rgyud): phyogs gzhag/ drug pa dag kyang 'das pa yin// bang rim dag ni bdun pa la// rdo rje shugs kyis rdo rje 'chang // song nas klu yi gtso bo ni// rgya mtsho chen po rmad byung gzhag
372a1(rgyud): byang phyogs bya ba zin nas ni// grags shing bsod nams che ba yi// 'phrul dga' ba yi lha chen rnams// gshin rje'i phyogs su gnas par bya/ de nas rdo rje
372a2(rgyud): shar phyogs kyi// gnas kyi gtso bor gzhag par bya// sum cu gsum pa'ang shar phyogs su// gzhag cing bdun pa yongs su dgang // lha rnams sna tshogs rgyas pa yi// ri yi dbang
372a3(rgyud): popo dam pa yi// bang rim dag ni yongs su rdzogs// de yi 'og tu bya ba bshad// ri rab steng du thams cad mkhyen// rig sngags snying po 'chang ba po// sangs rgyas 'jig rten rtogs
372a4(rgyud): mdzad pa// thar pa'i grong khyer dbang phyug gzhag/ gang gis 'od zer de dag gis// phyogs rnams thams cad rgyas mdzad dang // gang gi sku la mtshan kun gyi// mdzod rnams thams
372a5(rgyud): cad 'byung ba dang // mtshan dang gzhon dang brtson 'grus dang // gzhan yang zhi bar ldan pa dang // mchog rnams mchog sbyin byed pa la// gang gis mchog gi mchog sbyin dang // thugs
372a6(rgyud): rje che dang ldan pa'i mgon// nyi ma 'char ka'i 'od dang 'dra// 'od zer nyi ma bye ba yi// gang gi mun pa bsal ba dang // chos dang mtshan nyid rigs pa yi// yid de bzhin nor bu'i thug
372a7(rgyud): mnga' gang // gang gis bskal pa grangs med par// sems can rnams ni rab tu bsrungs// rin chen in+d+ra ni la ltar// gang gi gtsug tor mdzes pa dang / nor bu yi ni rgyal po bzhin/
372b1(rgyud): zla mdog can gyi mdzod srungs sna// gang gi bdud rtsi gtong ba'i zhal/ pad+ma rA ga'i mdog 'dra dang // dus 'tshams gser gyis bskur ba yi// gser gyi ri ltar sku mdog mdzes/
372b2(rgyud): 'khor lo chen po rtsibs stong pas// phyag dang zhabs ni legs spras pa// skyil mo krung ni mdzes pa yis// thub pa chen po legs par bzhugs// chos kyi chu klung chen po'i mchog/ de yi
372b3(rgyud): zhal nas kun tu 'bab// rmad du byung bar 'bab pa ste/ ba dag gi kha ni stong phrag rnams// stong snyed kyis ni brjod pa'am/ khong du chud par nus mi 'gyur// de ni rgyas par 'gengs pa/
372b4(rgyud): dang ye shes pa mtha' thun med// shin tu rma byung gsang bar bshad// tshig ldan gyi ni wa mo de/ 'jig rten mgon po sangs rgyas kyi/ gsung la rab tu gnas pa yin/
372b5(rgyud): rten gsum ma bdag mchog sbyin// 'jig rten gsum gyis phyag byas pa// 'di ni gnas dang 'gro ba yi// 'jig rten thams cad 'dzin pa yin/ che ba'i tshe mchog stobs chen te/
372b6(rgyud): dgra' de kun gyi tshig la gnas// gzhanas cig yongs rgyas 'dra ba med/ zud na yang ni gnas ma yin// de mi zugs pa spangs rgyas sas / rnams ci kyis pa dang dus
372b7(rgyud): mchog sbyin sa su ma gshes pathams cad rnam par mangs/ ma dngas gro ba 'ang sa ro// khyang kying bzhin cid me pa/ dang rjes sung dbang dag // gnong rgya
373a1(rgyud): bskor ba'i// rgyu dang mi chu rnams kyi gter// ya mtshan las kyi dkyil 'khor ni// der gtogs der ni brtson zhing spro// de dang 'brel bar the tshom med/
373a2(rgyud): chos klung bsod nams ldan pa de// bsod nams rin chen dag gis rgyas// lag na rdo rje'i bsod nams kyi// las kyi rgya mtsho dag las 'byung // chu klung rgya mtshor 'bab pa na//
373a3(rgyud): skye bos brten nas 'bab par 'gyur// de bzhin chos kyi chu klung 'di// 'di dag gis bsten byas nas kyang // lag na rdo rje'i mgo bo dang // rna gnyis dang ni gsum du dpag
373a4(rgyud): zer ma 'phros pas lha mo dang // dbang phyug tshogs bcas phog par 'gyur// de phyir chos kyi chu klung 'di// sangs rgyas las ni 'byung byas la/ lag na rdo rje'i mgo bor yang /
373a5(rgyud): rab tu dbab cing bdug par bya// bsod nams ldan pa'i chu klung rgya chen de nyid las// skye bo mtha' dag gcig tu sems btud nyan par byed// de nyid la ni lha rnams thams cad
373a6(rgyud): mngon par dgal// de nyid la ni rig sngags grub pa'i tshogs kun brten// gnas rnams gsum pa 'di ni lha yi gnas yin te// rdo rje 'dzin par mi dgongs pa bzhin du rdzogs// de nas/
373a7(rgyud): dam tshigam khyen pas dkyil 'khor rgyal po y-i// gas bgang dang shing gsungs dga' rgyas bdag gis bshad// lagan rdo rje dkyi 'khor chen po dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi rgyal por/
373b1(rgyud): gnas gsum pa rdzogs so// / ri rab kyi ni byang phyogs su// chos kyi klung chen 'dzin pa yi// rdo rje 'dzin chen rab gtum pa// stobs che re la gar rdo rje gzhag
373b2(rgyud): de yi rkang pa g.yon pa yis// dbang phyug chen po gnad par bya// g.yas pa yi ni rkang pa yis// lha mo dka' bzlog gnar bar bya// ri yi dbang po khor yug dang // bang rim dag gi bar
373b3(rgyud): ngag tu// gling chen rnam pa bzhi po dang // gnas rnams ji bzhin gzhag par bya// de nas chu klung bdun yang gzhag/ lho phyogs su ni dbyibs legs pa'i// 'dzam bu gling ni gzhag par
373b4(rgyud): bya chu klung dang ni shing dang yul// sna tshogs kyis ni shin tu rgyas// de yi mngon mtshan chen po ni// 'dzam bu'i shing mchog skyes pa de// 'phang du dpag tshad brgyad yod do// 'og
373b5(rgyud): logs su ni gzhag par bya// de nas chu klung bdun yang gzhag/ nags tshal yang ni bdun dag dang // yid du 'ong ba'i ri bdud dang // yul bdun dag kyang gzhag par bya// dang
373b6(rgyud): bo byang nas brtsam bya zhing // lho phyogs logs su thur du drang // shar ras nub tu drang bya zhing // kho ra khor yug bsgrubs nas ni// rgyal ba'i gsung rab yid 'ong ba// chos kyi
373b7(rgyud): 'khor ma rjes bsgrub pa// 'phags pa shA ra dwa'i'i blo// snying rje'i bdag nyid pong+ge'i mchog/ dge slong dge slong ma rnams dang / rgyal po dag gis bstan pa gzhag 'jamatha
374a1(rgyud): gling gi lho phyogs su// 'khri shing dag kyang bri bar bya// nub phyogs su ni ba lang spyod// chu bo brgyas ni gang ba dang // yul dang skye bo stong dag dang / ba lang
374a2(rgyud): khru ni stong gis rgyas// de bzhin shar gyi lus 'phags kyang // shar phyogs su ni gzhag par bya// yul rnams dang ni ri dgas gis// kun tu rab tu rgyas pa gnang // de nas gnas
374a3(rgyud): brtan chos sbyong ba/ bcu gnyis dag dang lhan cig tu// sgra gcan zin zhes grags pa ste// sangs rgyas sras ni mngon sum gnas// gnod sbyin lha min lto 'phye rnams// nyin mtshan
374a4(rgyud): du ni der song nas// dri dang 'phreng ba dpe med pas// mchod pa byed cing phyag kyang 'tshal// de nas byang gi sgra mi snyan// lhun po yi ni byang phyogs gzhag/ gtsang zhing gru bzhi lham pa ste//
374a5(rgyud): chu klung dag gis rab tu brgyan// gang dag gi ni tshe yi tshad/ tshig stong tshang par brjod pa dang // sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs pa yi// sems can ya mtshan der gnas// rgya
374a6(rgyud): mtsho'i sa ni bskor ba yi// ri yi dam pa'iri rab la// phyogs kyi lha ni bzhi po rnams// kun nas nges par gzhag par bya// kar sha pa Na brgyad dag gis// dkyil 'khor dang por rdo rje bri//
374a7(rgyud): de yi gnas rnams de dag tu// gser gyi gdu bu dag kyang bya// sgo rnams re rer ngor grub pa// rgyu dang mi rgyu 'jig rten gsum// thub par nus pa gang yin pa'i// sgo srungs gnyis kyang
374b1(rgyud): gzhag par bya/ de yang sngags dang ldan bya zhing / kun tu gzhal las rgyas par bya// rdo rje thog thog sgo phyogs bri// rdo rje khu tshur byang phyogs gzhag/ de nas der ni lba ba shos rnams/
374b2(rgyud): rnam pa sna tshogs bkra ba dang // tha med rab mdzes rgyas par bya// dri dang me tog 'phreng bas mchod// ninga'i thu lu sna tshogs pa// sbyang rtses byugs shing gzabs pa dang // legs byas
374b3(rgyud): a shwa ka bar ti// de bzhin be re gnas 'khur dbul// ji tsam du ni rgyas pa phul// de tsam du ni 'grub par bshad// 'bras kyi 'o thug tshul ka/ thug pa sbyar thugs mi ta// 'bras
374b4(rgyud): chan tshod ma sna tshogs pa// kha dog sna tshogs sor lngar ldan// de la sogs pa gang 'dod pa// lo ma sna tshogs skyon med pa// yang na kham por gsar pa 'am// pad+ma'i lo ma dag la
374b5(rgyud): gzhag/ nas dang gro dang mon srar gre'u// sA lu dang ni til 'bru rnams// snod gsar ngag gi nang du gzhag/ yang na gzhan du de bzhin gzhag hwags dang kha ras gang ba dang / btu
374b6(rgyud): ba bsil zhi zhim pa dag/ snod gsar dag gi nang dag tu// bzhag nas rab tu dbul bar bya// des na su yang 'tshe mi 'gyur// dga' ba'i sems kyis za 'dod la// kha zas dag kyang /
374b7(rgyud): sbyin par bya// de nas dga' bar bya ba'i phyir// ta la'i lo ma bsil yab dbul// dri zhim pa yi dri kun gyis// dkyil 'khor la ni mchod par bya// spos kyi phye ma sna tshogs pa/
375a1(rgyud): mchog rnams kyis kyang de bzhin mchod// dz+wa ya mu sa na la sogs// dri zhim thams cad sbyar bas mchog/ a ka ru drang du ru ka shing gi thang chugasar
375a2(rgyud): sbyar rnams// bdug pa'i rgyur ni bsngags pa yin// dngos grub sgo drung 'dug par bya// yang na nang du song nas ni// de ni byang phyogs kha blta zhing // lag na rdo rje tshul bzhin pod//
375a3(rgyud): shin tu bkra shis tshigs bcad dang // de bzhin bde legs rdzogs pa gdon// de nas der ni rig sngags ma// rdo rje lcags kyu rtse mo can// rdo rje'i rigs las byung ba yi// rig
375a4(rgyud): sngags bstan pa gang yin pa// des ni bdag nyid bsrung bar bya// de nas thog mar spyan drang ba// ri rab de yi rtse mor ni// 'dug na sa sgra chen gdon par bya// chos kyi chu klung spyan
375a5(rgyud): drang ba// dam pa 'di ni brjod par bya// bkra shis tshigs bcad brjod pa dang // chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang // 'dus pa chen po'i mdo dag dang // 'phags pa'i bden
375a6(rgyud): pa bzhi dgA dang // rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba pe/ ma nyams the tshom med pa dang / 'phags pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu'i// seng ge'i sgra ni dpe med gdon// de nas rdo rje rigs kyi
375a7(rgyud): yum rig sngags rdo rje lcags kyu bzlas// de nas kyang ni rtse mo can// de nas rdo rje rigs skyes kyi// rig sngags dag ni gang 'dod dang / snying po 'gro lding gtum po dang /
375b1(rgyud): de yi steng dang 'dod pa yi// rdo rje ma dang 'og pag can// lu gu rgyud dang gtum mo dang // gser gtum rdo rje thog thog ma// de bzhin rdo rje khu tshur ma// rdo rje thub dka' bo nya mo//
375b2(rgyud): chen mo bcu dang drug cu bzhi// dang po blo gros rdo rje ma// gnyis pa rdo rje dril bu ma// gsum pa rdo rje nag mo dang / bzhi pa gzhan gyis mi thub pa// lnga pa rdo rje rol mo dang / drug pa
375b3(rgyud): yang ni 'og rlan// bdun pa rdo rje shugs yin te// brgyad pa rdo rje nyi ma yin// dgu pa rdo rje dbyug pa ste// de ni sna tshogs gzugs zhes grags// bcu pa rdo rje bden pa ste// ci
375b4(rgyud): dga' bar ni bzlas brjod bya// rdo rje dbyug pa blta bar bya// rdo rje khro bo 'jom byed dang / khung ba blta ba chu klung dang // rdo rje ka ta ya na dang // bdug pas 'jil dang srung ma dang /
375b5(rgyud): yon tan chen mo de la sogs// nges pa nyid du bzlas brjod bya// des na dkyil 'khor 'grub par 'gyur// nges par gnas pas rig sngags ni// mchog 'gyur rdo rje lcags kyu ma//
375b6(rgyud): 'drug pa kun gyis rgyas pa yis// dkyil 'khor du ni brgyad brgyad bzlas// de nas las su grub pa yi// rig sngags des ni grub par gyur// rig sngags gang la dga' ba des//
375b7(rgyud): dkyil 'khor du ni bzlas brjod bya// lag na rdo rjes pa shad pa li// rig sngags mang po nyid ni/ mchog 'dod dngos grub 'dod pa yis/ ci nas spro bar mi 'gyur gyung// denas
376a1(rgyud): rdzogs par spyan drangs shing // gsang sngags rgyas par byas nas ni// de nas dkyil 'khor 'dod pa kun// gzung pa yang ni bshad par bya// sangs rgyas chos/
376a2(rgyud): dang dge 'dun dang // dkon mchog gsum la gtso bor 'dzin// dad cing mnyam par bzhag pa yi// mi ni dam tshig 'dzin du gzhug/ des na de la mkhas pa yis// bslab gzhi
376a3(rgyud): lnga ni sbyin par bya// ming 'dri zhes ni bya ba bdag/ phyin chad nam 'tsho'i bar dag tu// srog gcod log par g.yem pa dang // rku dang brdzun du smra ba dang // 'bru dang sbyar ba'i chang
